title: Pacman 30th Anniversary
description:
Who is not afraid of ghosts? Pac-man is!
In the neon glow of 1980s arcades, a little yellow character with the shape of a pizza missing a slice was born. This little guy is scared by ghosts, like every other kid. But when he eats energizers, he threatens all ghosts. The creator of the original game, Toru Itawani, describes the relationship between Pac-Man and ghosts as the ones Tom & Jerry have.
The world's most-known game, Pac-Man, is released as a Google Doodle to celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the game's initial release. You can even see the Google logo implemented in the maze on the first level. How cool is that? Googleâs special version of the game brought better graphics and HUD, as well as easy access via browser.
While Pacman's fame is undeniable, there was a clear need for an ultimate guide that covered everything you needed to know about this iconic character. Keep reading this post to learn how to play, explore fun facts and world records, and find answers to frequently asked questions about the game itself and the Google Doodle version.
Â
Â
Â
Pac-Man is super famous that it has dozens of World Records recognized by Guinness. The game itself acquired 11 Guinness certificates. However, the game opened the way for other records for fans worldwide, such as the highest score or fastest completion. Learn about them below.
Pac-Man Google Doodle is a re-make of the retro arcade game Pac-Man to celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the game's initial release in May 1980.
As of 2024, Google Pac-Man is14 years oldwhileÂ the original Pac-Man is 44 years old.
Google released the game in May 2010 in 30th anniversary of the original game.
Pacman's 30th Anniversary Doodle was made byGoogle. The original Pacman game was created byToru Iwataniin 1979.
As in original Pacman, there are256 levelsin Pac-Man Doodle, with increasing difficulty.
A level in Pac-Man ends if a ghost catches the character. Then, the player should start over from the beginning. However,no player could reach the end of the final level, known as Map 256.
Level 256 is the final andhardest levelof the game. The map is also known as the split-screen level because, in this stage, the screen splits into two parts. While the left side stays as usual, the right side is filled with random numbers, letters and symbols.
In this map, the player needs to collect 244 Pac-dots to beat the level. However, as the right side is filled with a mess of symbols and lacks Pac-dots, it is impossible to reach 244 dots.
The most points earned in this kill level is 155,875, which was scored by Marc Cohen on the PS4.
When a player finishes a level, a bonus fruit appears in the screen's bottom right corner. After the 8th level, each time you pass a level, the last icon in the bottom right corner changes to show you which map the player is on.
Retro arcade machines could only remember a small amount of information, like a single byte. This meant they could only count up to 255. Each level in the game is given a number from 1 to 255.
When you reach Level 256, the game tries to use the number 0. In this case, thegame ends up trying to show all 255 fruits from the previous levels on the screen, leading to a glitch on the right side of the game.
You can bust ghosts with a friend on the co-op mode of Pac-Man. OpenPacman 2 Playerabove andclick the "Insert Coin" button twice. Then, Mrs. Pac-Man also appears on the screen. You can control Pacman with arrow keys and Mrs. Pacman with WASD keys.Â Â
Pac-Man is not just a game; it's a cultural milestone, a soundtrack, a fashion statement, and a lesson in strategy that extends the pixels on the screen. If you want to explorearcade gamesfurther, our platform provides you with tons of free online games. Discover, play and have fun for free, just a click away!

title: Fleeing the Complex
description:
Henry Stickmin: Fleeing the Complexis a funny adventure story game packed with action, humor, and loads of unexpected twists. Itâs the fifth game in the Henry Stickmin series and continues right afterInfiltrating the Airship. This time, things get more intense as Henry wakes up inside The Wall (no, not the one on Game of Thrones, but similar concepts)Â  Itâs a cold, high-security prison set in the snowy mountains of Canada. This place isn't just any prison. It's where the worldâs most dangerous criminals are locked away, and guess what? Henry's just joined them. Honestly, what did he expect? After breaking into a bank, escaping from prison, and stealing a priceless Tunisian diamond, he wasnât exactly headed for a beach vacation. A cold, heavily-guarded prison complex? Yeahâ¦ that sounds about right. But itâs Henry. He cannot wait, hands tied. He must find a way to flee from the complex. And thatâs where you start to guide him and determine his fate with your choices. Letâs take a look at how this fifth game starts:Â
The warden, Dmitri J. Petrov, sees Henry as a serious threat in the complex. So he and his right-hand man Grigori toss him into a transfer cell. Thatâs when the fun begins. With nothing to lose, Henry must figure out how to escape. You, the player, get to make every key decision. Will Henry tackle guards, play dead, call in some big favors, or maybe team up with fellow inmate Ellie Rose? Every choice you make could lead to success... or complete failure (with funny results).
Mouse click to choose actions and make decisions
Fleeing the Complex was created by PuffballsUnited, the same developer behind the entire Henry Stickmin series. The game later became part of The Henry Stickmin Collection on PC and consoles, but you can still play this version free online on your browser without flash plugins!
If you want to experience the full Henry Stickmin saga, hereâs the official game order. Each game builds on the last, with returning characters, fun callbacks, and evolving storylines based on your choices.
All of these were later combined in The Henry Stickmin Collection for PC, which includes a final sixth game, Completing the Mission, only available in the paid collection. It ties together all your previous choices into one big, action-packed finale. But if you're just looking to play the classic flash games for free, you're in luck! The first five Henry Stickmin games are available to play online for free right here on OnlineGames.io. No download, no cost, just pure chaotic fun. Whether you're here for the crazy escape plans, the funny animations, or just want to see all the ways things can go wrong, Fleeing the Complex is one of the best online games to play for free. Try every path and see if you can help Henry pull off the perfect escape!

title: Spend Elon Musk Money
description:
If Elon Musk had a dollar for every time he made a - oh wait! He already has! Elon Musk started SpaceX at the age of 30, established Tesla at 45, and acquired Twitter at 51. He has been an angel investor for many other companies, making him the world's richest man with a net worth of over 241 billion $ as of 2024. His money is astronomical, just like his hobbies.
The stock market is Elon's playground. Banks call him when they need a loan. He is so rich that he can fill up his swimming pool, and ta-da!- he just redirects a river! Elon is quite the character; he loses keys while watching TV, checks under his cushions, and finds start-up companies. At some point in the future, we may see a picture of him, sitting on a Mars rover, sipping his latte, tweeting about memes while colonizing new planets.
But what if you woke up one day and all of his fortune passed to your bank account? You have a full day to spend billions of dollars. Which of your dreams would come true? What are the first things you want to buy? A yacht parked in St. Tropez? Luxury Penthouse in Manhattan with a breathtaking Central Park view? Maybe you would even buy an island or a whole country. Or perhaps you'd be interested in charities, helping homeless people and stopping hunger all around the world? It's all in your hands.Â Â
Let's get you seated on a billionaire's chair. But get ready; this is not winning the lottery. If you tried to line up all the money, we are not sure how many kilometers of road out of Benjamin Franklins you would have. Experiment with all the money you have in this virtual setting!
The clock is ticking on the top of your screen. Start the timer before shopping. If you are wondering how long it would take to spend Elon Musk money, start with the most luxurious items. Try to empty out the figures on the top. When it hits 0, go back to the timer to see the answer to your question. The faster you click, the quicker you spend.
You tried very hard but couldn't spend out all the money? We understand the exhaustion. Spending Elon Musk money is not a walk in the park. Anyway, if you'd like to stop your journey where your energy is consumed before the money is, do not forget to take a receipt! You may want to use it to deduct taxes later, huh? Click on the print receipt button at the end of the page and see the bill. Share it with your friends and compare your carts; it might reveal some of your key characteristics along the way!
Spend Elon Musk MoneyÂ is not only a fun shopping game but also about seizing the wealth of 0.001% of the world's population. Remember to have fun and laugh on this journey and share it with your loved ones!

title: Tribals io
description:
Tribals iois a multiplayer survival game where you wake up on an island as a caveman. You have nothing in your pockets but a stone. Explore the island to gather essential resources to use for your benefit. Gather all the effective materials to create something more significant and valuable. Thiscrafting game will remind you of the famous video games Minecraft, Rust,Â and Raft! Enhance your gaming experience by teaming up with other players.ð¨
You will come across many threats on the island. You have to protect yourself from them. These threats may be a bear or another caveman. Cold weather also has a severe negative impact. There are profound temperature differences between day and night here. Craft weapons and tools to protect yourself in any kind of adverse situation. Build a shack to take shelter. Let's see how many days you can survive on this island!
Suppose you have collected the necessary resources and time to craft tools. When you press the Tab key, two sections will appear. The left window is your inventory. You will see your resources here. The other window is the crafting menu. There are Beginning, Weapons, Structure, and Workbench categories, along with the Favorite and All. View your options by clicking on a category. Click on the item you want to craft, and it will show you what resources are necessary to craft it.
The weather conditions on the island are very inconsistent. It can be sunny at the moment and rainy the next. When it is rainy, your caveman can get sick. In addition, he will need some good sleep at night. So, building a shelter is a must in this crafting game. But to do that, the first thing you need to do is craft a building plan. Don't worry, it is not a hard job. Picking up a leaf is enough to create it.
Tribals io was developed by ONRUSH Studio.
If you like playing Tribals io, you may also tryEvoWorld io FlyOrDie. You are born as a tiny fly in the game. Your job is to evolve by eating things with green frames. There are also animals with red frames that are not your friends! Avoid their attacks to survive.

title: Sprunked
description:
Say hello toSprunked, also calledSprunkin Sprunked 2.0. It is a brand new remix of the belovedmusic gamethat puts you in the DJ chair with a twist. Just like before, you have seven awesome polo Sprunks to style and mix, but now the costumes are flashier, the music loops are smoother, and there are seven extra characters to spice things up! And the horror mode? Letâs just say youâll have to see it to believe it.
So you'll be able to create funky musical combos and discover new beats. And don't worry if youâre brand-new to the Sprunk universe, Sprunked always welcomes you. If youâre the kind of player who loves a colorful challenge, this online game will keep your creativity flowing. If you're into eeire music, horror themes, and getting chilled, Sprunbked will also grab your attention. Let's start!
On the bottom right corner of your screen thereâs a black button. If you hit that switch, youâll enter Horror Mode, a spooky version of the game where the atmosphere, visuals, and sounds take a haunting turn. Younger players might find it a bit scary, so use it with caution. But if youâre into thrill and chills, itâs a perfect way to add an extra jolt of excitement to your track.
Controls
Use your mouse or trackpad to drag outfits or accessories, then drop them onto your chosen Sprunk. Click on the sprunk the remove the costume.
When you start, youâll see seven polo Sprunks (without costumes) , each tied to a specific sound set. The twist is that every costume or outfit changes your Sprunkâs unique loop. It can addBeats,Effects,Melodies, orVocals. Hereâs the scoop on the categories:
Alongside these main Sprunks, you can deck them out with seven bonus costumes:Draker,Woboloy Bop,bomb,mard,bren,toasted rainbow sandwich, andsmol. Each offering its own special sound. Our favorite is Woboloy Bop rapping
Sprunked(Sprunkin Sprunked 2.0) is the brainchild ofDraker, who took the original Sprunki concept and powered it up with extra polish and an expanded roster. Drakerâs love for music and creative expression shines through in every note and animation.
If youâre looking for more ways to play and explore music-making, try out the originalSprunki, which started the cute and spooky journey. You could also give fan-made Incredibox mods likeSprunki Warm Like Firea whirl if you enjoy music mixing. And if you want a 3D game but don't wanna leave Sprunks behind, playObby: Find Sprunki. It's a mix of Roblox's obstacle challenges where you're on a mission to find hidden sprunks.
Ready to test your creativity?Sprunked(Sprunkin Sprunked 2.0) and other music games offers fun tunes, scary twists, and a heap of fun. Dive in, drag those outfits, and become the DJ youâve always dreamed of. Just watch out for that spooky black button!

title: Super Car Driving
description:
Super Car Drivingis an online car game where you get to drive super-performing high-end models like Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche and more.

Adrenaline seekers can enjoy completing stunt challenges while skill gamers maneuver their supercars in the lots of parking levels. title: Only Up Obby
description:
Only Up Obbyis a parkour game that is playable on your browser. The goal is not just surviving the whims of the Roblox-like universe but also outmaneuvering other players. You can guide your character on various obby paths (obstacle courses)Â  such as parkour, colorful floor, glass bridge and others. Each mode brings a mix of fun and daring challenges! Don't look down!
Desktop:
Smartphone:
You'll begin in the town's square. Each building represents a mini game. Enter a door you like and start guiding your blocky avatar on his adventures up in sky. Use WASD keys to move and space to jump. Finish the race at first and collect coins. You have several mini game options with unique mechanics.
Imagine you're an acrobat and you're not just navigating; you're dancing with danger, a ballet of near misses and triumphant leaps. Sounds like a recipe for both frustration and exhilaration. Colorful levels where you go only up might be the game you're looking for when you're away from your Roblox-installed phone.
Begin the race with 29 other players in front of colorful tiles. Your goal is to step on tiles whose color is displayed at the top of the screen. As soon as the color changes, you must find another tile matching the color on the top. Otherwise, you're out of the game. Winning the race is not just finding a tile to step on but moving forward to finish the course. This mode turns the game into a visual disco where the floor is indeed lava, but only if it's the wrong color. It's like playing musical chairs, but if the music was colors, and the chairs were colorful tiles.
Here's where your existential dread meets probability. In Glass Bridge mode you need to choose which glass tile to jump on, but one will break, and the other will remain. You're not just playing; you're living out a scene from "Squid Game". Choose wisely, or face the humiliation of falling into the void of your own misjudgment.
Falling Plates mode of Only Up Obby is an unlockable mini-game where you have to run to the finish course on a platform up in the sky. Here is the twist: the plates you've already run on will fall down and disappear after a second. So, be careful. Each step is a commitment, a testament to your belief in your timing. It's less about physical prowess and more about your inner clock.
You must evolve into some sort of block-dodging ninja because it's raining blocks! The universe is testing you, not just with static challenges but with dynamic chaos. Finish the course without getting crushed by a block!
If you're enjoying parkour challenges, you might also likeLOLBeans.io! You'll chuckle at how bizarre the beans look while trying to dodge obstacles in Wipe Out themed whimsical tracks!
short_description: Play Only Up Obby, a Roblox like parkour game that is free to play online!

title: WarStrike
description:
In the ocean of shoot-'em-all games, finding an online shooter that meets your console gamer expectations can feel impossible. After playing legends like Counter-Strike or Far Cry, other online FPS games may seem bland, lacking an immersive story. But believe it or not,WarStrikewill give you the taste of playing Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, all from the comfort of your browser.
WarStrike's campaign mode takes you deep into a critical mission as an elite MI-6 Special Soldier. You'll complete duties across 24 chapters, unraveling a story of global threats, deadly viruses, and seeking justice. Each chapter unfolds like a blockbuster action movie with its cleverly designed scenario and diverse missions.
Not ready for a long-term commitment to another shooter game? Try quick multiplayer battles; they'll give you some clues about how epicWarStrikeis. So either way, you've got a game that delivers on all fronts. Have fun striking!
Ââ  Mature Content AdvisoryThis game contains themes that may not be suitable for all players, including intense action, violence, or strong language. Please proceed with discretion. If you're looking for family-friendly games, check out otherfree gameson our site.
In campaign mode, you play as an elite MI-6 tasked with stopping a global catastrophe. The year is 2012, and your mission is to capture TAL BRODY, an international terrorist responsible for countless attacks. His latest threat is a deadly virus capable of killing instantly or turning survivors into zombies. The stakes couldn't be higher. Clear zones, place bombs, complete sniper duties, and do whatever it takes to take down the ultimate enemy, Tal Brody. Each mission is crafted to challenge you with different skills. But, as you level up, you will improve your soldier's skills, and unlock weapons and parts for more intense battles.
Opt for Multiplayer Mode and pick from maps like Dockyard, Pool Party, Farm House, Crash Site, or Overpass. Team up with friends and score over 20 kills before your opponents. Collaborate with teammates, strategize, and dominate the competition in team deathmatches.
You can earn cash and gold in both campaign and multiplayer modes to unlock and upgrade an arsenal of weapons, including the Sniper PXed, UMP, and HMG. You can improve your gear with parts like scopes, silencers, and grips, or change the weapon's aesthetic with skins.

title: Papa's Sushiria
description:
Ever accidentally broke something... and somehow ended up running a whole restaurant because of it? That's exactly what happens inPapa's Sushiria. One minute you're visiting the newest sushi place in town, and the next. BAM! You're rolling rice, slicing tuna, and shaking up bubble teas like a pro.
Now it's on you to keep the sushi bar running smoothly. Take customer orders, cook everything just right, and don't forget the boba drinks. Whether you're into California rolls or loaded spicy combos, you'll get to build them all. It's fast, it's fun, and yeah, it gets a little chaotic, just like real food service.
Running Papa's Sushiria might sound overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's super satisfying. Everything starts when a customer walks in and places their order. You'll need to pay close attention to what they wantâevery little detail counts, from the type of rice to the fillings, sauces, and even their bubble tea preferences.
Once you've got the order down, it's time to cook the rice. This part is all about timing. You scoop the right amount, start the cooker, and wait for it to finish. Don't leave it too long or it'll burn. While it cooks, you can get things ready for the next steps.
Next comes the fun part: building the sushi roll. Lay out the seaweed, spread the rice, stack the fillings in the right order, then roll it up just right. It might take a couple tries to get perfect, but it feels great when you nail it. After rolling, you'll slice the sushi evenly and add any toppings or sauces the customer asked for. Presentation really matters here.
Then it's off to the drink station. Most customers want a bubble tea to go with their food, so you'll need to pick the correct tea, the flavor, and how much ice and boba to add. It's a mini-game on its own and a fun way to break things up.
Once everything's ready, hand the order over and see how you did. The customer will rate you based on accuracy, timing, and how neat everything looks. High scores mean bigger tips, which you can use for upgrades, new furniture, or snazzy uniforms. As you level up, more ingredients and customers unlock, making each day a little more excitingâand a little more hectic!
Papa's Sushiria was created by Flipline Studios, known for their entire lineup of fun restaurant and time management games.
Love the satisfying rhythm of cooking and serving? You'll probably enjoy other Papa's titles likePapa's BurgeriaandPapa's Pancakeria. All of these are browser-based, fun, and free to play online on OnlineGames.io!

description:
A pixelated street fight begins!Gangstersis a two-player online game where two tiny gangs shuffle, leap, and blast each other with whatever falls from the sky. With only two buttons per player, it feels silly at first. But one round is all it takes to spark best-friend rivalries and endless rematches. Grab a crate, steady those shaky arms, and see who can fill the scoreboard first.
Pick a mode on the title screen:P1 vs CPUfor solo practice orP1 vs P2to battle a friend on the same keyboard. Each side begins with three blocky fighters lined up shoulder-to-shoulder.
Press thejump keyonce, and the whole trio hops together, tilting left or right depending on their balance. They slide a short distance every time, so gentle taps work better than holding the key.
Hold theshoot keyto lift every arm at the same time. Release to fire; bullets travel in the direction the arms point when you let go. Because the gang sways, time your release for straight shots.
Wooden boxes drift down on parachutes throughout each round. Touch a box to break it and auto-equip its surprise: pistols, machine guns, chainsaws, swords, or the crowd-favorite bazooka.
Early stages are flat city streets, but later maps add lava floors, rock piles, or tall water walls that block bullets. Falling into lava or water traps knocks a character out instantly, so jumping at the wrong moment can cost a round, even without gunfire.
When all three rivals drop, you score one point, and teams reset for the next skirmish. The scoreboard sits above each crew first to fill it (default is five points) and wins the match.
In P1 vs CPU, hold jump without shooting to see how far your gang moves. Then, test arm-raising speed. Short taps send quick sprays; long holds can arc shots downward for tricky angles. Switch maps every couple of rounds for new hazards. Play best-of-three sets with different house rules: melee-only, no jumping, or first player to grab a bazooka wins.
The whole loop jumps, grabs, shoots, and repeats takes seconds to learn but takes a long time to master. Because both gangs share the same two-button scheme, everyone plays on equal footing, and silliness stays high from the first crate drop to the final rocket splash.
Gangsters was created by Shared Dreams, the team behind several other two-player games hosted right here onOnlineGames.io.
short_description: Play Gangsters, a chaotic pixel shooting game where you control a gang with just two buttons!

title: Mega Soccer
description:
Mega Socceris a small-squad online soccer game. You take three players: a keeper, a defender and a striker. Take them onto compact pitches and try to out-score the other side before the clock runs out. Matches feel lively because each team member has his own speed, power and technique ratings, and rarer characters come with tricks such as rainbow flicks or bicycle kicks. Stadium, weather, kit colours and even the match ball are all changeable in the main menu, so you can customize your soccer game fully.
PC
Mobile / Tablet
Your squad is three strong: a keeper, a utility midfielder, and a striker. In the Players / Kits menu each athlete shows Speed, Power, and Technic bars plus a level. Spend pink gems to bump stats or unlock rarer card tiers. Outstanding kits come with flashy rainbow flicks, while Legendary kits add a blistering Power Shot.
You can collect gems by completing achievements (like â50 Dribblesâ) and end-match rewards, so every bicycle kick you land inches you toward the next upgrade.
Before kick-off, customise the vibe. Slide over to Stadiums / Balls / Weather:
Matches themselves are simple: win the sprint for possession, weave around markers, and steer the shot past diving keepers before the 60-second timer up top hits zero. Each goal nets coins, and consecutive wins rack up an XP bar under your player name for even more goodies.
Mega Soccer is built by FreezeNova Games. They specialise in fast, kid-friendly sports titles that fit neatly inside your browser.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description:
Tic Tac Toeis a 2D board game with a 2-player option. To win, the player must consecutively leave 3 marks with X or O letters on a 3x3 grid. The letters can be placed side by side, diagonally, or vertically. Play this old but gold game with a friend or against the AI. The choice is yours!
In this game, players take turns putting their chosen symbol, X or O, on any empty grid space. The main goal? BeÂ­ the first to line up threeÂ­ of your symbols, up, down, or diagonal. That's how you win!
If you want to win a game against an AI or a friend, you have to use a way of thinking. This includes the steps to success. Planning to get three X's in a row is an important part of the game. It's also important to prevent an AI or a friend from hitting three O's in a row. Once you've put X in a square, it's time to plan ahead and figure out the best location for your next X.
If you are interested inboard games, you can also try the games given below. Stay tuned for more new board games!Ludo Herois a strategic board game for two or four players. You can play Ludo Hero with online players worldwide or with a Bot for fun.
short_description: Tic Tac Toe is a web browser version of the traditional board game. Win the game by making intelligent moves vertically, diagonally, or horizontally!

Craftnite brings the best of both worlds: Minecraft's blocky, creative freedom with Fortnite's survival and combat action. If you love strategy, crafting, and fighting, this is the game for you. If you like the style of Craftnite, you might enjoy other blocky battle games likeKrunker.io. It also delivers fun multiplayer battles on maps like CraftNite.
Currently, Craftnite is available as a browser game on desktops and laptops. A mobile version is not yet available, but you can play it on devices like Chromebooks.
To win in Craftnite, you need to be the last player standing. Gather weapons and outlast the other players in the battle royale-style game. You can check the leadeboard and kill counts on the topright corner of your screen.
Yes, Craftnite is completely free to play in your browser, no downloads required.
October 2019

title: Five Nights At Freddy's 4
description:
Prepare yourself for the most terrifying chapter in theFive Nights at Freddy'sseries!FNaF 4takes the series from the familiar security office to the unsettling confines of a child's bedroom, where nightmarish animatronics lurk in the shadows. It's intimate, it's personal, and it's terrifying because the monsters are now in your own home.
The gameplay mechanics have evolved. With no cameras or power systems to rely on, survival comes down to your instincts. You're now listening for the breathing of nightmarish creatures. And I believe this mechanic takes FNAF 4 beyond looking around. The game is not just about looking anymore; it's about listening, which adds a whole new layer of panic. Every creak and breath could signal danger. You may find yourself asking, "Did I hear that, or was it just the house settling? Oh, it's just my last shred of sanity leaving the room."
So, it's a game where the only thing between you and a horrifying jumpscare is your ability to react quickly. Can you survive the five nights of nightmares, or will the darkness claim you?
FNAF 4 was created by Scott Cawthon.
Want more spine-tingling horror? Explore other horror games from the FNAF franchise on OnlineGames.io and keep the fright alive!
Opinions about FNAF 4 are as varied as the game's jumpscares. Some fans adore the new atmosphere and the shift in gameplay, while others miss the old security camera mechanic. Especially fans who rely on rigid, muscle-memory tacticsâconstantly checking vents, using flashlights music boxes, and masksâmay find themselves disoriented in FNAF 4, as these familiar tools are stripped away. It's because the lack of tools is forcing them to adapt to a new kind of horror where the player is more vulnerable.
However, I believe this vulnerability is exactly what Scott Cawthon aimed to createâan experience where players feel exposed and isolated in ways the previous games never had. Whether you love it for its intensity or critique it for its simplicity, it undeniably left an impact, much like a well-timed jump scare at 2 AM.
So, in the grand scheme of things, years from now, we might still remember FNAF 4 as the game that made us check under our beds... just to be sure, guys... just to be sure...

title: Watermelon Game
description:
Ever stumble upon a game so simple yet so addictive that it sneaks into your day every chance it gets? That's exactly how I felt when I discovered theWatermelon Gameor (popularly known asSuika, meaning Watermelon in Japanese). It started innocently enough, just a quick try to see what it was all about. And suddenly, I was a full-blownfruit-mergingstrategist, plotting the perfect spot for every blueberry, dreaming of the glorious watermelon that awaited at the end.
If you've never played it, here's the premise: you start with tiny blueberries that, when paired, merge into strawberries. Keep merging to create bigger and juicier fruits like peaches, plums, and lemons all the way up to the ultimate prize: a giant juicy watermelon. But beware! Let the bowl overflow, and it's game over.
Yes, weâre stacking fruits (but not in the fridge after a big grocery haul, before our next big diet. Cuz that's no fun ð) And please, pleaseturn the volume onwhile playing. There's somethingoddly satisfyingabout the sound effects as fruits merge. That little "pop" when two fruits become one is the perfect blend ofASMR and accomplishment. And then there's the strategy: you can't just toss fruits in willy-nilly. You have to plan ahead, keeping space for future merges and positioning fruits to trigger chain reactions.
The game's beauty lies in its simplicity. There are no time limits, no power-ups, just pure, unfiltered fruit-merging joy. It's the kind of game you can play while waiting for your coffee to brew, (or for hours on a lazy Sunday afternoon without realizing where the time went (guilty!).
I'll admit, I wasn't very good at first. My bowl kept filling up with mismatched fruits, and I never got past the coconut stage. But then I learned a crucial tip: keep your bigger fruits in the center of the bowl. It sounds simple, but it changed everything. Suddenly, I was creating chain reactions like a pro, watching oranges turn into coconuts, coconuts into pineapples, and finally... finally.. a honeydew melon appeared. The moment I unlocked the watermelon for the first time felt like I'd won a marathon, haha! What a pride, huh? ð«
Oh, and there was this one time I thought I'd be clever and stack all my fruits on one side to create room. Bad idea. The bowl almost tilted (ofc metaphorically) and it was a mess. Lesson learned: symmetry is your best friend in this online watermelon game.
Watermelon Game (or Suika Watermelon Game) is a fun exercise in strategy and patience wrapped up in cheerful colors and satisfying gameplay. Whether you're looking to kill a few minutes or dive into a full-on merging marathon, this game is sure to deliver. And it's surprising how effortlessly it appeals to players of all ages, from kids to seniors. It's rare to find a game that truly feels universal, but this one nails it. So, you can play the game with your kid, siblings, parents and even grandparents, and share fruit merge strategies. Or perhaps you may bicker over questionable moves that threaten to overflow the bowl. Anyway, Suika Watermelon is a freemerge gamethat sparks fun and conversation, no matter your age.
And hey, if you've managed to get to the watermelon stage, let me know in the comments below! I'm always looking for new strategies to master the art of fruit merging. ððð
short_description: Stack fruits, strategize, and have fun with Watermelon Game! A colorful merging puzzle perfect for all agesâplay for free now!

title: Monopoly
description:
Think of a game where you can bankrupt your family with real estate and still claim it was all in good fun. Yes, itâsMonopoly, the classic board game of real estate, which has been a beloved pastime for generations. It's been a game where friendships are tested, loans are leveraged, bankruptcies are celebrated, and life lessons are taken.
Monopoly was originally created in the early 20th century as "The Landlord's Game" by Elizabeth Magie. Her goal was to illustrate the economic theories of Henry George. But Monopoly outperformed this mission and became a classic along the way. The transition from physical board to online platforms has opened up a universe of possibilities. For once, you'll deal with a banker who's genuinely honest (computers really don't cheat, promise!). Now, Monopoly is accessible anytime, anywhere, with anyone.
In this guide, we'll explore everything you need to know about playingMonopoly Online, from the basic rules to expert strategies.
Monopoly has been the king of board games since it was first introduced in the 1930s. The objective is simple:buy properties, collect rent, and bankrupt your opponents. But Monopoly online brings a new layer of fun and convenience. Whether you're playing with family, friends, or strangers from around the globe, the online version cuts out the hassle of shuffling cards, moving pieces and managing paper banknotes. It also eliminates rule squabbles and, best of all, requires no physical board. Online Monopoly runs in real-time, and everything is automated, so you can focus on your strategy more. Plus, the online format opens the door to exciting new features, from virtual board animations to special rule variations.
If you're new to online Monopoly, here's a quick guide to get you started:

Online Monopoly continues to be popular because it combines the classic strategy of the original board game with the convenience of digital play. It's easy to access, and offers endless hours of fun for people of all ages.

title: Squid Shooter
description:
If youâre a fan of the popular Netflix series Squid Game, thenSquid Shooteron OnlineGames.io will feel like youâve stepped right into that high-stakes world, but with a twist! This free online game uses the showâs iconic green tracksuits, pink-suited guards, and menacing giant dolls as your enemies. Except now, youâre heavily armed! Instead of playing childrenâs games with deadly twists, youâll be in a frantic shooter, blasting away waves of enemies in a playground arena. Itâs funny, a bit wild, but an awesome way to reimagine the showâs shocking moments in a more lighthearted style of video games.
So don't wait, trade kidsâ games for guns and grenades in this wild browser shooter. Colorful cartoon style, extremely fast pace rounds, and loads of weapons... Gather your courage, lock and load, and see if you can blast through the entire Squid army in thisfree online game!
You begin in a sandy playground setting, much like the memorableRed Light, Green Lightarena from the show, but youâre armed to the teeth this time!
Hordes of green-uniformed participants shuffle toward you, and pink-hooded guards step in to lend them support. Donât forget the giant dolls, reminiscent of the enormous figure from the first episode. Your mission is to stay alive. Dodge side to side and jump over obstacles to avoid lumps of enemies. Shoot your foes before they overwhelm you, and dodge anything they throw your way like cash grenades and coffin crates that explode on impact.
Run and jump around to avoid getting cornered, and switch your weapons with the mouse wheel or number keys for a perfect shot. Your arsenal includes everything from pistols and SMGs to full-blown bazookas! Lobbing a grenade (G) into a group of green suits can clear a path fast. When you spot a giant doll, use a bazooka or grenade launcher for maximum damage. They can soak up a lot of bullets!
The game escalates in difficulty as you progress, with waves growing more intense, so keep your aim steady and your reflexes sharp.
GoGoMan cleverly mixes references from Squid Game with over-the-top shooter mechanics. Thereâs no official tie to the Netflix show, but the spirit of high-stakes survival is definitely here. If you like comedic shooters that tip their hat to popular TV series, youâll appreciate the playful spin GoGoMan created. If you'd like to play more games by them, you can tryFunny Shooter!
I tried Squid Shooter after binge-watching the entire Squid Game series, and it felt oddly satisfying to finally fight back against those spooky giant dolls! Charging through an army of teal tracksuits while wielding a bazooka made me laugh out loud. Some might consider this brainrot, but in my opinion, itâs a prety neat combination of funny style, action, and a splash of pop culture references. Perfect for those times you want to let off steam and imagine youâre flipping the script on the showâs challenges.
short_description: Play Squid Shooter, a free online game inspired by Squid Game! Fight green-suited players, pink guards, and giant dolls using 18 powerful weapons.

title: Nuts and Bolts Puzzle
description:
Ever gotten lost in a maze of planks and screws when trying to build an IKEA shelf? Well,Nuts and Bolts Puzzleis like the opposite of that! Instead of frantically trying to assemble stuff, youâre gleefully taking everything apart and the best part is: no confusing instructions required. In thisfun online gameon OnlineGames.io, youâll see a board jampacked with wooden planks, each secured by bolts. Your mission is to unscrew every single bolt and move them around so all the planks come tumbling down. And there's also a race against the clock with silly and fast puzzle action. If youâve ever secretly wished you could just toss that unreadable furniture manual out the window, then Nuts and Bolts Puzzle is your chance to feel like a master builder. Take everything apart and have a blast doing it!
Point-and-click (or tap) to screw or unscrew
When you open Nuts and Bolts Puzzle, youâll notice several wooden planks secured with bolts. The goal is simple: remove and relocate these bolts so that every plank eventually falls off the board. You have to be mindful of time, space, and the chain reactions you create.
Before making your first move, take a moment to see which bolts are essential for holding the planks. Removing the âwrongâ bolt early can cause a plank to drop in a way that blocks a crucial hole. A quick scan of the situation can prevent last-minute scrambles.
Each bolt you unscrew must go somewhere else. If you fill up the easy-to-reach holes right away, you might trap yourself later, especially when other planks fall and block certain spots. Try planning out two or three moves ahead. This small effort in thinking can make a huge difference.
The clock adds an exciting rush to your moves. You canât spend forever planning. If you realize youâre about to run out of seconds, make a decisive bolt switch to keep progressing. Sometimes itâs better to make a quick move rather than none at all.
You might notice special tools at the bottom of your screen, like an extra hole generator or a handy timer freeze. These are your lifelines when things get messy. If a plank gets in the way, or youâre seconds away from a time-out, thatâs when you pull out these game-changers.
Sometimes, the best strategy is to remove a bolt that supports multiple planks at once. If you time it right, you can knock out several panels in one go. Just be sure you donât block a bolt behind the fallen wood!
Give Nuts and Bolts Puzzle a try today and see if you can conquer the planks before the clock says âtimeâs upâ! Enjoy this free online game on OnlineGames.io and experience the satisfying gameplay of clever bolt placement and top-notch puzzle-solving fun.
short_description: Unscrew, take apart wooden planks, move bolts, and solve tricky puzzles in Nuts and Bolts Puzzle!

title: Flappy Bird
description:
Can't get enough of classic, nerve-wracking arcade games? Dive into the pixelated chaos ofFlappy Bird, the legendary tap-to-fly game as addictive as ever!

On mobile: tap the screen;

Try to earn as many points as possible, and you will be rewarded:
ð¥Bronze: You receive this medal after you gain more than 10 points.
ð¥Silver: Things are heating up! Reach20+ pointsto claim this shiny reward.
ð¥Gold: You're making progress! Earn 30+ points and take this medal because you deserve it.
ð¿Platinum:The ultimate achievement! You earned 40+ points and a platinum medal. Go ahead, brag a little.
Choose your bird's color from blue, red, yellow, or grayscale. Toggle between day mode, night mode, or both for a dynamic sky setting.
Flappy Birdwas initially developed by Dong Nguyen, a Vietnamese game developer, and became a global hit after its 2013 release on the App Store and Google Play. Despite its popularity, Nguyen removed the game in 2014, expressing concern over how addictive it had become for players.
This version was faithfully recreated by Hyperpixel (2015), letting you relive the challenge on a desktop!

title: Love Tester Story
description:
Horoscopes, tarot cards, crystal balls, or dream readingsâhumans have been curious about the unknown since the dawn of time. We have developed endless methods just to glimpse the future and act accordingly. From interpreting patterns in tea leaves, coffee grounds, or wine sediments, cultures have found various ways to predict future events.
However, as we immerse ourselves in the digital world of the 21st century, we replace old-school fortune-telling methods with new ones. Inevitably, love testers also evolve beyond the traditional games like Loves Me, Loves Me Not!Love Tester Storyoffers a fun and interactive experience that lets youtest your crush's feelings. No more picking leaves from daisies, no more complex tarot readings, or endless astrology interpretations. Just enter your name inLove Tester Storyand get love compatibility results in percentage.
But that's not all! Love Tester Story features a unique story mode where you can reveal the story of high school girl Grace by making decisions on her behalf. If you're intrigued, keep reading to learn more about Love Tester Story.
The story mode is the most romantic of all. You'll step into the shoes of high school girl Grace andmake decisions about her love life. You'll learn valuable life lessons about love, friendship, and courage.Your choices matter!Enter the mode, choose your path, andreveal one of the multiple endings of this love story. Mix and match your decisions toexplore all the endings.
In this mode, you'll be given a random name and try tofind a perfect match for that name based on your instincts. Who would date whom? If you trust your matchmaking skills, try this mode, and you'll have a hard time stopping giggling.
The third game mode is the original love tester with improved accuracy.Enter your name and your crush's name, press the big heart on the screen, and retrieve the results in seconds.If you'd like to stir things up a bit, enter the names of the couples you know and reveal the secrets of their relationships.

A. I am Very Satisfied with Love Tester Results
Congratulations! Great to hear this! Would you like toplay a wedding gameand get everything down to a T in a virtual setting before the big day?
B. I Hate This App
We're sorry to hear that. We'll try our best to give you the results you're looking for. In the meantime, would you like to play anonline crash gameand blow off steam caused by the love tester results? Break a few cars, kick a dummy, or mess with stickman ragdolls. We bet you'll feel better afterward.

title: Soccer Random Pro

Punch your rival in the face or kick him, aiming for his legs. You can send bullets or use the Special Hit to hurt him tremendously. Don't forget to check your rival's and your health bars. Whoever's bar drops to zero first is defeated!

title: Organize It
description:
The place is a mess. You're hired as a professional organizer. Tidy up the place, throw out the garbage, arrange drawers and put items in the closets. Give your client's home a breath of fresh air by getting rid of the overwhelming clutter. Come on, get to work!Â
Organize Itis a 2Dpuzzlegame you can play on your browser on any smart device. In 5 unique levels, each taking place in a different room of the house, your job remains the same:organizing the place for a clean and tidy home. Learn how to play this game below.
The first duty is the wardrobe. Hang the clothes, put the shoes on shelves. Fold the sheets neatly andorganize the wardrobe up and over. Place the suitcases and purses where they belong. After all the work, the closet will much more spacious.
With lots of animals in this room, it is not surprising the place is a mess.Grab the furry friends and leave to designated spots. It is easy to guess which pet likes certain items for animal lovers. Cats and balls, birds and mirrors, hamsters and wheels get along, don't they? Give the furry friends a neat home.
Okay, we get it; girlies can be a little untidy while preparing for a big night. After all the rush of choosing a dress and doing your hair and make-up, toiletries might have scattered around a bit. But once you get in, it's all set.Arrange hair dryers, skincare products and lipsticks in boxes. Get the place ready for the next event.
Somebody had cooked here. The kitchen is one of the craziest levels of this game, as the number of items to place is the highest. Plates, knives, jars, and other utensils are dancing in the air. Throw the banana peels and other waste into the bin.Load the dishwasher and arrange the drawers. After you complete your work, you get the right to not let anyone in the kitchen, even for a glass of water!
This one is our favorite; the kids' room has a variety of toys around. Cars, dolls, balls, legos and paints are everywhere. It's challenging trying not to step on a lego piece in this room. But they will appreciate your efforts!
Use your mouse or touchscreen to drag items.

First released in August 2014, this challenging platformer pushes players to their limits, as its name implies - Vex is derived from vexation, meaning annoyance. Navigate through deadly environments filled with spikes, saw blades, smashing platforms, poles with ropes to hang on and slide and more as you race against the clock and aim for trophies and achievements. You can explore ten regular Vex acts (stages) and nine challenge acts where maze-like courses test your timing, precision, and problem-solving skills.

title: Fireboy and Watergirl 5: Elements
description:
Think of an indie game with endless replayabilityâa game that shaped a generation's childhood memories and taught millions the importance of teamwork. Yes, we're talking aboutFireboy and Watergirl.
Fireboy and Watergirl 5: Elementstakes the popular duo on a new adventure filled with puzzles that require teamwork. Throughout62 great levels, you'll learn valuable life lessons about teamwork (or simply discover how your partner reacts under pressure :D), while enjoying a fantastic game.
The levels are set intemples themed after different elements, and the game introduces a new set of obstacles and mechanics.
Players control both characters, using Fireboy's ability to pass through lava and Watergirl's power to move through water.
From levers and boxes to light sensors and crystal teleporters, each puzzle requires complex problem-solving skills and cooperation.
Computers
Mobiles
In the fifth game, developer Oslo Albet introduces us to the 7 great temples.
Fireboy and Watergril brings back my childhood memories of when me and my sister used to huddle together in front of our old, chunky desktop. Back then, we would spend hoursâsometimes giggling and other times bickeringâas we tackled every level we could find online.
On a deeper level, Fireboy and Watergirl is a game that beautifully illustrates the power of cooperation. We know that each of us has our own strengths and weaknesses, but when we combine a weakness with someone else's strength, we create a powerful synergy. It's a reminder that no mission is impossible when we work together.
To this day, Fireboy and Watergirl has captured the hearts of many and been the reason for falling in love with gaming. We're both proud and excited to introduce you to the fifth installment of the series, available for free on OnlineGames.io. We hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I and my sister enjoyed it years ago!
Fireboy and Watergirl 5: Elements was developed by Oslo Albet. This fifth game of the series was released in January 2019.

title: Granny 2
description:
Get ready for another scary adventure inGranny 2where the fear and suspense are amped up in a new, eerie location. You wake up in a dark, damp room in Grandpa's house, disoriented and with a headache. The house is filled with traps, mysterious items, and the constant threat of Granny and Grandpa. While Granny's hearing is as sharp as ever, Grandpa is a bit slower, but his eyesight is just as deadly. If he spots you, you better run fast!
The main door is locked with multiple locks, and you must explore the house to find clues and items that will help you escape. If you make a sound by dropping something or stepping on a creaky floorboard, Granny will come running. Be sure to hide under beds or in wardrobes, but remember, they can still spot you if you're not careful!
In addition to escaping the main door, there's another way out through the house's basement. A rusty boat lies waiting in the sewer, and if you can start it and unlock the gate, you might make your escape that way.
You can also protect yourself with weapons you find around the house. These can temporarily stop Granny and Grandpa, giving you a brief window to move forward, but don't rely on them too longâthey only buy you time.
You have five days to escape, but the longer you stay, the harder it gets. Each night, the house becomes more dangerous, and by the second night, you'll start limping. Can you escape before time runs out?
Granny 2 offers five difficulty levels: Extreme, Hard, Normal, Easy, and Practice.
This mode lets you explore without the danger of Granny and Grandpa, giving you a chance to plan your escape. But be warned, the house is never entirely safe, even in this mode.
In this mode, Granny and Grandpa are a little slower, making it easier to outrun them. You also don't have to worry about creaky floors, which means you can move around the house without triggering Granny's hearing. While this mode still offers a challenge, it's more forgiving than the others, giving you a bit more breathing room. Perfect if you want to enjoy the puzzle-solving without too much stress.
Normal mode is the baseline for Granny 2. Here, Granny and Grandpa move at their usual pace, making the game a true test of your stealth, strategy, and quick thinking. Creaking floors will be a constant threat, so every step matters. This mode is ideal for players looking for a balanced experience.
In Hard mode, Granny and Grandpa step up their game. They move faster, which means you'll need to be quick on your feet and think fast to avoid being caught. The added difficulty doesn't stop there, thoughâthere's an extra lock on the main door, making your escape even more challenging. If you're up for a real test of your survival instincts, this is the mode to choose.
Extreme mode is not for the faint-hearted. Granny and Grandpa move faster than you, and they'll relentlessly pursue you throughout the house. On top of that, there are two extra locks on the main door, adding even more pressure to your escape. This mode is designed for experienced players who thrive under intense pressure and want to push their nerves and survival skills to the limit.
If you love Granny 2 and want to keep testing your survival skills, check out more of ourfree horror games. Each game will push your wits and nerves to the limit, with new challenges to overcome. Let us know which one scares you the most in the comments!
short_description: Escape from Granny and Grandpaâs terrifying house in Granny 2. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and survive the pursuit of the creepy duo for five nights.

title: Moto X3M
description:
Gather up, adrenaline junkies! Wear your helmet tightly before this dangerous ride!Moto X3Mis a free online browser game where you ride your motorbike over tons of obstacles. The game is extremely fast-paced and requires quick reactions from the player. Loops, turns, crushing walls, and circular saws will come along your way. Most of the time, you will need to do back, and front flips to overcome the obstacles since you have limited time until you reach the target.
Perform your craziest ride, and you will be rewarded with between 1 and 3 stars at the end of each level. In order to get three leads, you must complete the stage at a minimum time period, which means initiating risky flips over and over. The more scary you ride, the higher the possibility of getting the finish before time clocks. But be careful. Some of the levels require slower speed and a more steady position. Also, if you fall on your head, you must start from the beginning or the closest checkpoint.
There are 22 tracks in total, which is a piece of cake at the beginning. Don't fall for it! The difficulty will escalate very rapidly. Maps and surroundings will change at every level for you to enjoy the view while riding.Â Â
Arrive at the destination as early as possible to get 3 stars in Moto X3M. To do that, you need to initiate stunts, back flips, and front flips when necessary.Â
When you face an obstacle, react quickly. The more you play, the more you will get used to tackling those. Remember to use the left and right arrow keys to set the flips to motion.
You can be a ninja, a skeleton with a fire on the head, a bunny girl with a pink bike, Santa Claus, Steve of Minecraft, or other wacky bikers with different styles. All you need to do is play more and earn more stars to buy brand-new bikes with new characters on them.Â
Moto X3M was created by MadPuffers.

title: Penalty Challenge

You scored the penalty, and now it's your turn to save the ball. You must prevent your opponent from scoring as much as possible. While taking the penalty kickout, carefully observe the player's movementsÂ and predict where the ball may go. Move the goalie's gloves in the direction of the ball to save it.

title: Truck Driver: Snowy Roads
description:
Buckle up for the ride of your life withTruck Driver: Snowy Roads- the coolest off-road trucking game where adventure meets epic strategy! You'll be driving some seriously rugged trucks through snow-covered trails, delivering goods, racing buddies, and soaking in the wintry vibes. With multiple game modes, awesome trucks, and non-stop fun, every second is an adventure!
Player 1:
Player 2:
Just chill and cruise through the snowy landscapes in free drive mode. Try out different trucks, find hidden paths, or just enjoy the view. Set the radio to listen to your favorite songs. It's the perfect way to practice or relax with a friend on a split-screen.
Ready for some action after chilling out? Take on 10 nail-biting delivery missions. Keep your cargo safe on those slippery roads - one wrong move, and it's game over! In missions, slow and steady wins the race. Keep your cargo safe by playing gently with those arrow keys. It's a chance to prove you're the best truck driver out there. The top mission is probably that frozen bridge delivery on level 8. Can you keep your load steady on those icy planks?
Get your adrenaline pumping with 10 icy tracks in racing mode. Race against AI or a friend in split-screen. Each track is a new challenge with twists and turns to keep you on your toes! The mountain circuit is where legends are made, with its steep drops, sharp bends, and killer views.
Rack up coins to unlock 12 unique off-road beasts. Each has its own vibe, power, and handling - find your perfect match! The riskier the mission, the more coins you get. So unlock all races and missions to get that dream truck in the garage. The best part is all trucks have a customizable radio. You can pick your song to vibe out while driving. title: Stunt Simulator Multiplayer
description:
Perform flyover with real players inStunt Simulator Multiplayer! It is a multiplayer stunt game where your aim is to make acrobatic flying across a map. There are many jumping ramps and hilly and grassy roads. Use them and perform the craziest flyovers to earn points. Unlock ten new cars with your money and experience the excitement of driving each one in this multiplayercar game.
Create a private room or join one of the available ones and take your place on one of the thrilling maps. All of them offer sky-high jumping platforms and rolling terrains. Press the gas pedal with all your strength and move forward at full speed.Â
Use one of the platforms or the terrains and fly with your car. While high, try to make flipovers and perform a variety of stunts. You will earn points in this way. Use them to unlock new kinds of compact vehicles.
The stunt game has three unique maps: Hazelgreen, Silverstone and Ironbark. Hazelgreen is a map with futuristic touches. It includes modern jumping ramps. Also, driving on this map has an extremely soothing effect.Â
On the other hand, the Silverstone map combines a forestry road with mountains. You will find many trees and rocks near the ramps. This map is the most special map for those who want to be in touch with nature. And the third map is the Ironbark. Ironbark is a map with lots of shipments by sea. You are free to do whatever you want in this huge plain area.
There are ten unique cars at your disposal. But in the beginning, the Compact Car, Coupe Car and Pickup are accessible. As you perform flyovers, you will gain points.
Use them to unlock the other ones. There are many vehicles that catch your attention, and the Concept Car is one of them. If you want something crazier, we recommend you try the 6-wheeled Car.
Some people are crazy for night drives. If you are one of them, you have the option to drive your vehicle at night. You only need to join one of the rooms with the night mode or create a private room by clicking on the "Night" option. This way, you can enjoy your dark rides. Don't forget to turn on the headlights by pressing the F key.
FreezeNova created the Stunt Simulator Multiplayer.
You may also tryUltimate Flying Car. In the game, you will find many cars with wingsâyes, they can fly! You can freely roam the city streets or engage in races with other supercars.
View otherstunt games onlineon OnlineGames.io. The collection includes a wide range of games. Additionally, if you stay tuned, you will always find new and thrilling games on the site.

title: Cat Girl Fashion Challenge
description:
Angela the Cathas always loved two things: trying on cute outfits and showing them off to anyone who will watch.Cat Girl Fashion Challengelets you enter Angela's wardrobe and her world of friendly rivalry and glittering spotlights. Each round pairs Angela with a stylish challenger on a runway. You become Angela's personal stylist, digging through closets packed with dresses, shoes, and sparkly accessories. Submit the look and see how your opponent dressed. Three judges wave their paws in approval or disappointment), declare a winner, and push Angela on to fresh fashion themes: Evening Elegance, Casual Chill, Back-to-School, E-Girl, Christmas sparkle, spooky Halloween, pastel Easter, and even a few secrets that unlock later. It's a quick, upbeat girl game, and the best part is that you can hop in for a few minutes or binge through every theme without downloads, sign-ups, or surprise paywalls.
Mouse or Touch:Tap icons, drag clothing onto Angela, and hit the big Preview button to present your look.
When the round starts, you'll be matched with an opponent. The level tells the current theme, so keep those colors and vibes in mind while you browse in your wardrobe. The vertical toolbar at the right opens earrings, necklaces, bags, shoes, and full outfits; swipe the item carousel if you need more choices. Select pieces to put onto Angela, and they snap perfectly into place. Feel free to mix, match, and swap as much as you like because nothing locks in until you click preview.
Once both stylists are ready, the pink platforms glide into a backyard catwalk (or snowy plaza or neon club; each level looks different). The judging trio then flips their score paddles. A thumbs-up lights a star under Angela's name; a thumbs-down does nothing. Collect more stars than the opponent to win the round. Keep winning, and Angela will strut through every season in the calendar, all the way to the secret Galaxy Gala finale.
Created and published by FreezeNova, specialists in quick-load,kid-friendly web gamesthat work smoothly on desktops, tablets, and phones.
If one runway isn't enough, check outAngela All Season Fashionon OnlineGames.io. Instead of facing rivals, you guide Angela through a year-round makeover spree, spring florals, summer beachwear, autumn sweaters, and winter sparkles, unlocking new wardrobes as you progress. It's the perfect sequel once you've mastered every challenge in the Cat Girl Fashion Challenge and still crave fresh outfits for everyone's favorite pink-furred style star.

title: Obby: Find 100 Cats
description:
Have you heard of the Cat Distribution System before? The Cat Distribution System (CDS) is a mystical way cats find their humans. When the universe is convinced you're a good and caring person and the time is right, it rewards you with a stray cat. It's like a cosmic matchmaking service. Cats might unexpectedly hitch a ride in your car, appear in your garden, or even pop out from your shopping bag. They could show up at your doorstep, trail you home, or simply decide you're the one while at a shelter. The system is famously unpredictable, almost as if it has a mind of its own.
Obby: Find 100 Catsis a purr-fectly crafted 3D adventure game where the Cat Distribution System literally fails. Normally, cats have a penchant for finding the best hiding spots, but in this game, something feels amiss. The magical system, matchmaking cats with humans, has gone haywire. Instead of those playful hide-and-seeks, cats are stuck in trees, trapped on roofs, or locked in rooms due to this cosmic glitch. Your mission is to locate and rescue all 100 of these misplaced felines spread across ten vividly themed maps. That's the only way to restore order to the universe's feline distribution. Each map is a puzzle of adorable hideaways and clever concealments. Find every last cat, using your wits and perhaps a bit of luck. Complete your task and set your cats free to choose their true, forever homes.
Are you ready to comb through every inch of these maps to collect all 100 cats? The challenge is set, the cats are hidden â let the great cat hunt begin! Remember, in Obby: Find 100 Cats, every kitty counts! And, if you'd like to play more kitty adventures, we've got you covered. Head over to thecat games onlinepage to find purrfect feline games, includingCat Simulators, where you get to be the cat itself. Have fun!

title: Pixel Path
description:
Pixel Pathis a fun and challenging game where you guide your pixelated hero through 50 levels, each with a new twist. Try to reach the portal, but you need to be careful because getting there wonât be a walk in the park. The terrain is really unstable, there are many unforgiving traps, and sometimes your own body might grow uncontrollably to enormous sizes, warping how you play. What looks like solid ground might crumble beneath you, and those spikes? They move pretty fast.
This is a game of quick reflexes, sharp thinking, and serious patience. Every mistake sends you back to the start with no second chances. Will you keep your cool, or will the chaos break you?
âMove:Arrow Keys / WASDâMenu:Esc
Pixel Pathbrings unique physics and mechanics that change as you progress through levels. The game design is a minimalist retro art with a clean and colorful layout. You can never get bored because unexpected hazards keep you active and challenge your instincts.For the perfectionists and thrill-seekers, global leaderboards and speedrun modes offer an extra layer of competition.
Pixel Pathdares you to master the unexpected. The rules are simple. The journey is not.

title: F1 Drift Racer
description:
We invite you to another Formula 1 race!F1 Drift Raceris a 2D drift game where you race with other F1 racers on a curved racing map. There are 4 Formula racers with you in this race, and you have to complete 2 laps in total. Give your vehicle credit for being a Formula 1 vehicle and be the first to reach the finish line at full speed!
Choose your vehicle, hit the track and leave your rivals in the dust! F1 Drift Racer offers you a range of F1 vehicles. You can start with the classic one. As you earn money from races, you will unlock new ones and make your game more enjoyable. Purchasing F1 vehicles in different models and colors is possible according to your taste.
Let the race begin! Move quickly after the countdown. Get ahead of your competitors by speeding up. Try to pass the opponents in front of you by using tactics. In our opinion, utilizing the drift points strategically to leave your competitors behind is one of the best tactics. You can avoid them by passing through these places in a controlled but fast manner. Since these points are slowing points, you can turn them to your advantage.
There are 20 striving levels in F1 Drift Racer, each with its unique racing map. The maps will be a little longer and more intricate in the following levels. But don't worry. As long as you can control your vehicle at the turning points, you can get ahead of all your competitors because, at these points, they will inevitably show a slowing down reflex.
If you'd like, you can play F1 Drift Race online against other players. To establish a room, click the "Multiplayer" button located at the bottom of the level selection screen.
You may tryDrift Hunters Pro, an online racing game where you can play and drift with your friends by creating a multiplayer room if you are a fan of the F1 Drift Racer. title: Flip Bottle
description:
Flip Bottleis a fun and addictive physics-based platformer where you need to flip a plastic water bottle from one surface to another without falling.
Jump across kitchens, living rooms, and more, using everyday objects like toasters, microwaves, shelves, TVs, and speakers as landing spots.
Just left-click on the mouse to flip the bottle and time your jumps perfectly.
Tip: Be careful because some shelves might move from time to time. This way, your flips become even more challenging!
As you progress, levels become trickier, each one a uniquely designed obstacle course. Plus, you can unlock new bottles like soda, champagne, and more to spice up your gameplay. Each completed level brings you 100 coins.
Can you land the perfect flip or will you crash to the floor?

title: Futuristic Racer
description:
Welcome to the year 2149, where racing isn't just a sport, but a high-stakes, neon-fueled battle for supremacy across the galaxy.
Futuristic Racertakes you into a world of adrenaline and luminous cityscapes. If you are a perfectionist who craves some intensity and precision handling, this game is definitely for you.Â
Your racing journey starts with a basic car. Complete each level, collect all gems and finish in the top 3 cars.Â
There are 30 levels to beat, each one tougher than the last. Miss a top 3 place or crash out? You'll have to try again. Only the best racers will make it all the way.
Futuristic Raceris easy to pick up, but hard to master. Precision timing is everything when it comes to steering and nitro usage.
WASD/Arrow Keys:Control the carSpacebar: Activate Nitro (when available)
As you progress and collect enough gems, you unlock a garage of nice futuristic vehicles. Prices range from affordable (150 gems) to elite (800 gems).
Once you've picked your favourite car, spend gems wisely on various upgrades. Engine Upgrades improve speed and acceleration. Nitro Boosts give you more powerful bursts of speed.
As expected,Futuristic Racerdelivers a fun ride through a high-tech universe. Are you ready to hit the gas and leave the future in your dust?
Futuristic Racerwas developed by JulGames, creators of fun and fast games for all skill levels.
If you enjoyedFuturistic Racer, check out more in ourRacing Games Onlinesection.
If you are looking for your next favorite game, tryMini Cars Racing. This is a fun twist on the genre where the races are just as intense, but the cars are mini-sized this time. It's a great game for fans of intense racing games.

title: Five Nights At Freddy's 3
description:
FNAF 3 (Five Nights at Freddy's 3)is an online horror game that takes you back to Fazbear's Fright, a horror attraction built around the mysteries of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. As in the prequels, you will play as the night guard tasked with monitoring cameras. FNAF 3 feels like revisiting your childhood nightmares, but this time, they've upgraded to HD horror. You will survive 5 tense nights where you try to balance your paranoia and tech management. Reboot this, check that, all while a killer animatronic is playing "guess who" with you. If you loved the first two FNAF games, you will love this installment with more adrenaline than ever. So, if you're ready, hit the start button and see if you can uncover the secrets while making it through the five nights.

title: Dino Evolution io
description:
If youâve ever dreamed of roaming the prehistoric world as a dinosaur, hunting down prey, dodging danger, and evolving into the ultimate predator, you found your game!Dino Evolution iois your chance to live it. Thisfun online gamedrops you into a lush survival land. Youâll start as a baby dino, eat fruits to grow, outgrow opponents, and climb the food chain one level at a time. But itâs not just about eating; itâs about evolving. Bigger dinos are out there, and theyâll chase you down without mercy if youâre not careful. And yes, youâll chase after small dinos too. You're dropped into a world where everyone is hungry and only the smartest dinos survive. Itâs not a sprint. Itâs a marathon. Merge, adapt, survive, and dominate the leaderboard in this addictively fun io game you can play right in your browser. Dino Evolution io delivers fast action, incremental growth, and tons of prehistoric chaos. Now hit the play button and turn on the time machine!
This fun io survival game is brought to you by FreezeNova Games, the creators of many other popular browser-friendly games.
If you liked Dino Evolution io, youâll probably enjoyEvoworld(aka FlyOrDie). This oneâs another evolution-style io game, but with wings. Instead of dinosaurs, you play as a tiny fly trying to survive in a dangerous sky full of birds, bats, and bigger bugs. Just like in Dino Evolution io, your goal is to eat, evolve, and avoid becoming someone elseâs snack. But now youâre flying from cloud to cloud, searching for food while watching out for predators above and below. The further you evolve, the higher in the sky youâll go. If you love games where you start small and work your way up through evolution, Evoworld is a must-try. title: Craftmine
description:

As you move forward in the wild, you will encounter many pigs, oxes, bears and snakes. Evade their attacks. Otherwise, you will lose one of your lives. To survive in nature, you must acquire the necessary items. Go to the trees and collect wood. In the beginning, this wood will enable you to craft a Wood Sword and a Wood Pickaxe.

title: Highway Cars
description:
Highway Carsis a 3Ddriving gamewhere you steer your car on the highway in the flow of traffic. The key point here is dodging the other cars without any accident. The more cars you dodge, the more points you get. Passing the cars as close as possible will be an adrenaline-pumping challenge in this car game, which is inspired by the popular game Highway Traffic!
In one-way mode, all the cars on the highway go in the same direction. There will be many cars moving forward near you. You need to pass the cars as closely as possible in order to get scores. And these scores will make you in-game currency. But, you will lose if you crash with any car in the flowing traffic.
This road is a bit challenging as traffic flows from both sides. You must be extra careful not to hit a car. But the advantage is you can bypass many cars at once.
Highway Cars also offers you a level selection mode. There are 50 levels divided into 5 sections. You will move to a different environment when you complete each section completely. For example, you will drive your car near a desert in the first 10 levels. It is possible to encounter snowy and tropical regions in the following sections.
As you earn currency by bypassing cars on the way, you will be able to unlock new maps. We briefly explain which game map you can unlock for how many dollars below.
If you love playing Highway Cars, you may also tryHighway Traffic. Always keep your attention and be ready to dodge cars with a quick maneuver in this game. You will face many cars on the road. The traffic will get challenging when you make progress in the game. Show off your driving skills!

title: Wood Block Jam
description:

It's like a mini escape room packed into every level, where your mind is the only way out. With hundreds of increasingly tricky stages and fresh mechanics introduced along the way, this isn't just a puzzle game; it's a full-on brain workout.
Controls are smooth, simple, and satisfying. Justclick/tapand swipe to move blocks. That's it!ÂRelaxing yet stimulating, vibrant yet strategic,Wood Block Jamis the kind of game that's easy to pick up and impossible to put down.
