The colorful, once-beautiful rainbow is now cursed, and each color has transformed into a mischievous monster. As the brave hero of Pixelville, it's up to you to defeat these funny foes to restore the rainbow's beauty.
Once upon a time, in the colorful world of Pixelville, there was a magical rainbow that stretched across the sky every day, spreading joy to everyone below. But one dark night, an evil wizard, tired of all the happiness, cast a curse on the rainbow. Each color of the rainbow turned into a monster!Â In this whimsical land, the colors took on their new, funny forms:
A brave kid (that's you!) with a big heart and an even bigger laugh decided to take action. Armed with a simple gun, which becomes more powerful as you progress, your mission is to defeat these colorful creatures and break the curse. With each defeated foe, the rainbow slowly returns to its former glory, restoring peace to Pixelville!

title: Rome Simulator
description:

When you face them, you need to save yourself from them by defending and attacking when necessary. Two unique maps belong to the castle. The place is as dangerous as it is magnificent because gladiators protect it.
The exterior of the castle is also undoubtedly as spectacular as the interior. You will see many lined-up altars and gold-plated outer walls. This place may feel like an open-air museum. The things you come across in the mansion will give you great information about the ancient era. There are many protectors here. So, donât lose focus while wandering around.
You have the option to grab the Ironhand Sword, Katana, Viking Metal Shield, Viking Halberd, and Viking Sword. Pick up whichever you want by pressing the E key as a primary weapon. You can take a secondary weapon by using the R key. These weapons will help you a lot when dealing with the gladiators.

title: Bloxorz
description:
Â
Sudokus, anagrams, and crosswords are all great classics of the puzzle genre. But mostpuzzle gameshave been around for over a century. If you're a puzzle enthusiast looking for a fresh twist that challenges your spatial awareness, you should definitely giveBloxorz Onlinea try.
Bloxorzis a beloved 3D puzzle game that has been played by millions since its release in 2007. You will move a block through cleverly designed mazes. title: Sandspiel
description:
Sandspielis a creative sandbox game that combines art and science. In this sand falling game, you can create environments by manipulating elements like water, sand, fire, and many more.
Each element uniquely reacts with another. This results in a great variety of results with the 20 items at your disposal. The reactions they create arouse curiosity and allow you to trust your physical intuitions while having fun.
You will begin with a sandbox environment where there is nothing but sand on the screen. Ignite fires and mix them with dust and oil, creating horrific chaos. Or plant seeds, build a lake and beautiful forest resembling pixel art. You can do infinite science experiments and observe chain reactions.Â
Max Bittker, the visionary behind Sandspiel, captures his passion for Sandspiel, expressing,
Sand falling games' mode of play is creative in a way that activates many parts of your imagination. Playing with the elements means asking questions, building experiments, and inventing stories and games of your own.
He also mentions that dust is one of his favorite elements as he admires how it absorbs other materials and diffuses water into mud.
Keep reading this post to learn how to play, elements, features and fun facts about Sandpiel.
Sandspiel is a pixelated sandbox game where players create different environments by drawing elements on a canvas. With 20 elements to choose from, each possessing its unique reaction, the game is rich in diverse outcomes that keep players engaged and curious. The game makes learning science fun and exciting.
We have explained the elements of this drawing game in a brief list below. However, there are thousands of possible reactions that wouldn't fit on any list. Learn the basics and dive into exploration.
Fundamentals
Flammables
Transformatives
Explosives
Living Entities
People of all ages admire and enjoy Sandspiel. People have uploaded more than 70,000 creations with many different subjects. While some use the game as a paint-on browser and create artwork, some are more interested in the reactions elements bring. In this, if you'd like to get inspired and inspire others, remember to take pictures of your art and share it with your friends.
Sandspiel was created by Max Bittker.
Our editor shares her fondness for Sandspiel in the following words:
"When I first played Sandspiel, I was mesmerized by visual aesthetics. Beyond sparking my curiosity and urging me to do many experiments, what happens on the screen mostly has gone beyond my expectations. One of my top picks is exploring the interaction of flammable materials, such as dust, oil, fire, gas, and rocket.
Sandspiel not only provides infinite opportunities for exploration but also has the answers to many questions I used to ponder as a child. It is a safe space for kids to quench their curiosity about nature while delivering a fun and relaxing experience for adults.
If you like to create artwork in open-world games, you can get to be a musician this time.Blob Operamight be your next destination, where you become an orchestra chef, compose your own song, and let the Blobs sing.Â
To discover hundreds of free games, simply browseOnlineGames.io! We are sure you will come along with your favorite game!Â

title: Su Battle Royale
description:
Let's face it, we all miss Surviv.io. But there's no need to throw in the towel.Su Battle Royaleis a free game that captures the essence of Surviv.io and delivers the exact same gameplay.
If you're familiar with battle royale games like PUBG, you'll pick up how to play in no time. You start with nothing but your wits. In short, you'll start with nothing but your instincts. Scavenge for weapons, armor, and supplies scattered across the map while outsmarting your enemies. Dodge bullets, survive the toxic gas, and claim victory as the last player or team standing!
Explore abandoned buildings, loot hidden crates, and prepare for intense battles as the playable zone shrinks over time. Will you fight head-on, set ambushes, or sneak your way to the top? The choice is yours.
Following the removal of Surviv.io in 2023, fans like me (or you) have been on a quest for a worthy successor. In my view, Su Battle Royale admirably fills the void left by its predecessor, offering a fun multiplayer 2D battle royale experience.
Each decision and move becomes critically significant, as you never know whether you'll accidentally detonate a box of grenades or uncover some rare loot. This feature alone was enough to keep me hooked, given the high stakes involved. I believe you'll find it equally fascinating.
Another standout aspect of Su Battle Royale is its clean, minimalist visual style. It's one of those rare testaments to how engaging gameplay can be achieved without relying on elaborate 3D graphics or excessive visual effects. This simplicity not only appeals aesthetically but also ensures performance consistency across a wide range of devices, from high-end to lower-spec systems like Chromebooks.
Overall, Su Battle Royale is a must-try for fans of Surviv io and battle royales looking for quick, exciting matches without the need for downloads.
Su Battle Royale was developed by Hasanger Games.
Yes there are lots of battle royale games that embraces the core mechanics of Surviv io. If you're looking for an almost the same experience, Su Battle Royale is the perfect option you can play for free.
Yes, Su Battle Royale is a 100% multiplayer game.
Focus on looting quickly, staying mobile, hiding in bushes and managing your health. Avoid the toxic gas at all costs!
If you enjoy Su Battle Royale, check out these other free survival games likeSurviv Bros. While the survival essence of the game mainly remains the same, there are unique twists like more game modes or available servers for less ping gameplay.
short_description: Survive the chaos in Su Battle Royale, a 2D post-apocalyptic battle royale game. Scavenge, fight, and dominate the field to be the last one standing!

title: Obby Gym Simulator
description:
Getting buff is no easy task, even in the online world, andObby Gym Simulatorproves it. In this gym-prison, players must train hard and stay dedicated to grow stronger; only then can they face powerful monsters and survive. The stronger you get, the closer you are to escaping the prison, so hurry up â¼ itâs time to hit the gym!
In this game, players navigate a gym-prison hybrid where the goal is simple: transform yourself from a tiny lifter into a muscle machine. Click your way through endless bicep curls and watch your character grow stronger with every rep. More than just an obstacle course, this game is a true test of patience and endurance. Use different gym machines and activities to bulk up, defeat powerful monsters, unlock helpful items, earn trophies, and ultimately escape the prison.
Gameplay Features
Muscle BuildingThe muscle-building mechanic is simple: just tap the mouse to perform a bicep curl or use any of the machines to grow stronger. Based on their strength level, players are divided into categories, starting from skinny, to athlete, to jock, and many more.
Letâs build some muscles!
Bicep CurlsBicep curls may seem nothing special at first, but theyâre the fastest way to gain strength points, especially when youâre still noodle arms. Even later, when you think youâre too cool for them, they still contribute to leveling up.
AdsAds are always a good way to help you level up. Each time players press the ad button, they are rewarded with a certain number of strength points depending on their level. Higher levels reward more points. Itâs also an easier option if youâve grown tired of constant exercise and want a break.
Mix & MatchMixing up multiple exercises, from basic bicep curls to running while lifting extra weights, keeps the game interesting and offers new ways to earn strength points. Explore the entire gym and discover different ways to grow stronger, such as watching ads or spinning the lucky wheel. All these activities help keep the game from becoming monotonous.
Â
No, there is no stamina mechanic in the game, because your character can train like a maniac for hours, performing endless bicep curls to get buff.
Yes, customization consumes the playerâs accumulated strength points, knocking them down a few levels. So before rushing to customize your character, remember the cost.
Obby Gym Simulatoris an online game that requires an internet connection to play with others. Every player you meet will be a real person from around the world.
A good way to gain strength points quickly is by watching ads or spinning the wheel. The points earned from ads vary depending on the playerâs strength level, while the wheel gives a random amount of points.
Even if you are done building your muscles, that does not mean the adventure has to end. Now that you are all built up, you can use your strength to break the rules and find your way to freedom inJailBreak Prison Escape. Itâs time to see how strong you really are!
short_description: Train hard in Obby Gym Simulator! Bulk up, fight monsters, earn trophies, and escape the prison in this fun gym-prison adventure.

title: Snake
description:
Slither your way through a maze withSnake Online. Your mission is to eat all the apples you can find without biting your own tail. As this sneaky snake grows, so does the challenge. Each apple makes it longer and you smarter!
Single Player Mode:
2 Players Mode:
Snake game, you've managed to coil yourself around my heart in ways I hadn't expected. For sure, playing Snake is a trip down memory lane, wrapped in pixels and nostalgia.
Playing this game, I was instantly transported back to the days of the Nokia 3310, where every ringtone was a polyphony melody, and every game was a treasure. The simplicity of the original Snake, with its monochrome screen and beeping soundtrack, was pure joy. This was all in an era before smartphones and social media. This version of online Snake captures that essence by keeping simple mechanics but with a slightly modern twist. That feels like hugging an old friend in new clothes.
The controls are intuitive, just as they should be for a game this classic. And the addition of a 2-player mode is definitely brilliant. It's like the developers peeked into our childhood, saw those countless hours spent waiting for friends or siblings to finish their turns, and said, "Let's give you a chance to play together literally."
But it's not just about recapturing the past. This game also reminds me of other arcade gems like Pac-Man, where strategy and speed were key, but so was the joy of simply playing. Every apple the Snake eats is like a power pellet inPacMan(can be considered as a mini victory in the grand scheme of things.)
To wrap up, Online Snake is a love letter to the days when games were about fun, not just about cool graphics or climbing to leaderboards. For those of us who remember the thrill of beating a high score in an arcade or on a tiny 3310 screen, or for newcomers who missed out on this simple joy, this game is a warm hug. It's a reminder that sometimes, going back to basics isn't a step back, but a leap into pure, unadulterated joy. Now go forth and slither!
Snake hits a wall or his tail?Game over, but hey, you can always try again!One player crashes in 2-player mode?The other player wins, crowning themselves the Slithering Champion.
This updated version of online Snake was crafted by FreezeNova.
Winning is subjective here; it's all about how long you can last and how many apples you can munch.
Absolutely! It's free from harmful content and has simple gameplay.
short_description: Play online Snake now! Eat apples, grow your snake, and outsmart opponents in single or 2-player mode.

title: Mahjong
description:
Mahjong Onlineis a game of patience, skill, and a bit of luck. In this version of a decades-old game, your goal will be to match identical tiles to remove them from the board until none remain. The difficulty comes with this rule: only free tiles can be picked. So, blocked tiles must be open on at least one side. While it mostly seems like a luck game and is often used for fortune telling, actually, this Mahjong rule adds a layer of strategy. So you need to think ahead rather than just clicking on every matching pair you see.
Mahjong (éº»å°) translates to "sparrow" in Chinese. The name is inspired by the sound of shuffling tiles, which resembles birds chirping. The designers of this online Mahjong game haven't skipped a single detail. So you'll hear both relaxing birds chirping music and that satisfying tile-click sound effect when you pair two tiles. It's a nod to the physical feel of classic mahjong sets made from bone, bamboo, or resin.
Plus, you have the option to switch between detailed, traditional tiles or a more minimalist, modern design with easier difficulty. No matter your preference, the result is the same: a soothing and rewarding experience. And if you ever find yourself stuck, shuffle, hint, and undo features are available to keep the game flowing smoothly.
With full compatibility on Chromebooks, phones, tablets, and desktops, this version of Mahjong Online lets youhave a cozy play sessionanywhere, anytime. Spent a rough day at work? Or, just want to hang out solo on a quiet weekend? Mahjong can be the perfect companion, sometimes even more soothing than a mother's lap (trust us on this one!)
Left-click or tap to select tiles.
Many players donât realize thatMahjong Online, which is the popular tile-matching puzzle played worldwide, is actually a simplified variant called Mahjong Solitaire. Unlike the classic four-player mahjong game that's been a cherished tradition in China for centuries, Mahjong Online was originally created as a computer puzzle game in the 1980s. Microsoft played a key role in popularizing it, bringing Mahjong Online into countless homes around the globe. Eventually, Mahjong Online became so beloved that it even overshadowed its traditional counterpart. Yet, despite their differences, both games share more than just beautiful tiles; each requires patience, careful strategy, and a keen eye for patterns.
Hundreds of versions with old or new themes have been created and played so far. There's even aChristmas Mahjongwhere you pair tiles with sugar canes, gingerbreads, gift packages, Santas on them. So after learning the rules, it's just up to you to pick a theme for your mood and start playing. In conclusion, Mahjong Onlineâs everlasting popularity proves that sometimes, it's the simplest games that truly stand the test of time.
Mahjong tiles are more than just game pieces, they carry deep cultural significance, representing elements of Chinese history, wealth, and philosophy. Every tile tells a story, reflecting ancient traditions that date back centuries. If you're curious, there's a great depth to explore in the symbolism of Mahjong tiles, and you can find them online. But we created a quick overview that can help players appreciate their beauty and delicate details. Here's what they mean:
The Bamboo suit, for instance, symbolizes strings of old Chinese coins. In ancient times, copper coins had square holes in the center and were often strung together with rope. This is why the lowest tile in the bamboo suit, the one bamboo, is usually depicted as a bird. Originally, it was a single coin, but later, artistic variations transformed it into a sparrow.
The Circle suit represents the coins themselves, depicting round, copper money in stacks, reinforcing themes of prosperity and commerce. Meanwhile, the Character suit reflects paper money, another key element of China's financial history, with inscriptions that resemble traditional calligraphy found on old banknotes.
Among the most eye-catching tiles are the Dragon tiles, which hold special significance. The Red Dragon symbolizes power, luck, and success, qualities associated with the mythical dragons in Chinese folklore, often linked to emperors. The Green Dragon, which resembles the character for "ç¼" (meaning "wealth" or "prosperity"), is considered a sign of financial fortune. The White Dragon, sometimes depicted as a blank tile or with a blue border, is often linked to purity and clarity, symbolizing a fresh start or wisdom in decision-making.
Then there are the Wind tiles, representing the four cardinal directionsâEast, South, West, and North. These tiles carry deep meaning in feng shui, the Chinese practice of harmonizing space and energy. The East Wind is often seen as the most powerful because, in traditional Chinese culture, the sun rises in the east, bringing new beginnings and strength.
This and some other versions of Mahjong also include Flower and Season tiles, which are purely decorative but add an extra layer of tradition. Flowers like plum blossoms, orchids, chrysanthemums, and bamboo represent the four noble plants in Chinese culture, symbolizing resilience, elegance, longevity, and strength.
Understanding the symbolism behind the tiles makes playing Mahjong Online even more fascinating. Every match you make isnât just about clearing the board, itâs a small connection to nature, beauty and centuries of history, wealth, and Chinese tradition.
Can Mahjong always be solved?Not every Mahjong puzzle has a guaranteed solution. However, many Mahjong Online puzzles are specifically created to be solvable if played strategically, especially when features like shuffle or undo are available.
Is Mahjong more difficult than chess?Mahjong and chess require different skills.Chessis about deep strategy and pure logic, while Mahjong combines strategy, pattern recognition, and some luck. Both have complexities, but Mahjong might feel more relaxed and approachable for beginners.
Is Mahjong really good for your brain?Absolutely! Mahjong helps sharpen your mind by enhancing memory, pattern recognition, and strategic thinking. Regular play has even been shown to help maintain cognitive functions and reduce stress.
What are the basic rules of Mahjong?In Mahjong Online (Mahjong Solitaire), the goal is simple: match pairs of identical free tiles to remove them from the board. Tiles are free if they're not covered and have at least one side (left or right) open. Clear all tiles to win!
Do you need to speak Chinese to play Mahjong?Not at all. Mahjong tiles have symbols and numbers that anyone can easily learn, regardless of language. Mahjong Online is fully visual, making it universally playable.
Is Mahjong luck or skill?Mahjong Online blends skill and luck. Successful play requires careful planning, strategic moves, and thoughtful tile selectionâbut occasionally, luck also plays its part. That's part of what makes it fun!
short_description: Play Mahjong Online and match beautifully crafted tiles in this relaxing puzzle game. Enjoy soothing music, satisfying sounds, and endless puzzles!

InLabubu Merge, your task is simple: merge matching Labubus to unlock brand-new, even cuter (and weirder) plushies! Watch your collection grow as you discover endless combinations and expand your cuddly-creepy crew. Whether youâre just looking to unwind or chasing the thrill of creating the ultimate Labubu, this game has you covered. Be in trend. Merge the Labubus!
Similar to other merge games,Labubu Mergecenters around the simple yet endless mechanic of merging identical Labubu dolls on a board to create new, cuter, and sillier dolls. Progression in the game is relatively simple: players start out with the smallest Labubu and combine similar-looking dolls until they create bigger ones. Players can also follow the ladder to see what comes from merging two kinds of dolls, starting from the tiniest Labubus (withBlueberrybeing the smallest) all the way up to the larger ones, likeLabubu Chef,Agent, or evenLabubu Crimson.
The thrill in the game comes from the need to achieve a bigger, better character by merging your Labubu dolls. With each transformation unlocking a colorful doll and paired with the funky background soundtrack, this game is a delight. The simple yet strategic merge challenges players to think before they act, since filling the basket results in a game over.
To stop the board from overflowing, players need to carefully place every Labubu they have, merge as much as possible, and keep the board tidy. Using the push feature is very helpful when you need to make more room.
Absolutely.Labubu Mergecan be played offline. Once the game has loaded in your browser, it no longer requires an internet connection.
The trick to triggering chain merges is to place the smaller random Labubus in the middle of the board and occasionally press the push button to mix things up. This will often trigger a chain merge of the dolls.
Since weâre talking âtrends,â youâve probably heard of the famous Italian Brainrot characters. Does âOh no, la polizia!â sound familiar? Or maybeCappuccino Assassinorings a bell? Keep the fun going withMerge Brainrotâ¼ a game just likeLabubu Merge, but with a silly Italian twist. Expect plenty of laughs... and a little brainrot too!
short_description: Merge mischievous Labubus to unlock cute yet creepy plushies! Grow your cuddly-creepy crew and be on trend with Labubu Merge!

title: Agent Walker vs Skibidi Toilets
description:
Get ready for funny battles with Skibidi Toilets!Agent Walker vs Skibidi Toiletsis a 3D action game where you fight with toilet heads as a four-armed mechanical Agent Walker.
You need to eliminate a specific number of Skibidi Toilets to move to the next level. Try your best and clear all the toilet heads running towards you from the battling field in this shooting game!
Desktops and Laptops
Mobile Devices

There arevarious camera heads and other unique looksthat you can find in the "Appearance" section. You can even get a satellite view or speaker view for him! Isn't it fantastic?
Turn off any ad blockers you are currently using. Alternatively, try launching the game in incognito mode. If these suggestions aren't enough, please see oursupport page.

title: Guess the Italian Brainrot Animals
description:
Have you heard ofBallerina Cappuccina? Yep, the ballerina with a coffee cup instead of a head. Sheâs just one of the many silly characters in the Italian Brainrot meme world.Guess the Italian Brainrot Animalsis exactly what the title promises: it wants you to guess wacky TikTok AI-generated meme celebrities by tossing absurd pics and emoji mashups your way for a nonstop guessing party.
Guess the Italian Brainrot Animalsis a silly guessing game where absurd pics and emoji combos turn into wacky TikTok AI meme celebrities likeBallerina CappuccinaorBombardino Crocodilo. Play solo to chase high scores or team up in multiplayer for chaotic brainrot fun. Get points for right answers, strikes for wrong ones, and see who survives the nonsense the longest!
Look at the silly pics, mash the clues together in your brain, and guess the goofy Italian brainrot creature â¼ whether itâsBombardino Crocodilo,Tralalero Tralala, or even tinyCappuccino Assassino. Collect points for correct answers and try to beat your high score in solo mode, or bring friends into multiplayer for pure chaos. In multiplayer, take turns, swap players after a strike, and race to guess first. Whoeverâs right scores a point, wrong guesses get a strike, and five strikes means game over. If both guess right, both score â¼ keeping the madness going!
Letâs get brainrotted!
The game includes over 50 brainrot characters, each with unique sounds and visuals that keep the guessing fun and surprising.
No, the game cannot be played offline, as it requires a stable Wi-Fi connection at all times.
Yes, some characters are easy, others are pure nonsense, and sometimes youâve got to think quick with three pictures at once.
Nope! There are no hints in the game, and players have to rely on their general knowledge to find the right answer.
If you guess the wrong character in offline mode, your game will instantly end. However, players can use up to three retries, which are rewarded after watching a short ad.
Guess the Italian Brainrot Animalsis a game where youâve got to think quick and guess before itâs too late. Itâs silly, itâs fun, and itâs pure brainrot vibes. If youâve already guessed enough absurd Italian characters and want to dive even deeper into the nonsense, then youâve got to tryMerge Brainrotnext.
short_description: Guess the Italian Brainrot Animals: a wild meme quiz of AI-made TikTok celebs with absurd emoji mashups. Fun, weird, nonstop guessing!

title: Cosmo Void
description:
Attention, pilot! Youâll need super quick reflexes to fly your spacecraft into the endless void. The cosmic path is full of tricky shapes and moving obstacles that keep changing.Cosmo Voidis no easy ride â¼ it will push your skills to the limit! Can you keep your ship safe from obstacles while flying super fast? We dare you to try!
InCosmo Void, players control a futuristic spacecraft as it glides through an endless cosmic void. With each level, the challenge grows, obstacles multiply, speed increases, and the space to swerve away gets tighter. Quick thinking and sharp reflexes are the key to survival. The game shines with vibrant 3D graphics and smooth, responsive controls, perfectly tuned for instant play. Choose to fly solo or team up with a friend â¼ the void feels a lot less lonely with a companion by your side!
Get into the void alone or with a friend! With the built-in split-screen two-player mode, you can challenge a friend in a never-ending space adventure. Without boosters, dashes, or brakes, your piloting skills are put to the test. The first one to crash eats space dust, and the winner takes it all! This mode sharpens your control over the spacecraft and brings out your competitive instincts.
The gameplay is simple. Just remember thatCosmo Voidis divided into layers, with the difficulty rising as you cross each level and move to the next. Most levels have shifting obstacles, so staying focused and reacting quickly is the key to survival.
Onboard, letâs go!
Overheat MechanicBrakes let players slow down their spacecraft when it reaches extreme speeds. However, holding them too long causes overheating, and once the bar fills up, the spacecraft is destroyed.
Yes, you can slow down your spacecraft, but only for a short time. A bar will quickly fill up as you slow down, causing the ship to overheat. If the meter fills completely, the spacecraft will explode.
Yes, the game becomes harder as you progress. Each level introduces tougher obstacles and a slight increase in speed, making survival more challenging and raising the overall difficulty.
No, the game doesnât have checkpoints, since thereâs no storyline. However, you can track your progress through your high score and by seeing how many levels and how much distance you covered before crashing.
Enjoyed the ride? Whether youâre speeding past obstacles or just chilling in the cold expanse of space,Cosmo Voidgives players an experience they wonât forget. If you think your space trip was fun, maybe itâs time to land back on Earth and tryPixel Path. It looks simple, but donât be fooled. The tricky gameplay will catch you off guard. Think your reflexes are sharp enough? We dare you to prove it!
short_description: Pilot a futuristic spacecraft through the endless void. Avoid shifting obstacles, test your reflexes, and see if you can survive the cosmic challenge!

And try not to lose the steering control while moving on it.

This could be a poison, a soldier carrying a bomb, or a power-up that regenerates the health of all your soldiers. This is a complete surprise. Just trust your luck.

title: Monster Truck City Parking
description:
Monster Truck City Parkingis a driving game where you follow the pink halos with your giant truck and go to the parking area. You must park your vehicle in the area before your time is up. You can not miss any of them.
You will drive your vehicle under the shining sun, passing over the boulevards. There will be small palm trees on the roadside that will accompany you. You will pass through many malls and residences while driving to the parking lot.
You have a classic truck, a green truck, a navy blue truck with a yellow flame look, and a police van truck. Our favorite is the navy blue one. Driving that vehicle feels so cool. There are no unlocking limitations here. You can freely choose whichever vehicle you want to drive.
As you level up by parking your truck, you will get dollars. Use your money to enhance yourcarâs power. You can make power-ups by pressing the engine icon on the garage section at the right side of the screen. Enhance your carâs engine, brake and speed power. Upgrade your vehicle for each feature up to 10 grades.
You are given less than 2 minutes to drive your vehicle to the parking area. Before your time is up, quickly follow the pink halos and get to the parking spot. Otherwise, you can not move to the next level. Do not waste your time wandering in the city!

title: Four Colors

title: Time Shooter
description:
Prepare to fight with glass-made enemies! Cut them into a thousand pieces with a single bullet.Time Shooteris a 3D shooting game where you will find yourself in a white room full of red enemies. You need to take them down using your gun.
However, keep in mind that time flows differently here! If you move, the enemies will start to take action at normal speed. Develop a strategy and get rid of them immediately before time flows. This action game will feel like playingSuperHot!
When you enter the game, you will be in a room with white walls. There will be a gun in your hands. The red enemies in the room are waiting for you to move. Thus, they can attack you faster. Time passes very slowly here if you don't move.
On the other hand, the slightest movement will allow all red creatures to shoot at you immediately. Create a strategy and eliminate them all to survive in this white room in this first-person shooter game.
Your enemies aremen made of glass. When you fire the gun, and the bullet hits them, you will hearglass-shattering sounds. Trust me, you will love these sounds. At every level, red men will outnumber you, so you should be careful about that.
It would be beneficial for you to carry out planned and programmed attacks. Gamie recommends taking them down individually and hiding behind white walls if necessary. But if the bullet they shoot you or the gun they throw hits you, you lose the game.
The most useful tactics in this action game can be shooting an enemy and running after that. In this way, you willdeflect the bulletmoving towards you in slow motion. You should try this on each red creature to experience how successful a strategy it is. We call this "Bending Time". ð

You can only use the left and right arrow keys to steer the vehicle.

title: Full Guide: Drift Hunters
description:
Â
Â
Can you smell burning rubber? Hear the tires squeezing? Feel the dizziness as you spin out? Does it give you a dry mouth, too?
We're not on a roller coaster here. We're talking aboutdriftingâ more than just a sport, it's a full-body experience.
If you're reading this, you're probably a fan of the high-speed excitement that drifting brings. Whether you're looking toimprove your drifting skills, choosingthe right car for drifting, how totune a vehicleandexploring cheats, you're in the right place.
In this guide, we'll walk you through the first Drift Hunters to its sequel, Drift Hunters 2. We'll cover tuning, garage options, maps, and menu improvements.
We'll also help you understand how tuning works and how to initiate and maintain a drift.Keep in mind that the technical information is applicable not just to Drift Hunters but also to mostdrift games online.Â
It has been almost 2 years since Drift Hunters - the first game of the sequel - was initially published. The game is played and loved by thousands of drift enthusiasts. We wouldn't be wrong if we dared to say that Drift Hunters is the best drifting game online ever. We are going to explain the reasons here on this page, but first, let's get you acquainted with the Drift Hunters.
Drift Huntersis a 3D driving simulator built in Unity Web-GL. The creator,Ilya Kaminetsky, spent hours coding the details, physics and maps. The game outshines all other online drifting games with its vast number of preferences on cars, maps, tuning options and player preferences.
The game got so popular that it became a pioneer for the whole new game sequel, which brings us to the second game. Being at least as enjoyable as the first game,Drift Hunters 2offers better graphics and physics, as well asin-depth tuningand customization options.
Both games are equally perfect, but there are some distinctions between them:
After playing these two games for hours, we have noticed some improvements in the Drift Hunters 2.
So, we leave the choice to you! You can play both games on OnlineGames.io for free!
Choosing the game is not enough for avid drifters. If you need more insight onchoosing the right car,learning how tuning works,how to perform combosandactivate cheatsin Drift Hunters games, keep reading. We've got you covered!
Drifting is an extreme sport that has a myriad of variables to consider while performing. We give you all the information as simply as possible, excluding unnecessary details and confusing terms.
Let's start! The equipment you need to have is a car,a suitable track, and knowledge ofhow to initiate a driftandhow to exit. But without the right car, things may not go as you wish. So, choosing the right car is a good place to start.
We know that glossy SUVs may appeal to you in the garage, and you can always choose and experiment with them. However, equipping yourself with the most suitable car for drifting goes beyond the design of the vehicle. Before hitting the road, you should consider 3 main facets: engine power, weight and speed.
If you understand how these facets work, now it's time to choose your car. You can see the list of vehicles in Drift Hunters 2, including engine power, weight, top speed, and price details. For those interested in multiplying their scores to save up cash in the game, we also included car score multipliers.
Now that you've chosen your car, tuned its settings, picked the map and are ready to hit the track in Drift Hunters. This is where the real fun begins, and mastering initiation is key to pulling off controlled drifts.
You have initiated the drift but just lost your streak on a straight road? Use theManji technique. Manji is a Japanese drifting technique where the driver steers the car back and forth quickly. It's like smoothly swaying your car's tail left and right, creating a coolsnake patternon the road. You might recall Manji from the famous Tokyo Drift movie scenes.
When you exit the curve and see thelong, straight road, applying this method to score ultimate combos on drifting might be necessary. Manji will bring you lots of cash in Drift Hunters.
When you give your cartoo much gas(or go too fast into a turn), thewheels can lose their grip on the road. If your car loses traction, it might start to spin uncontrollably. Your tires can't keep up with the speed or the power, and the car starts turning more than you want it to. This is called Spinning Out.
Spinning out sounds fun, but this is an unwanted situation and causes crashes. After all,drifting should be controlled chaos,right? If you'd like to prevent spinning out,avoid oversteering, andconfigure your tuning settingsagain to have more balance.
You may think that you need sharp bends and tight turns on a track for drifting. But that's not the case. A narrower track requires much more control and stability since you can crash into guardrails. Crashes will slow you down and break your combos.
So, it's better to start with playground tracks where you havewide open spaces. Before diving into the curvy roads, you can performfirst gear donutson these maps. Here are the two best tracks for beginner drifters from each game.
As you can imagine, the hardest roads are tight and curvy ones. Japans call these tracks touge, why don't we? Here is the touge track with lots of challenging turns.
Here is an insider confession: there are ways to use cheats in Drift Hunters. We will begin with the infinite money cheat on Drift Hunters 2.
This money hack will give you1,000,000 cashevery time you use the cheat. This simply makes all the cars and tuning options available with just a few clicks. To activate the money hack
This one is more of a glitch than a hack.
To earn absurd amounts of money in Drift Hunters using the wall tap glitch. To do that:
With tips on picking the perfect car, mastering drifting, and a few sneaky cheats, Drift Hunters is a fun journey of speed and skill. So, get ready, hit the virtual tracks, and perform epic combos! If you'd like to take a look at other freeonline speed games, OnlineGames.io is beside you! Have fun!

title: Meet Gamie
description:
Hello, Gamers!
I'mGamie, your new gaming buddy on OnlineGames.io. You'll probably see me all around website from now on. I am around here to spread joy, fun and share some insider tips for games. ð
I'm so excited to be here. And can't wait to guide you on crazy adventures! Think of me as your personalcheerleader!
As you can see from my antenna and the buttons on my ears, I'm aproduct of two generations in gaming.
Mydad was a joystickand used to work on a shinyPacman machine, while mymom was a stunning gamepad. Thanks to their love for their work and each other, they named meGamie! I grew up in a joyful house full of different games.
People often say that I resemble my dad with my joystick baseâI'm all about precision. And my ears? They're here to help you steer diverse modern gameplays.
I am always jolly and cheerful, but let me tell you a secret. I can be overly competitive sometimes. ð I guess I'm more like dad in that. Mom always warns me
"Gaming is not just about winning but also having fun."
Another life lesson I learned from my parents is that playing games is more fun together! Whether you're facing off a boss, exploring new worlds, or simply enjoying a casual game, I'll be there to cheer you on.Let's share our tips, tricks, and triumphs in the comments!We'll celebrate your big or small victories together.
My taste in gaming is just like my character: a mix of everything.
My competitive side loves torace to the endor grind for more and more achievements inclicker gameslikeXmas Cookie Clicker. I find myself immersed in the number of achievements, boosters and powerups until I discover it's been quite a long gaming session.
On the other hand, I love the nature offun and casual gamesthat I play for 5-10 minutes each and move on to another one quickly. A few of the games I play by alternating areDrift Boss,Get on Topand probably all the titles inStickman tag.
I hope my recommendations help you find your next adventure. If you need help you know where to find me!
Happy gaming! ð®

title: Papa's Donuteria

title: Dinosaur Game
description:
Do you remember the T-Rex in Google Chrome when your internet connection went out? Now, you can play it online, too.Dinosaur Gameis a free-running game where there is no finish line. We warn you in advance that this is a challenging game. But here is the fun! You will have a lot of fun trying to beat your own record. Are you ready to go back to prehistoric times?
As you can see from the graphics, Dinosaur Game is a very simple but enjoyable game. You will start running as a T-rex. From time to time, the T-rex's speed will increase, and sometimes it will decrease. The competition aims to avoid thorny plants as much as possible by adapting to these sudden changes in speed. If you touch any of these plants, you will be burned. When the speed rate increases or decreases, you can see the warning message in capital letters on the screen. No matter how easy the game itself seems, you will experience firsthand that it is not! If you have an internet connection, the game will open. The internet does not necessarily have to be disconnected.
It is not good to be too close to the plants or try to jump when you are too far away. Because if even the most minor thorn pricks the dino, it dies. However, when the distance is not adjusted well, trying to jump from space may cause you to fall right on the plant. You need to be very careful about when to hop, especially during extreme acceleration and deceleration.
No, the Dinosaur Game has no ending. It is an endless running game that you can enjoy without limit.
Certainly! Dinosaur Game is playable on all kinds of devices including Chromebooks, tablets and smartphones.
The game controls are straightforward, as are the graphics of the game. There is nothing that makes your job difficult.Â

title: We Become What We Behold
description:
We Become What Beholdis a point-and-click game with a strong message. As a player, you step into the shoes of a news reporter tasked with observing the lives of the people of a town.
Inhabitants of the town arecircles, squares, and even crickets. All are busy with their own lives, walking around the city square. Some are angry while some are loving.Â
Your job is tocatch interesting scenesand broadcast news on a jumbotron. But here is the twist: the people of this town donot appreciate peaceful newsat all. So, captureminor misunderstandings, amplify them, and see how people react accordingly.Â
We Become What Behold offers 5 minutes of playing time. However, what the game emphasizes is enormous.Â
In We Become What Behold, you will experience a psychological phenomenon known as "negativity bias". This concept was first proposed by two psychologists in 1982. They suggested that humans aremore influenced by negative newsrevokingconflict, violence, and fear. We can say that this bias is deeply transfused in human cognition.Â
The game's developer, Nicky Case, has masterfully incorporated this notion into the gameplay, allowing players to witness its effects firsthand in a tragicomic way.
Nicky Case created this game.
What I love most about the game is how the developer, Nicky Case, kept the gameplay and visuals simple so as not to overshadow the game'sthought-provokingconcept. This is why he features people as small stickmen with circle and square heads.Â
Despite the simplicity, the artworks and sounds of WBWWB are well-crafted.Â
In conclusion, I think We Become What We Behold is a kind of game that many game designers might admire for its authenticity and regret not having thought of themselves.
If you'd like to play games with a strong message behind them, we recommend playingSpend Elon Musk Money. It is a game that highlights the wealth of the world's top 0.001%. You get to be the multibillionaire Elon Musk and try to consume all the money in a virtual market. All are available on that single webpage, from a slice of pizza to mansions, yachts, and ultra-expensive artwork.Â
short_description: Go and capture silly scenes of conflicts, exaggerate the news, and guide people to a craze.Â Play We Become What We Behold now!

title: Offroad Rally
description:
This will be a bit of a muddy race! Prepare yourself for this!Offroad Rallyis a 3D racing game where you race on an off-road racetrack full of bumps with driftwood and mud. Your ability to maneuver against these obstacles will be tested. Even the smallest piece of wood can put you in last place in the race. You should avoid them.
If you want to be first in Offroad Rally, all you need to do is know where to stop, how to avoid obstacles, where to accelerate and where to slow down. If you don't know these things, even if you drive the fastest car, it's in vain. Overcome obstacles and be the first to reach the finish line.
There is no straight road here! In this racing area, you will encounter a lot of soil, rocks, wood pieces and similar obstacles. If you don't overcome these wisely, you will have difficulty finishing the race first.
You will see a lightning bolt icon on the left side of the screen. The nitro is fully charged and ready to use when this area is entirely turquoise. You can use this nitro by pressing the left shift key during the race and get ahead of your competitors.
Along the track, you will see blue coins with F written on them. You can save money by collecting them and winning races, and with this money, you can strengthen your existing truck or buy new ones.
You can increase your vehicle's power by going to the garage section of the menu. You can change the wheels of your vehicle so that it can stand on the ground more firmly. Or you can have front protection installed to avoid collisions with minimal damage. Options for installing chimneys and top protection on your vehicle are available here.

title: Papa's Cupcakeria

Here, you're not just baking cakes, but also frosting, sprinkles, serving and... maybe customer meltdown. So, if you're wondering what the deal is with Papa's Cupcakeria, You've just landed into the world of Papa Louie's latest franchise in Frostfield town. With Papa Louie's knack for turning misfortunes into business opportunities (and a little help from a car crash), you're now the newest employee at Papa's Cupcakeria. Your mission? To bake and decorate cupcakes that will make the customers forget all about their sugar cravings and maybe even their life's problems for a sweet moment. Let's get started with how you can play this game!
Use your mouse to play.
Hit the start, pick a character, give them a name and start your first day in Cupcakeria. You'll juggle between 4 stations as the crowd fills the shop.
When the cupcake is ready, drag the order ticket onto the plate and give the customer their cake. If they're happy with the results, they'll leave a good tip with a smile. More tips mean more upgrades, from new clothes for your character to fancy schmancy bakery equipment.
So, strap on your apron, grab your whisk, and get ready to turn Papa's Cupcakeria into the sweetest spot in town. Whether you're in it for the laughs, the love of the theme (or just to see how many sprinkles you can pile onto one cupcake,) Papa's Cupcakeria has got you covered in frosting and fun! And don't think Papa Louie would stop at cupcakes, would he? From sushis to tacos, there's a whole universe of Papa's games waiting on onlinegames.io. Next play,Papa's Burgeria. title: Stealing the Diamond
description:
Henry Stickmin Stealing the Diamondis a point-and-click adventure game where you help Henry Stickmin (the famous criminal) attempt the biggest art heist of his life. He wants to sneak (or bust) into a museum and steal a precious diamond without getting caught. This free flash game is perfect for anyone who enjoys comedy animations mixed with some action. You can play it right in your browser on OnlineGames.io, so thereâs no need to download any file or flush plugin. In summary, Geometry Escape would be particularly appealing if you're in the mood for something that tests your timing and reflexes without letting up. It's a game that rewards persistence and precision, potentially leading to that rewarding "one more try" loop where each successful level feels like an achievement. title: Global Guesser
description:
Global Guesser Onlineis a fun and exciting way to test your geographical knowledge and curiosity. This freegeography guessing gameon OnlineGames.io literally drops you into random spots around the world. Think busy city squares all around the globe, Wall Street, the Eiffel Tower, the Taj Mahal or a remote desert in the Middle East, or perhaps quiet mountain towns in the Far East. The game challenges you to guess where youâve landed. While you explore, youâll spot unique signs, billboards, cars, and local features that can all give you clues about the location. If youâve ever wanted to become a skilled world traveler right from your chair, this is your chance!
Global Guesser Online, inspired by the hugely popularGeoGuessr, has quickly become one of my favorite games on OnlineGames.io. It's amazing how geography can be so much fun. It wasn't my favorite class in school. Anyway, in fact, geography-guessing games have become so popular that they have turned into real e-sports! Now, there are official tournaments, online leagues and rankings, and even professional players who compete to guess places faster and more accurately than anyone else. Watching these master players on YouTube is crazy. Some of them pick the exact street in less than five seconds. Honestly, that blows my mind every time! It's funny how I often find myself asking, "But HOW?" repeatedly, LOL!
So, one time I found myself on an empty street somewhere that felt a bit like Eastern Europe. I don't know if it's a gut feeling or the buildings and the weather pointed that to me. Then, I quickly noticed some street signs with letters like âÄâ and âÅ,â which made me think about Poland. But then, as I looked around, I saw some mountains and buildings that didnât exactly match. I was confused but decided to trust my first guess. Turns out I was about 200 kilometers off. Not terrible, but not great either. Moments like these remind me that even when you feel confident, the world always has more secrets to share. So, why don't you take a world tour in the comfort of your couch? No heavy backpacks, no jetlags or the fear of losing your passport. It's free to walk around in the neighborhoods of India or find yourself surrounded by cherry blossoms in a Japanese park. Everywhere is possible. Give Global Guesser a try! And, let us know if you love it or not in the comments.
short_description: Play Global Guesser Online! Explore random places on Earth, find clues, guess locations, and test your skills in this free online game like Geoguessr!

title: OvO Online
description:
If you think parkour games are tough, wait until you tryOvO Online! This isnât your average jump and run challenge. Youâll need lightning-fast reflexes, perfect timing, and total control to survive. Itâs not just about pressing buttons; itâs about combining moves, reacting quickly, and staying calm when things get wild. So, do you think your reflexes are sharp enough to beat the course?
OvO Onlineis a fast-paced parkour game with a clean, minimalist design. You play as a stick figure who runs, jumps and dives through challenging obstacle courses that test your speed and reflexes. Every move counts because one mistake can send you back to the start.Â
There are 60 levels and one training level that you can play at any time. They are grouped into different themes or modes, with the difficulty increasing as you progress:
1â8:Basics9â16:Getting Serious17â24:Higher Order25â32:Mechanics33â40:OvO Space Program41â48:Journey Through the Portal49â52:Community Levels53â60:The Gauntlet99:Training Level
The gameplay is simple:reach the finish line as fast as you can while collecting coins and finding shortcuts on every level. Follow the in-game tips for a better understanding of the gameplay.
Yes, levels are unlocked individually, so you donât need to finish one to access the others.
Yes, the game works smoothly on both mobile and desktop devices, so you can enjoy it anywhere.
If you love parkour, youâll definitely enjoy something classic likeStickman Parkour. It brings the same smooth parkour energy with creative paths and awesome moves to master. Test your reflexes, explore challenging levels, and see if you can land every jump perfectly!
short_description: Play OvO Online, a fast-paced parkour game where you jump, slide, and dive through challenging levels. Test your reflexes, collect coins, and unlock cool skins!

title: Tank Driver Simulator
description:
Tank Driver Simulatoris a 3D tank driving game where you steer a tank in an inner city or an empty sandy area by the sea. While driving the heavy machine in the city, you will literally accompany the flowing life of the city, pedestrians and other drivers.
You can even seize other drivers' vehicles, such as motorbikes and classic cars! Just like you did in theGTA game series. Enjoy this thrilling simulator war game to the fullest!
The idea of ââusing a tank sounds very appealing, doesn't it? You will definitely taste what it feels like to drive this machine in this simulator game.
Two different game maps were created for you. In the beginning, you have to choose which one you want to use your vehicle in. The rest is up to you! Enjoy the adventure of steering the huge machine.
You may tryTank War Simulator, another tank game where you are in charge of a war tank, if you like playing Tank Driver Simulator. There will be a real conflict between your team's and the enemy's war machines.
For more game options, you can look upsimulator gamestag on OnlineGames.io. How does driving a tank make you feel? You can share your gaming experience with us in the comments!
short_description: Steer your tank in the city streets or on the sands in the Tank Driver Simulator! Move around and shoot with this heavy machine.

title: Foot Doctor
description:
Foot DoctorÂ is a 2D doctor game where you have many patients with injured feet. They are waiting for you to cure them as soon as possible because they are hurting! You must take care of them with caution. They believe you will heal them. Take them to your clinic one by one and start to heal them using your medical stuff in this simulator game!
Many patients come from different countries and suffer from their feet. They know your reputation. Some of them flew for kilometers and came to you with solid faith. The first thing to do is examine them. Determine what procedure you will follow. You have all the medical equipment you need. Then, start operating them and send them to their country happily!
Begin with deciding on which patient you will take your clinic first. There is a blonde girl with stunning beauty, an American boy, and even Santa Claus. All of them are here for you to heal their injuries. Pick your favorite patient and make a diagnosis. Then, you can start your operations. Approach them with care, and we don't want them to get hurt!
It is possible that you will encounter many kinds of cases. You will deal with broken foot bones, glass cuts, open wounds and swollen toes. Use your X-ray device to detect the broken bones. Remove glass fragments with tweezers. Stitch open wounds and apply a compress with ice to swollen toes.
You must prevent your patient's feet from becoming infected in any way. The area in which you treat your patients needs to be highly sterile. Otherwise, things may get worse. Avoid these kinds of infections using your medical experience. You are a renowned doctor, and everything you do must be perfect. Use the relevant medical spray and ointment to the wounded areas when necessary.
Foot Doctor was developed by FreezeNova.
If you are a fan of Foot Doctor, you may also tryMy Dentist. Your main task in the game is to perform dental procedures for your patients. They have oral health diseases and are waiting for your treatments. Do your examinations, operate on their mouth and send them to their home with a happy smile!
For further options, you may look up thedoctor gamestag on OnlineGames.io by following the link. If you have any suggestions or wishlist, do not hesitate to contact us!
short_description: Get your medical instruments and start to examine your patients. You are responsible for curing their feet in this doctor game, Foot Doctor!

title: Sprunky Incredibox Mods
description:
Ever dreamed of being a DJ? Jump into the world ofSprunky Incredibox Modsand make your own funky music! Mix the unique sounds of each character and create fun songs your way. Try different combos and see what amazing beats you can come up with because the possibilities never end in this super fun and cool game!
Sprunky Incredibox Modsis a creative music experience that lets you explore different beats, genres, sounds, and effects. Itâs not just about mixing sounds but about timing, layering, and experimenting. Try out different combinations, unlock special modes, and see what cool rhythms and visuals you can create!
Collect points as you play your music and experiment with new songs to unlock even more cool mods! Choose from awesome themes likeIcy,Acidic,Dark,Royal,Minecraft,Geometry Dash,Iridescent Friends,Among Us,Skibidi, andSquid Game!
The gameplay is simple:mix the mods and create your own crazy songs! Try different combos and see what sounds you can come up with.
Now itâs your turn, DJ! Hit play and drop the beat!
Your mix wonât be saved, sadly, but donât worry! All the scenes you unlock will stay ready for when you come back to mix againâ¦ as long as you donât delete your cookies.
Yep! Just hover over the mod you want to remove and click the âX.â You can also mute or lock any mod anytime.
If you lovemusicand want to have fun while creating beats, youâre in the right place. Explore our big collection of music games with something cool for everyone. Have you tried FNF, also known asFriday Night Funkin'? Itâs all about rhythm and style. Or check outBlob Opera, where funny voices and music come together. Ready to start your next gig?

title: Battle Simulator: Sandbox
description:
InBattle Simulator: Sandbox, you have total freedom to create and control your own epic battles. Itâs not just about placing units; itâs about strategy, timing, and creativity. Watch armies clash in unpredictable physics-based combat and see if your tactics can lead to victory. Are you ready to command the battlefield?
Battle Simulator: Sandboxis a fun physics-based strategy game where you design your own battles, build your army from different types of soldiers, and watch them fight in real time. You can experiment endlessly to discover exciting combinations that change how each fight unfolds.
From simple fighters to powerful gladiators, anything can happen once the battle begins. Your only limits are your imagination and strategy.
The gameplay is simple:use your strategy skills and imagination to choose from the available soldiers and place them anywhere within the square. Start the game and see if the battle ends in your favor.Unlock new levels by winning battles. There are 170 levels to keep you engaged and challenge your strategy skills.Â
Sandbox ModeYou can use the Sandbox mode at any time to train and control both the Blue and Red armies.
Classic & Epic ModeYou start by choosing from classic fighters, but as you spend more time on the battlefield, youâll unlock epic units with even more powerful soldiers and creatures, dragons included.
Prepare your army and take command!
Yes! Your progress and army upgrades are saved, so you can return to the battlefield anytime.
Nothing serious happens, fortunately. Lose and learn, thatâs the spirit of a true commander. Next time, adjust your tactics based on your enemiesâ strengths and weaknesses and choose your soldiers more wisely before sending them into battle.
Yes! The game runs smoothly on both mobile and desktop browsers, so you can wage war anywhere.
True soldiers never give up. If youâre still craving action and adventure, check out our huge collection ofwargames. For something a bit different, we recommend tryingKingdom Attack. Itâs all about strategy, but with a fresh twist that will test your skills in new ways. So, are you ready for your next adventure on the battlefield?
short_description: Create and command epic battles in Battle Simulator Sandbox. Build armies, test strategies, and watch physics-driven chaos unfold.

title: American Touchdown
description:
American Touchdownis a 2 player ball game where you try to carry the ball to the opponent's side. If the ball is in your opponent's hand, you need to carefully approach him and take it from his hand. Of course, your hands must be in a suitable position to receive the ball. This match will be fascinating!
Take the ball in your hand and move towards the other side's goal. Your character's arms will be moving automatically. Therefore, when it is in your opponent's hands, in order to receive it, approach the ball carefully and make sure your arms are in a suitable position. Skillfully maneuver your character's automatic moves and get the scores!
The game starts with a countdown. Afterward, you are now face-to-face with your opponent on the field. Your character's arms move automatically, and the character jumps on its own. The game is all about controlling these movements. Master how to take possession of the ball and win matches.
If you want, you can play American Touchdown with a friend. It has a two-player mode. Select "2 Players" from the main menu and play the game for two. Take your friend against you and have a head-to-head match!
Both characters have automatic moves. Both of their arms move automatically, and they jump automatically while moving. In order to receive the ball, you must approach your opponent carefully, and the direction of your arms must be precisely in line with the ball.
In American football, if a player manages to reach the opponent's end zone with the ball, this is called a touchdown.
1 Player
2 Player
If you love playing American Touchdown, we have other options for you. You may tryTap Tap Shots, where you try to send the balls to the basket. It is a one-button basketball game that you can enjoy playing. Or, you may give a chance toFootball Legends. It offers you prominent football clubs and famous footballers to play with. You may also view theball gamestag on OnlineGames.io.
short_description: American Touchdown is a pixelated soccer game where you try to grab the ball from your opponent's circling arms and carry it into his court.

title: Duck Life Adventure
description:
Duck Life Adventureis an arcade game where players embark on a journey with a determined duckling ready to become an adventurer. The action is set in a vibrant world filled with many sceneries, challenges and mini-games where you need to train the duckling in important skills such as swimming, flying, and running to enhance its abilities. During the gameplay, you will be able to collect coins, complete quests and battle rival ducks.
The plan is to help the determined duck to run away from home and reach Egg Island to train hard in dojos. Once he arrives, Dori will be ready to greet and offer essential tips for navigating the game's RPG elements.Â
You will be captivated by the 16 engaging training minigames, each designed to prepare their duckling for the exciting challenges ahead, including intense battles and competitive races. Before starting the game, you must create your duck avatar and appearance by selecting its color, body form and hairstyle.Â
After you make the last arrangements, you will let the duck go into the cozy living roomand watch an inspiring interview with Marco, the famous adventurer. Even though his mother disapproves of his adventurous aspirations, he still wants to embark on the journey to Quack Street. In this area, he will meet and interact with many ducklings who will talk, share their own stories and provide some clues that could guide him toward Egg Island.Â
There are more Duck Life games available. Next you can play Duck Life Battle to keep the adventure alive!Â
short_description: Let your genetically modified duck embark on a new adventure!

title: Italian Brainrot Bike Rush
description:
InItalian Brainrot Bike Rush, thereâs no real rush because the road to victory never seems to end. Your goal is to master your bike skills and be ready for whatever comes next. You have to jump fast and avoid every crazy obstacle, or you might evaporate and have to start all over again!
Italian Brainrot Bike Rushis a wild bike game where the viral TikTok meme meets an endless parkour track filled with surprising jumps and tricky obstacles. Choose one of the funny brainrot characters, ride across floating platforms, avoid traps, and test how fast your reflexes are.
The game gets even more exciting with the choice of one-player or two-player modes. You can race on your own or challenge a friend for extra fun!
The gameplay is simple:ride your bike along a long sky-high road, try not to fall, stay clear of obstacles, and collect coins to unlock new skins. The game has five levels:Easy,Medium,Hard,Very Hard, andInsane. You can play alone or challenge a friend for extra fun.
Whenever you start playing, you can choose betweenNormalmode,Challengemode, orOne Life.
Normal ModeRide your bike through the endless, exciting path. After reaching checkpoints, if you fall, you restart from your last checkpoint.
Challenge ModeYou are timed. Try to beat your best score. This mode is even more fun when you race against a friend.
One LifeJust like the name says: if you fall, itâs game over.
Tung Tung Tung Tung Tung Tung Parkour!
One PlayerÂ
Two PlayerÂ
Others
Yes. Your levels, skins, characters, and best times are saved, so you can always come back and keep playing right where you stopped.

title: Blocky Parkour Ninja
description:
This is the world of pixelated cubes and a ninja. Welcome to a world similar to Minecraft!Blocky Parkour Ninjais a free parkour game where the ninja jumps between the blocks without falling into the water. He set out on this path to sharpen his own skills. But moving forward in this world will take work. Because at the slightest carelessness of the player, the ninja may fall into the water. And eventually, this deadly water swallows him. You have to fight not to fall into the water. Complete the parkour as soon as possible! Because every second you spend on parkour counts. Here, your reflexes and quick wit will be tested.
Blocky Parkour Ninja is a simple but challenging game.The difficulty will escalate quickly as you level up.The game consists of 60 exciting levels, and different scenarios await you in each one.The difficulty of the levels will gradually increase.You are controlling the ninjawith a first personview. And here, you need to reach the finish line by passing all the blocks without falling. The sooner you finish the level, the better because you are kept on a stopwatch while playing the game.

title: The House
description:
The Houseis an online escape game where you awake, disoriented, in a bedroom with no memory of how you got there. You sense that something is wrong. You drag yourself out of bed and glance out the window. Beyond it, chaos unfolds. Broken objects, buildings, trees and more float ominously in mid-air. Something feels unnatural in the atmosphere.Â Â
In this adventure escape room game with a horror theme, you must search every corner of the house. Collect keys or seemingly ordinary items that hold the key to your freedom.
The puzzles are not simple logic tests but they also unfold another layer of horror and mystery. You need to solve out visual and numerical challenges that will push your mind. The floor creaks as though someoneâor somethingâis moving just beyond your sight. Time is running out, and the house is growing impatient. Will you escape, or will the house claim you as its latest victim?
Use your mouse to interact with the environment.
The House is an open-source escape puzzle with a scary theme. The game doesn't rely solely on jump scares. The music and art style of the House creates a chill atmosphere. If you attentively play it, you can escape the house and reach the game's end within roughly 30 minutes.
Artur Kot created The House.
If the tension of The House had you on edge, you'll findHorror Grannyjust as thrilling. Horror Granny is another escape room-style scary game where you try to escape from a mental hospital. Outwit the granny who patrols the place all over.
short_description: The House is an online escape puzzle with a scary theme. Will you escape, or will the house claim you as its latest victim?

title: Boat Simulator
description:
We have brought the coziest game to your door.Boat Simulatoris a 3D simulator game where you steer a range of sea vehicles without any rules or restrictions. You are completely free here, and you decide what to do. It is entirely up to you which vessel you will drive and in which direction you will proceed. Put on your PJs or comfy clothes, play some relaxing music, and you are ready for a cozy gaming experience.Â
Be ready to set sail! We're embarking on a journey along long rivers and open seas. Boat Simulator offers you a range of sea vehicles. You can access a yacht or cargo ship or even use a submarine here. To add excitement to your gaming experience, try something using the sea tracks. For example, jumping off the tracks at full speed on a jet ski can stimulate your adrenaline. You will be ready after choosing the viewpoint you will drive on from the menu.
One of the most extraordinary things Boat Simulator has to offer is the use of a submarine. Select your submarine by pressing V. Then, you can look for a way to the bottom of the sea by pulling down the "Submarine Depth" line on the game screen's left side. You decide how deep to go. But be careful not to hit any mounds.
Since the operating purpose of each marine vehicle offered in the game is different and their mass and weight also differ from each other, acceleration, deceleration and maneuvering speeds may vary depending on the vehicle type. We recommend that you keep this in mind when sailing offshore.
If you enjoy playing the Boat Simulator, we suggest you try out theReal Flight Simulator, which is another simulator game where you steer not a boat but a huge airplane this time. Visit theDriving GamesandSimulatortags on OnlineGames.io to play our other free online games.
short_description: We have brought the coziest game to your door. Boat Simulator is a 3D simulator game where you steer a…

title: Monster Dash
description:
Even though it sounds like one,Monster Dashdoesnât need to be a nightmare. Youâre a fearless hero running through worlds full of monsters. Get ready to sprint through spooky places filled with mummies, vampires, and even yetis. Jump over traps, blast the monsters, and keep moving forward. Stay alert, stay fast, and see how far you can go without getting caught.
Monster Dashis a super fun running game where you keep moving forward and fight off monsters that appear out of nowhere. Some monsters fall from the sky like rain or appear out of nowhere, while others crawl toward you when you least expect them. You have to stay alert, use quick reflexes to shoot fire at them, and keep your cool to survive.
Try to run as many kilometers as you can, because the longer you run, the faster you become. But be careful, the farther you go, the more obstacles you will face. Once you reach certain points, the environment will change and bring new challenges your way.
The gameplay is simple:all you have to do is run, jump, avoid sharp obstacles, and protect yourself when monsters appear. Donât lose your lives or fall into holes, or itâs game over. Keep running to beat your best score and unlock awesome achievements to brag about. And even if you lose, no worries! You can jump right back in and explore creepy worlds likeZombie Metropolis,Yeti Heights,Demon Dynasty,Vampire Kingdom, andTomb Town. Each world appears randomly, so you never know where your next run will take you.
Run like your life depends on it, but avoid running into monsters!
No worries. Extra lives appear randomly while you are running. You just need to be quick enough to jump and catch them to make sure you are backed up.
If you love running games likeMonster Dash, thenGeometry Rashmight become your new favorite. It is a bit more challenging and needs better skills, but if you stay focused and keep pushing yourself, you might hit your new highest score!
short_description: Run, jump, and blast monsters in Monster Dash. Explore random worlds, collect treasures, and test your reflexes in this endless action adventure.

title: Police Simulator
description:
Ever dreamed of being a cop just to drive a super cool police car?Police Simulatormakes it happen. Hop in, turn on the sirens, and show your driving skills as you zoom through the city to catch the bad guys. Keep the streets safe and have fun being the coolest cop out there.
Police Simulatoris an exciting driving game where you get to live the life of a real cop on duty. Patrol the streets, take on tough missions, and show that you can handle anything the city throws at you. Every mission is a new challenge, and some are timed, so stay alert and act fast!
Complete missions, earn rewards, unlock awesome police cars, and rise to the top as the best officer in town. Whether youâre racing against time, helping people, or catching bad guys, every move you make brings you closer to becoming a legendary cop!
The gameplay is simple:choose your car, hitPlay, and start driving. Youâll get calls to take on missions, and itâs up to you to accept or decline them. The more missions you complete, the more rewards youâll earn. Choose from 10 cars, each with different features, and take control of the streets to catch the bad drivers.
Itâs time for some real police action!
Yes! All your progress is saved, including every police car you unlock in your garage. You can always come back and keep playing right where you left off.
Donât be disappointed! Youâll get more calls and new chances to complete missions and keep moving up the ranks.
Yes! Each car has different acceleration, speed, and handling, so picking the right one can help you complete missions faster and catch bad guys more easily.
If you feel ready for more police action, tryPolice Real Chase Car Simulator. Get in your cop car, explore a big city, take mission calls, and chase bad guys in exciting street races, all wrapped up in a more realistic gameplay experience this time.
short_description: Drive, chase, and protect the city in Police Simulator. Complete missions, unlock cool cars, and prove youâre the best cop on the streets.

title: Football King

Are you ready to shake things up in unique stadiums?Football Kingis a 2D sports game in which you direct your football player and try to score as many goals as you can. In the two-player mode, you can challenge your friend on the field.
Or, play against the CPU in the single-player mode. Feel free to participate in quick matches or tournaments in each mode. All the choices are yours in this arcade game! Show your best footballer skills to your rivals.
Single Player
Two Players
Player 1
Player 2
Mobile Devices
In each mode, you can choose between five unique stadiums to play on.
Your main objective in this soccer game is to defend your goal post while trying to score as many goals as possible. Use your super shots to perform magnetic shots. You will see an icon with a flame in the lower-left corner of the screen.
When this icon is fulfilled, you are free to perform super shoots. They will enable your footballer to shoot the ball fiercely! Compared to the regular shot, the super shot is more difficult for the opponent to block.
