title: Idle Dev Startup
description:
Idle Dev Startupis an idleclicker gamewhere the player takes on the role of a software developer trying to make and market applications as a means of making money. This business endeavor will necessitate a complete start from scratch. You must, therefore, exercise patience while the company expands. You'll be glad to see the success of your startup in time!
There's a lot of work ahead of you. It could be challenging to make something from scratch. But you can manage tasks well if you know how to step forward. Creating an app is where you'll start. In the future, you will be able to unlock more tiers as you produce code and make money. Bringing on new employees will significantly improve your task.
Recruiting employees is the most effective way to grow a business and boost output. Hiring interns will help you progress because you won't have much money initially. They will gain experience, and you will gain assistance. Everyone wins in this scenario!
When workers are happy, they will work more efficiently. Occasionally provide breaks for your staff. Let them use the foosball table at work as a stress reliever. From the bar on the upper right corner of the game screen, you may monitor their emotional state. It's time to let them enjoy themselves if this bar is low.
The bottom of the game screen has a few icons that you may see. These categories can be used to help you make efforts to grow your business. Remember to take a moment to read the brief description that follows each enhancement to discover the benefits that each addition and development will bring to your company.
You might like to checkIdle Startup Tycoonif you like playing management games. Investing in and watching your startup concept grow is possible in this game. You'll enter the business world by developing a food delivery app.
Look up other freeidle gameson OnlineGames.io for further options by following the link. Please bookmark the site to your favorites so that you can easily return!
short_description: In the clicker game Idle Dev Startup, players can make money by writing code and creating apps. Hire employees, start promoting and watch your business grow!

title: Unicorn Beauty Salon
description:
Unicorn Beauty Salonis an online dress up game where the player's role is being a unicorn's stylist. The player will prepare the magical unicorn, starting with her makeup, choosing her eyelashes and blush. Then, you will complete the preparation by choosing her outfit and accessories. As a unique stylist, you need to make her stand out among all the unicorns. Are you ready to shine your light on the little pony in this unicorn game?
Turn on your creativity and create the most stylish pony! As a beloved stylist, So far, you have prepared many high school girls and even cute owls and rabbits. It's the pony's turn now.
The final stage of preparation is to determine the pony's clothes and accessories. Dress her in a stylish blouse, put a sticker on her cheek, add a crown to her head if you want, and choose a necklace for her. Of course, never forget the shoes. Here she is, ready in all her glory!

title: Galactic Sniper
description:
The intergalactic race is heating up. You get to take the role of a member of an elite team that recently discovered a planet. Humanoid robots deployed by aliens are spying on your research base. As the skilled sniper of your squad, your task is to take down mechs one by one. Now, go hunt some humanoids on a planet you know very little about. A mission couldnât be more exciting!
Galactic Sniper is a free online shooting game with intuitive controls. Various types of mechs, 30 levels with increasing difficulty, and an exciting sniper duty await you. You can play the game for free on OnlineGames.io, on a mobile or a computer.Â Â
Computers
Hold the left or right mouse button to aim and release to shootÂ
Mobiles
Tap and hold to aim, release to shootÂ
Start off with the first level, where you need to shoot one robot with 3 bullets in your pocket. Right-click to aim and release it to shoot. Take down spy robots in the first few levels until you adjust to the game. After the third level, you'll come across moving robots, which are more difficult to target.Â
Mechs are moving around, tracking your base and taking pictures of it. Some of them are very fast, so you should focus while targeting them.Â
Observe their patterns and anticipate their paths. Lead your shots to intercept their paths. Try shooting a little ahead of their trajectory. In this way, until the bullet arrives, mechs will be in the spot you aimed.Â
You can practice how far from the mechs to aim a few times to find the ideal length.Â
You have limited ammo; use your bullets efficiently and don't take any careless shots.Â
Assess your targets and available ammo at the outset of each level, devising a strategy for maximum efficiency. You can check the number of bullets at the top of your screen.Â
FreezeNova created this game.
If you like mobile friendly sniper games like Galactic Sniper and enjoy gameplay without any complex controls, your next stop isSniper Elite. With thousands of players online everyday, it's one of the fun and casual sniper games of ours.Â
In case you're looking for a more in-depth experience with 3D realistic visuals, take a look at our vastFPS gamescatalogue to pick among great titles.
short_description: Humanoid robots deployed by aliens are spying on your base. As the sniper of your squad, your task is to take down mechs one by one in Galactic Sniper.

title: Conquer Kingdoms
description:
Ready to play a 3D strategy adventure like Clash of Clans on your browser? MeetConquer Kingdoms, a free online game that puts you in charge of a fearless king and his five trusty soldiers. Youâll explore lands, collect treasures, and battle with enemies to build your kingdom. Strap on your crown, pick up your sword, and let the conquest begin. Enjoy this game online, build your dream fortress, and fight for every inch of territory you can claim. Your kingdom awaits so go forth and conquer!
In Conquer Kingdoms, you begin with a squad of five soldiers. Theyâll follow your every move, so guide them into unknown territory to battle the red-armored foes. Once you triumph, treasure chests await you, as their king, just walk over them to pick them up. But keep in mind, your army members can also act as servants to carry your loot, which means fewer fighters if you face another enemy. So donât get greedy! First, you will need a unique name to play the game. Insert your nickname into the empty box on the main menu. Now, you are ready to get your territory by drawing lines and establishing the area. As other players can catch your tail, you may also accidentally swallow your own! Biting your tail will cause you to lose the game. Therefore, we recommend that you do not let this happen. Do not swallow your tail!

title: EvoWorld io FlyOrDie
description:
EvoWorld io FlyorDieis a 2D survival game where you, born as a tiny fly, try to evolve by eating stuff with a green frame, among many other online players. There are 45 different animals. You will turn into a butterfly as you eat more food. After a butterfly, you will become a mosquito. It is the evolution process. Eat food, evolve into a stronger animal, and not get killed by predators in thisanimal game! ð
Every animal has a unique ability. You can use this ability to your advantage in order to make progress in a short time. You will start playing as a fly, and the fly's special ability is the beginner's Luck. It gives you a 50% chance to avoid predators' attacks. As you evolve, your animal species will change. Your special ability also changes, and you will have more potent abilities.
You should keep evolving to survive among other players in the shoes of mighty animals. There are 8 stages of evolution and 45 animals, from the smallest to the most dangerous. You must evolve into more powerful animals by hunting everything you can. In the meantime, you should avoid those who could harm you.
You will see three bars at the top of the screen. The pink one shows you how much food and animals you should eat to evolve into another animal. The light blue one tells you your oxygen level. It is crucial to check this bar when you are under the water and above the sky. The last one, the dark blue, points to the water level. If this bar drops to zero, you could die from thirst.

description:
Some games are fun, some are clever, and then there's2048, a perfect blend of both. It's one of those rare gems that manages to be simple yet endlessly engaging. Whether you're a numbers whiz or just love a good brain teaser, 2048 has something for everyone.
At first glance, 2048 might look like just another puzzle game, but spend a few minutes sliding those tiles, and you'll see why it's become a global sensation.
The premise is to combine tiles with matching numbers to merge them into that 2048 tile. The game starts slow, with tiny numbers like 2 and 4 sliding across the board. But soon enough, you'll be juggling 64s, 128s, and beyond.
A small reminder: don't let its minimalistic design fool you; this game is as much about strategy as it is about luck. What makes 2048 stand out over a decade is its simplicity. There's no timer, no levels, and no complicated rules. It's just you, the grid, and your wits. And yet, every move matters.
In March 2014, Gabriele Cirulli set out to create a simple game as a personal coding challenge. The result? 2048. Cirulli drew inspiration from existing games like 1024, but he added his own twist. By focusing on the powers of two and stripping away any unnecessary complexity, he created a game that was approachable yet challenging. 2048 got so popular that it's been used in classrooms to teach basic math concepts.
Here's a fun fact: Cirulli himself admits he's never actually reached the 2048 tile. If the creator couldn't do it, you know you're in for a tough challenge!
One of the best things about 2048 is its accessibility. You can play it on virtually any device with a browser. Whether you're on a laptop, tablet, Chromebook, or your mobile 2048 is always just a click away on OnlineGames.io.
More than a decade later, 2048 is still going strong. It's been played by millions worldwide, appearing on everything from smartphones to smart fridges (just kiddin'). Its simplicity and replayability ensure it remains a staple in the world of casual gaming. So, why not start sliding those tiles right now? Who knows? You might just hit a new personal best!
And if youâre searching for morebrain games online, you can access dozens of them for free on OnlineGames.io
short_description: Play the timeless game of 2048, the addictive puzzle where you slide, merge, and see how high you can score!

title: Sudoku
description:
Sudoku Onlinehas long been one of the most beloved brain games, offering a perfect mix of logic and concentration. This online version of Sudoku helps both beginners and seasoned players improve their skills, with a sleek design and features. Online Sudoku is the perfect way to enjoy the classic puzzle.
The charm of one-player puzzle games lies in their ability to adapt to your mood, offering both customization and a sense of comfort. What sets this Sudoku game apart is how effortlessly it fits into your routine. With its clean layout and multiple difficulty levels, it feels like acozy gamedesigned just for you. Whether youâre chilling on a slow afternoon, sipping coffee with your dog curled up beside you, or pushing yourself to beat your personal best.
Use your mouse or tap to play
Youâve got nine smaller 3x3 grids making up a 9x9 grid. Some numbers are already placed for you, and your job is to fill in the rest.
The catch is each row, each column, and each of those 3x3 squares needs to contain the numbers 1 through 9 without repeating any. No guessing, no duplicates, just pure logic guiding every move.
Some puzzles practically solve themselves, while others will have you staring at the screen, double-checking possibilities, and maybe even wondering if you made a mistake five moves ago. But when everything clicks into place? Thatâs the magic of Sudoku.
Sometimes the simplest things make the biggest impact. This Sudoku gameâs clean and crisp design ensures there are no distractions as you solve the puzzle. The focus is entirely on the grid, so you can concentrate fully on each move you make. Whether you're playing on your phone or a tablet, the interface is smooth and easy to navigate, providing the perfect space to unwind or give your brain a workout.
Sudoku is all about progression, and this game does an excellent job of catering to players at every level. Choose from five difficulty settings: Easy, Medium, Hard, Expert, and Master. Each difficulty level has its own unique challenge, with fewer pre-filled numbers as you advance. Starting with the easy levels gives newcomers a chance to familiarize themselves with the rules.
Not all players approach puzzles in the same way, and this game offers plenty of flexibility to suit different styles. Made a mistake? Hit the undo button and try again without penalty. Want to take a break but keep track of your progress? The pause and continue timer feature is perfect for short sessions or longer playtimes. Plus, if you need a little extra help, you can use one of the three hints available.
For those who like to take a methodical approach to solving puzzles, the toggle notes feature is a game-changer. Instead of scribbling on paper, you can make notes directly in the game. This feature lets you jot down possible numbers in each cell, giving you the freedom to visualize potential solutions before committing.
You get two mistakes, but on the third, itâs game over. This makes every move feel important and the perfect way to take your skills to the next level while testing your ability to solve puzzles under pressure.
If you're a Sudoku enthusiast or just looking for a fun brain challenge, this game is an excellent way to spend your time. From its simple, distraction-free interface to the wide range of difficulty levels and helpful features, itâs a puzzle game that meets you where you are in your journey. And if you're looking forfresh puzzle games to play online, don't forget to bookmark our site (Ctrl +D) because we regularly add new and fresh games every week.Â Â

short_description: Relax and challenge your mind with this beautifully designed Sudoku game. With five difficulty levels, smart hints, and a clean layout, itâs Sudoku at its best!

title: Electron Dash
description:
Electron Dash is an endless game in which the blue tunnel has no end. Your primary mission here is to get a higher score. You are racing against yourself here. Break your own record and reach new experiences every time you play.
As you run through the tunnel, you will encounter red lasers. It is important that you do not touch these. You must overcome them by jumping over them and running left and right. Otherwise, you will lose the game.
Another obstacle you will encounter in the tunnel is the gaps in the tunnels. No one wants to slip through them and disappear into the void of space. So pay attention here. Sometimes, while you are running, the layers of the tunnel disappear synchronously, allowing you to slide through this gap. You have to run with full caution.
Of course, you will not only encounter obstacles as you progress on the road. You'll also see power-ups with heart icons. If you collect these, you can respawn when you lose the game.
Additionally, we can give you an essential tip. Watch out for the light-colored platforms because as soon as you step on them, they will disappear. You need to act quickly.

title: Fancy Pants
description:
Fancy Pantsis a 2D adventure game where you guide a stickman with cool pants on various platforms. You need to help him move forward, navigating the maze. However, there are many obstacles to overcome and spiders are waiting to attack you!
Find ways to avoid or defeat the evil creatures. Additionally, don't forget to collect the squiggles in this arcade game. Will you be able to complete this adventure in The Fancy Pants Adventure: World 1?
There will be black spiders running towards you when you enter the maze. If they get close to you, they will attack you. You need to pay attention to the health bar in the upper left corner.
This bar starts dropping to zero each time these creatures attack you. Therefore, jump over them by pressing the S key to escape. Or, you can jump right on top of them and crush them. Keep in mind that you have only three lives in total!
Spiders aren't the only creatures that will cause you trouble. There will be a mouse standing near the exit door. He is waiting for you with his gun! Once he sees you, he will try to shoot you down.
Dodge his bullets and get over him to reach the door. If he manages to take your life, you will start the level from the beginning. You can send it into the void by jumping on it, just like you do with spiders!
Brad Borne developed Fancy Pants.
You may also try playingFireboy and Watergirl. You must control the Fireboy and the Watergirl in a cave. Make your way to their individual doors by overcoming the obstacles in the cave together!

title: Archery Master
description:
Ready your arrows and string your bow!Archery Masteris a dart-like sports game where you try to score best by hitting the bull's-eye. Rules are basic. The closer you can shoot the arrow to the center point, the more points you get. What you will need most in this game will be your ability to focus and aim. Enjoy the game!
Archery Master has three different game modes of varying difficulty. But they all have the same logic. All you have to do is take the arrow out of the bow to hit the target in the middle as much as possible. Or, at best, to shoot the circles closest to the midpoint. The closer you send your arrow to the middle point, the yellow zone, the higher your score will be. As you send arrows, you will get closer or further away from the target board with each shot. This is one of the challenges of the game. Your distance to the target will keep changing.Â
ââThis game offers three different game modes to diversify your gaming experience.
Playing Archery Master is very simple and fun. All you have to do is tension your bow's arrow with your mouse and send it to the target when it reaches a certain point. To do this, hold down the left mouse button to shoot the pointer, and when the time comes, release it.
Archery Apple Shooter, in which you attempt to shoot the apple on a guy's head with arrows, may appeal to you if you enjoy Archery Master. For more game alternatives, visitShooting Gamestags on OnlineGames.io.

title: Run 3D
description:
A group of aliens has set out on a crazy mission. And that is to reach the Sun! Their journey takes them through a series of mysterious space tunnels floating between the stars and planets. These tunnels hold unknown dangers, such as unstable tiles, unexpected gaps, and gravity-bending walls. The alien must keep running, jumping, and adapting to survive and reach their ultimate goal: the Sun. Every step brings them closer to the goal. But one wrong move and you send the alien into the void. Do you have what it takes to guide them through this endless cosmic game? If yes,start playing Run 3Dnow!
One of the most interesting part ofRun 3Dis the gravity rotation. Unlike standard platformers, this game allows you toshift gravity by running into the tunnel walls. When you move left or right and reach a wall, the entire tunnel rotates, making that surface the new floor. This feature opens up endless ways to navigate obstacles, avoid gaps, and find the safest route forward.
Secondly, the tunnel itself constantly changes shape. You wonât just be running through simple square corridors. Some tunnels have pentagons, hexagons, octagons, and even 10-sided polygons. As the number of sides increases, the tunnel feels wider and more unpredictable, making gravity rotation even more important. Some shapes offer easier paths, while others require precise movement to survive. Mastering gravity shifts and adapting to different tunnel shapes is key to lasting longer in Run 3D!
If you enjoy Run 3D, you might also like endlessrunningand platforming games that test your reflexes. Keep moving, keep jumping, and reach for the stars!
15 October, 2024
GM created run 3D.
Yes, Run 3D is completely free to play!
short_description: Run through ever-changing space tunnels in Run 3D! Rotate gravity, jump over gaps, and survive as tunnels shift between squares, pentagons, and more!

You will have a variety of missions. It is very enjoyable to wait for each task with excitement and ask what I will encounter at the next level!
Being able to make the most appropriate decisions is the key to this game. Because wrong choices will not take you forward, it will be necessary to understand the events and situations well and create strategic solutions accordingly. For example, it would not make sense to cover the hole area of ââa tanker leaking radioactive fluid with tape because that tape could break immediately.

title: Duck Life Battle
description:
Duck Life Battleis an arcade game where players embark on an adventure to train a duck for combat, turning them into invincible warriors. You should know that every duck can be customized with weapons, getting ready for the battles.ÂThe journey will begin at the training location, where the little duck will have an intense program to improve skills such as survival tactics and defense methods. ÂAlso, you can teach him about endurance and resilience, which are crucial for bearing up against the trials of combat.ÂCreate the duck's avatarÂThe duck needs to have its personal style so you can choose from an impressive palette of unique colors. Also, you can pick the hairstyle and personality, this way making the most interesting look. You will have to give your pretty animal a name that expresses its spirit.ÂOnce you arrive at the Farm, you will meet various ducks who are looking to invite you to battles. But don't hurry things; just before joining the fights, it is necessary to pay a visit to the training dojo. This is the perfect place to improve the skills, making sure the little duck is prepared for future fights. You can let him explore the area, interact with other ducks, and do the training to become victorious in the battles.Â
When you enter the training, you will be presented with five distinct training courses to make your duck invincible in the action game. You must find an excellent strategy to increase the level up to 20 of the five skills:ÂDefense:resist in front of the attack of other ducksÂHealth:boost the hit points during the battlesÂPower:create more damage to enemiesÂSpecial:special effect on the attack meterÂSpeed:boost the speed of the attackÂ

title: Neighborhood Defense
description:
Neighborhood Defenseis a fortified tower game that challenges players to defend their home from the never-ending waves of zombies. ÂIn this action-packed game, you must strategically place various unique defensive towers across the local map, each with its special strengths and abilities. The key point is to choose the right combination of towers to effectively combat various types of zombies, which can vary in speed, strength and special skills.ÂThe mission is as follows: Prevent any zombies from escaping and protect your beloved community from the relentless hordes of undead. As you maneuver your defenses, you'll be faced with the challenge of fighting off waves of zombies that get more dangerous with each passing moment. ÂWith 32 challenging sequences, you must carefully plan their tower placement and use defensive strategies to finish off each attacker effectively.Â
Withzombiesthreatening your neighborhood, it's essential to take more innovative steps to protect your neighborhood. You can start by choosing locations for your towers to maximize visibility and fire, ideally around corners or elevated areas. ÂA mixture of turrets should be used: some are quick blows to take down fast-moving zombies, others are slower or make it harder for local control. To lure zombies into the kill zone, consider placing trap towers where your firepower can overwhelm them.ÂIn your battle against the zombies, each of your four unique towers brings a unique advantage to your defense system.
To achieve your goal of defeating the zombies in this tower defense game, start by analyzing the map layout to determine the zombies' main attack paths. Due to the basic restriction of not allowing more than 14 zombies to escape, optimizing your turret placements and prioritizing upgrades early in the game is important.ÂThe first step is to equip the Archer Tower with the easiest option so, make sure there is a clear line of sight to eliminate immediate threats quickly. Move the Bomber Tower back and aim for the choke points set up by zombie groups. This position increases the potential for damage. The Sniper Tower should be placed to cover multiple lanes, ensuring it can take out any fast zombies that slip past other defenses. The Magic Tower should be in the middle to slow the advancing group effectively, giving you plenty of time to finish off your other towers.Â
As you progress through the waves and collect upgrade points, prioritize growing your turrets strategically to make them more effective against incoming zombies.ÂBy intelligently allocating your upgrade points to each tower and letting everyone progress appropriately to level 5, you'll build a well-rounded defense that can withstand the strongest waves, and ultimately, it will stop any zombies from escaping! You can upgrade the following abilities of the towers: Ââ¢ DamageÂâ¢ Fire RateÂâ¢ Attack SpeedÂâ¢ RangeÂâ¢ TargetÂâ¢ AccuracyÂ
short_description: Play Neighborhood Defense online for free at OnlineGames.io!

title: Breaking the Bank
description:
Remember the good old days of Flash games? Youâd fire up your browser, head straight to Newgrounds, and scroll through the latest wacky games. Maybe you just finished a game of Interactive Buddy or Fancy Pants Adventures and were looking for something new. Then you found it:Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank. A simple yet funny stick-figure game where every choice leads to chaos. That iconic Henry Stickmin art style, the goofy animations, and the trial-and-error gameplay made it an instant classic. Now, even after Flash is gone, you can still experience the fun right here on OnlineGames.io! No plug-ins needed!
Henry Stickmin is standing outside a heavily guarded bank. His goal? Get inside and grab the loot. Your job? Pick one of the six crazy methods to break in. Each choice leads to a unique (and usually ridiculous) outcome.
Spoiler alert:Every option ends in failure, but thatâs the fun! There is no ârightâ answer here. Just enjoy the fails! Breaking the Bank is the first game in the Henry Stickmin series, setting the stage for Henryâs future (mis)adventures. And hey, pay attention to small detailsâsome choices will reappear in later Henry Stickmin games.
Relive the golden era ofFlash gameswith Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank on OnlineGames.io. Whether you're playing it for the first time or diving back into childhood nostalgia, this game is always worth a laugh. Click to play and see which stupid choice youâll make first! And, if you love Breaking the Bank, you should check out the rest of the Henry Stickmin series, includingEscaping the PrisonandStealing the Diamond.Â
Â

title: Christmas Monster Truck
description:

description:

Your job is to make it a champion racer andearn money to rebuild your farm. Help the duckling participate in various training sessions in this crazy game! You will enjoy defeating other animals in running contests.

Train Flying
Train Swimming
In addition to the core skills it has to have, your duck also needsa certain energy levelto win the races. Otherwise, it can faint on the race track! So, it may not reach the final line. However, there is a solution!

If you enjoy playing Duck Life, you may also try playingCross The Road. In the game, you will guide a green frog to make it across the road. The main objective is to move forward as far as it can.

title: Snow Rush 3D
description:
Miss winter fun? With Snow Rush 3D, you can enjoy icyadventuresanytime! Hop on your sleigh, race through the snowy wild, and avoid trees, rocks, and snowmen while grabbing as many presents as you can. But watch out! Sliding on snow is tricky, so you'll need fast reflexes to stay in the game. Think you've got what it takes to master the ice? Let's find out!
Snow Rush 3Dis a fun and fast sleigh-riding game where you race through snowy hills and icy paths. Avoid trees, rocks, and snowmen while collecting as many presents as you can. The more you slide, the tougher it gets, so stay focused and keep your reflexes sharp. It's easy to play but takes skill to master. How far can you go before the snow gets you?
The gameplay is simple:control your sleigh and slide through the snow while avoiding trees, rocks, and snowmen. Try to stay alive as long as you can and beat your best score every time you play. Collect gifts to unlock new sleighs and make your ride even cooler. You can play solo or challenge a friend to see who's the real sleigh master! Sleigh all the way!
1 Player
2 Player
Yep! The game saves your progress automatically so you can keep going anytime. It also saves your sleigh and your best score, so youâll know what score to beat next time!
There are rocks, rolling snowballs, snowmen, trees, and super slippery icy spots. If youâre not careful, you can fall into the void or crash your sleigh, so keep your eyes on the trail!
If you like games with a three dimensional view, you should check outCrazy Plane Landing. Nowâs your chance to try flying a plane like a real pilot! Youâll do cool flips in the air and try to land safely on the runway. Itâs very similar to Snow Rush 3D, but this time the adrenaline reaches new heights!
short_description: Hop on your sleigh, master the ice! Snow Rush 3D is an adventure game where you slide on tricky snow.

title: Gigga io

title: Pinball Simulator
description:
Insert your virtual token and start to play!Pinball Simulatoris a simulator arcade game where you can play the ancient pinball game on a digital platform for free! It offers you two different themes: Day of Dead and Octopus Island. Choose which theme you want to play on, and try to keep the ball in the game! Maybe you'll like this more than the classics; who knows?
Once you have tapped the "Start," a pinball will be released into the plunger lane. This is where you will start your game. Then, pull the plunger to launch the ball. The harder you pull, the faster the ball will be launched. It will start moving on the track inside the machine. Direct the ball using flippers and keep it in play. This is the whole story of this game!
Flippers are the two tiny buttons or levers. Keep the ball in play by hitting it with the flippers. Your main objective is to keep the ball out of the drain at the base of the playing field.
The pinball machines' playfield has various objectives, bumpers, and features. You can get more points, activate special features, and raise your overall score by hitting these objectives.
Attempt to keep the ball in play as long as you can. Pay attention to the ball's trajectory and utilize the flippers wisely to keep the ball from falling down the drain. It takes skill to control the ball while shooting for targets. The game is over when you lose all your balls.
You can view separate leaderboard information for both themed pinball games. All you have to do is go to the main menu, select the relevant theme and tap on the "Leaderboard." Here, you can view the highest scores and their owners.
The way to be successful in any pinball game is to have good shooting skills. Enhance your aiming skills. The closer you hit the ball to the tip of the flipper, the further the ball will go in the opposite direction. You have to take this into account when making your shots.
If you enjoy playing Pinball Simulator, trySpeed PinballorBricks and Balls Pinballfor other pinball gaming experiences. Or you may look forarcade gameson OnlineGames.io for further alternatives by following the link.

title: Zero to Millionaire
description:
Zero to Millionaire!is an online idle game where you start from poverty. However, taking control of your life and rising in status is in your hands! Start working as a janitor to make money. But, hey! As you work hard, you will get much more prestigious jobs in this simulator game. Show everyone that a good life is created not by luck, but by hard work.
Actually, in Zero to Millionaire!, you were born as a rich son. But, over time, problems begin to surface between you and your father, a wealthy businessman. Then, he decides to take back all the investments he made in you. Now, you are completely broke.
You donât have a house nor a car. You donât even have anything to wear. You look like a complete homeless! Your main responsibility in this simulator game is to start from zero and become a millionaire. To show your dad that you donât need his money!
In the beginning, you need to start working as a janitor to gain income. As you complete the tasks, you will gain status points. And this way, you will find better jobs for yourself. If you make investments for your education and pass your exams successfully,Â  you will get professional jobs for yourself.
The best way to make more money is to educate your character. Enter the Education section from the menu, and you will see a bunch of courses. From getting a driving license to graduating from college, you need to acquire the necessary courses here. Below, you can find some of the courses that you can unlock.
Zero to Millionaire is developed by GamePush.

title: Duck Life 2
description:
Be your baby duckling sports coach and make him the champion racer!Duck Life 2is a 2D arcade game where you train your duck's core athletic abilities. You must make it ready for the running races.

After training your duck's skills and making it a strong athletic animal, it is now ready for the races. Each race has a track that involves using more than one ability. For example, the animals will run, fly and swim in theCliff Jumpingrace. If the duck gets ahead in running but falls behind in swimming, it can easily lose the race.
In the Race Central, you will see that this duck will travel the world for the races. It will start racing in Scotland. After winning competitions in Scotland, it will visit England, Egypt, Hawaii and Japan, respectively for the following races.
This game version comes with a new skill compared to the first release, Duck Life. In Duck Life 2, you will need to strengthen the duck's climbing ability as an addition.
It needs toclimb up by using each side of the canyon. Thus, its stamina will improve significantly. However, it shouldn't get caught on one of the edges. Otherwise, it will go out of the screen and lose the game.

title: Limousine Simulator
description:
Limousine Simulatoris a 2D driving game with 25 levels where you experience being a limo driver. Become a private chauffeur and give your passengers a comfortable ride. Park the limo smoothly and get generous tips.
Passengers are waiting for you to arrive at their destination. Drive the limousine and follow the yellow arrows to find the spots where they stand. Your passenger portfolio includes rich businesspersons, actresses, and even royalty. So, don't ruin your career by giving them a messy ride; they're influential.Â
Passengers prefer a safe trip. So stop at red lights and follow traffic rules. At each level, you'll begin with a full 3 stars. Every bump will cost you half a star. If you lose all 3 of them, you have to start over that level. God forbid, if you hit a passenger waiting for you, you lose all three stars at once.
Not only you should arrive at the destination safe and sound but also park your car thoroughly in the designated spots. We bet parallel parking has never been this much challenging before. It's a true test for your driving skills. When you park inside the yellow lines, wait a few seconds. The lines turn into green meaning you can drop off the passenger.Â
Some drop-off zones have arrows on them to indicate how you should position the limo's direction. You cannot complete the quest if you park in the wrong direction.
The game features 25 unique levels with increasing difficulty. The first few might come easy for you. However, as you progress, you'll face more tight turns, narrow streets, and longer wheelbase limousines. Also, the number of passengers to be taken increases at later levels.Â
Being a limousine driver is a tough and decent job, but if you're up to this challenge, play it on OnlineGames.io now!
WASD or arrow keys to drive the limousine
FreezeNova created this game.

title: Duck Life Space

You can access multiple universal states, train the duck and defeat alien competitors who stand between you and the crown. title: Formula 1 Driver

description:
My Tiny Marketis an online tycoon game where you own a supermarket. Plant tomato seeds, raise chickens and sell your products to your beloved customers. Hire a cashier and market clerk to help you manage your business. Restock shelves and serve your customers to the best of your ability!
You own a supermarket. And, it needs to function properly for your customers. Start by planting tomato seeds on your land and wait for the tomatoes to ripen. Then, move them to their shelves so that your customers can get them from there. In this idle game, make sure that your store keeps running at full speed!
To sell eggs, you need to get a chicken. Feed them with your tomatoes, and the chickens will give you fresh eggs. Afterwards, collect the eggs and move them to the egg shelf. You can also hire gardeners to do these jobs for you. This way, you can deal with other critical business management tasks.
Besides tomatoes, you can also plant wheat seeds in the green field. This way, you will also be selling wheat to your customers, and your income will multiply. Customers who know the freshness of your groceries will come straight to your store!
We suggest you hire as many workers as necessary. Because if there are so many workers around the market, managing them will not be easy.
Absolutely! You can customize your avatar and get great costumes for him from the Customization section.
Yes, your progress is saved automatically so that you can continue playing My Tiny Market any time you want.

When a customer comes to you with his/her shopping cart, take all the groceries from the cart one by one. Scan the barcodes of the products and enter their codes without any mistakes. Donât worry! You do not need to memorize the codes of each product. You can see their codes on the screen when you scan the barcodes.
From time to time, you need to arrange the shelves of many aisles. Especially the fruit and vegetable section. As it is one of the most used sections and needs to be in order. Make sure the watermelons, pears, and apples are where they should be!
After using the shopping carts, most of your customers usually leave the shopping carts in the middle of the parking lot. You need to collect all the shopping carts and return them to their designated areas.

When summer comes, we all look for icy drinks for cool refreshments. A cold drink is good for each of us in the scorching heat. Well, in this simulator game, we will make our cold drinks according to our desires.
We will use a freezer, ice trays, assorted fruits and a blender. Finally, we will choose one of the sweet straws. If you're ready, let's get to work without sweating anymore!

title: ASMR Pet Treatment
description:
ASMR Pet Treatmentis anonline simulator gamewhere you are a veterinarian. In the game, you need to take care of the kitties and puppies brought to your clinic. However, be careful! They are very shy. Approach them with compassion and love. Examine the little felines with care and cure their illnesses in this girl game!
These little kitties and puppies are covered in dirt, and they are a little sick. People outside found them on the street and brought them to your veterinary clinic. They are shivering from fear and cold. Letâs go and treat them!
First of all, they need a bath. Wash them with lukewarm water. Dry with a hair dryer. Clean their fleas from their little bodies. Help them get back their full health in this lovely animal game!
Start with treating the puppy. He needs a decent shower time as he is covered with dirt. Use the shower and clean his little body. Donât forget to dry him with a blow dryer.
Remove fleas from him and use puppy nail clippers for pawdicure! Wipe his nose with a napkin to get rid of the booger. Clean his ears and now he is completely well! Finally, spray him with perfume and dress him in nice costumes. Now, he has a style.
You also need to clean the kitty, but she is afraid of water. If you use the shower, she gets aggressive. So, wet a cloth and clean the shy kitty that way. When she starts to scream, give her a snack. It will be useful.
Catch all the fleas on her and remove them from her body. There is a frog under her belly. Find it and take it out. Treat her wounded tail with medicinal cream. Then, wrap her tail with a bandage!

title: Steal Brainrot Duel

title: Battleship War
description:
Battleship Waris an online board game in which you strive to locate your opponent's fleet and sink it deep into the ocean. Your adversary will also try to determine the location of your fleet and will launch missiles. Keep your fleet hidden well while you destroy your opponent's fleet!
Opening the game, a strategy panel will appear in front of you, with the coordinates visible. Drag the arrow to a certain place on the panel, and a missile will be launched by clicking. When you fire a shot and hit a ship in your opponent's fleet, you will see an explosion on the screen and debris left behind. This game will give you the excitement of the classic Admiral Sunk game!
The game's course is the same in advanced mode as it is in Classic mode. Differently, you can use two power-ups with the points you gather. Because the plane is half the price and can hit five squares at once, it is a better power-up to use early in the game than the sonar.
Trace the opponent's ship's position using the wreckage and eliminate the whole hull of the ship. You can do this by estimating the length and width of the ships in the opposing fleet and shooting the relevant locations in the sea.
Battleship War was created by codethislab.

title: Fast Food Manager
description:
Fast Food Manageris an online tycoon game where you play as the owner of a fast food restaurant. Welcome your customers with a warm smile and serve them your delicious hamburgers, Italian pizzas, and French fries. Try not to keep your customers waiting too long!
In this simulator game, you open your fast food restaurant in your neighborhood and start serving your customers with your special meals. You can deliver yummy hamburgers to them in the beginning.
As you gain income, you can also take orders for pizzas and French fries. Hiring chefs and waiters to help your restaurant function properly is a great option!
Additionally, you can earn money by watching ads. All you need to do is go over the YouTube sign and stay there for a couple of seconds. Then you are free to take your rewards and invest in your restaurant.
Your restaurant is starting to get a lot of attention, just like McDonaldâs. You are making good money. Now, itâs time to offer VIP service for your special customers. They are willing to pay you more than necessary, but they need your valuable attention. Do not lose touch with them!
Unlock new sections around your restaurant and begin serving beverages and ice creams to your customers. They really like your delicious fast food, and now they're asking for more!
Offer your customers a Drive-thru so they can order their meals and take them to go. This way, you can multiply your income, and customers will be able to place orders without getting out of their cars.

title: CubeCraft Survival
description:
CubeCraft Survivalis an online survival game inspired by Minecraft. The survival of the players depends on their strategy and crafting skills. In a dynamic open world, players are supposed to explore, craft and battle against the hostile creatures. There are as many dangers as there are opportunities in this blocky world!
CubeCraft Survival offers its players a world of creativity. However, the potential for survival is in the hands of the players. Their main responsibility in this Minecraft-inspired game is to wander around the blocky island, dig and collect the necessary materials for crafting vitals. For example, the players need to hunt pigs and get their meat for dinner. To make Fries and Meat, collecting meat, 2 potatoes and a coal ore is a must.
The players should gather the basic resources before crafting an object. This open world has many things to mine and collect. Wandering through forests and mountains, every player can easily find necessary materials such as iron bars, sticks, coal ore, and much more. There is a wide range of items that can be crafted. For example, a player can craft an Iron Axe with three iron bars and a stick.
When the night comes, there will be Zombies roaming around the isolated areas of the blocky island. To survive, a player needs to be prepared for encountering one of these wild creatures. Having an axe or a sword makes it easy for the player to fight zombies. There are many other weapons that players can craft. We will list some of them below.
Having a warm place to call home is important. Creating a simple shelter using wooden bricks to build walls is important, as well. This shelter can save a player from the dangers of the outside world, where zombies roam freely. Over time, stronger structures can also be built with solid materials such as Ultra Compressed Stones and Hyper Compressed Granites.
FreezeNova developed CubeCraft Survival.
Minecraft Classicis another option for you if you are fond of Minecraft games. In Minecraft Classic, there are no restrictions or limits. There is a wide range of bricks and blocks you can use to build your dream mansion.
You can also search for ourMinecraft Games Onlinelibrary for further engagement.
short_description: CubeCraft Survival is an online Minecraft game where you can survive only with your strategic thinking and crafting skills!

title: Ragdoll Fall
description:
Ragdoll Fallis a 2D arcade game where the player tries to hit the ground with the ragdoll. The player's score rises in direct proportion to how many times the ragdoll hits the ground successfully. With every game, the players aim to break their own records; thus, the only person competing with them here is themselves. Try Ragdoll Fall and give in to the irresistible charm of falling with the added pleasure of sharp wheels!
Throw the ragdoll and start the game! Your main goal is to maneuver the ragdoll such that it hits the concrete platform. Don't let it sound easy to fool you. As you move forward, the spaces between the concrete pillars get wider, and you'll come across thin, unstable ones. A fall through the gaps will bring disaster and force you to restart.
Along the path, there will be concrete surfaces with rotating wheels. Ragdoll will not be happy if it touches these wheels! The task is made more challenging by the occasional left and right movement of these wheels. Try to stay away from these as much as possible!
While you may find wide columns throughout the platform, you will also encounter extremely narrow columns. When you come across these narrow columns, you must either hit the ragdoll to the column exactly in the middle or avoid those columns. If not, there's a chance the ragdoll will fall to the void, and you'll start over.
You can play Ragdoll Fall on your Android or IOS device, desktop, tablet or Chromebook. All you need to play this game for free on our site is a stable internet connection.
There is no need to register to play the game. Just enter our site by typing OnlineGames.io in your browser and start playing directly after searching for the game in the search area.
Ragdoll Fall was created by Qky Games.
If you enjoy playing ragdoll games, you should giveStickman Ragdolla try. In Stickman Ragdoll, you have to figure out the best poses and moves to perform in order to cause the ragdoll to leap. Use your creativity to find the perfect combination. Alternatively, browse through other carefully curatedstickman gamescollection on OnlineGames.io. To ensure that you don't lose your gaming progress, please bookmark this page!
short_description: Ragdoll Fall is a thrilling arcade game. Make the ragdoll jump on the platform again and again and get the highest score!

title: Jeep Racing
description:
Jeep Racingis a 2D driving game in which the player controls a jeep car on a bumpy road at the foot of a mountain. It has many highs and lows. Use your precision steering skills to navigate the treacherous terrain and avoid any potential flips because a shock could force your vehicle to roll over. If you're up for it, we'll put you behind the wheel of one ofthebest driving games.
When the game starts, you can skip to the level selection screen by selecting the "Play" icon. You may start with the first level and drive your car to the mountain's base or choose a level to play from here. To enhance your gaming experience, modify your car before you begin driving on the grassy road.
Jeep Racing also has a multiplayer mode. To compete in online jeep racing against people all around the world, simply select "Multiplayer" at the bottom of the level selection page. The game will automatically place you in a 4-player room.
If your vehicle tends to flip over, you can try to return it to its original position by bouncing the vehicle. Or you can coordinate the vehicle by steering in the opposite direction to which the weight of your vehicle is moving.
If you like playing Jeep Racing, you might also enjoyArmy Driver. It is a game in which the player controls an army vehicle in a military setting. There will be lawbreakers who attack your vehicle. Move to the finish line with the least amount of damage.
You may look up otherracing gameson OnlineGames.io if you're seeking more gaming options. Please share your opinions on the game in the comments area!

title: Magic Tiles 3
description:
Magic Tiles 3is arhythm-based music gamewhere you can play your favorite music by tapping on the screen or the relevant keys on the keyboard. There are more than +45,000 songs at your disposal to play! Choose the ones that you love listening to and start playing them on the piano by following the tiles. ð¶
Are you ready to lose yourself in the rhythm of the music? Sit down at the piano. Itâs your turn to play in Magic Tiles 3! In the menu, you will see a wide range of songs listed. From well-known pop songs to R&B, hip-hop, and rock music. Pick one of them and start to play it without missing any notes. Try to score the best by tapping on the piano tiles in the corresponding lanes.
When you start the song, the tiles will slide across the screen in four lanes. You need to catch each tile by pressing the key for the relevant lane. We recommend using FGHJ keys because sometimes there are two tiles on the screen you need to catch. Using the mouse may cause you to miss a note. You need to press the piano keys at exactly the right time to achieve the highest score. Neither too early nor too late! Tap the black tiles and avoid the black ones.
There are two kinds of notes in Magic Tiles 3: the short notes and the longer ones. When you see a short note, it is okay to press the relevant key. However, when there is a long note, you need to hold the piano key until it disappears.
You can browse the songs by scrolling down the screen. There are tons of music from many different genres in the database. Additionally, you will see a label next to each song. These indicate the difficulty level of playing the song. The difficulty levels are, in order: âEasy, Normal, Hard, and Expert.â
An ad blocker most likely causes this. We recommend disabling the ad blocker from the âExtensionsâ tab.
Donât worry. Your scores are saved automatically, so you can pick up where you left off.

title: Winter Moto

title: Bouncy Musical Ball
description:
Bouncy Musical Ballis a rhythm-based arcade game where you must master navigating a jumpy ball and move forward on the tiles. They will show themselves according to the rhythm of the music you have chosen to play with. Move forward, abandoning yourself to the rhythm of the music. This endless music game allows you to go beyond the tiles as far as possible!ð¼
Avoid falling from the blocks. If the ball falls, the game will be over. You must catch all the blocks to go forward. It automatically jumps while trying to guide it, making your job a bit challenging. Mastering it to navigate may take some time.
There are standing and moving tiles on the road. The moving ones will make it hard for you to catch them. But if you can gather your concentration and move forward, you can easily overcome them. In addition, please do your best to place the ball right in the middle of the blocks, as it will enable you to collect bounce powers.
The game offers you a variety of music alternatives. There are lively tracks here, as well as relatively slower ones. In upbeat music, catching the tiles will be more challenging as they will appear faster. We will list a few of the tracks you can find below.
Mobile Devices
Bouncy Musical Ball was developed byFreezeNova.

title: Formula Traffic Racer
description:
Formula Traffic Raceris an online racing game where you can drive your modern Formula 1 car on the highway. As someone who enjoys driving at high speeds, driving in heavy traffic can sound boring. Letâs see how many kilometers you can drive your Formula 1 car without hitting any other vehicles!
Get in your Formula 1 racing car and head for the highway! Your main goal in this car game is to avoid hitting any vehicles in the flowing traffic on the road. Just as you do inHighway Traffic, it may sound easy, but can you imagine driving an F1 car on a highway? With such a strong car like this, it will be hard for you not to collide with any other vehicles. However, thatâs the point of Formula Traffic Racer!
As you drive Velocity X1 on the highway, it will not be surprising that there are lots of other vehicles on your way. There will be drivers suddenly trying to change lanes, taxis, ambulances and many more. You should avoid an accident; otherwise, your precious car may be damaged or even catch fire.
Here, the point is to drive the car as close as possible to other vehicles at high speeds and earn points by leaving them behind. You should adjust the proximity so that you donât hit it, but stay very close. Thatâs how you can earn the highest points in this Highway Traffic-like racing game.

title: Vice City Driver
description:
Vice City Driveris an online driving game inspired by GTA Vice City. Our protagonist is Tommy Vercetti with his unforgettable blue shirt. Take your puppy with you, get in your spectacular Ferrari-like sports car and start exploring the city. Make drifts and stunts to earn money to customize your car!
The gameplay is simple in Vice City Driver: take your dog with you, get in the car and start the engine. Think of this game as a world built around driving a sports car, like GTA Vice City. There are two modes in this GTA game: Drift Mode and Stunt Mode. You need to perform drifts or stunts to make credits. Use the credits to customize and upgrade your car, and get fuel for it. Of course, Tommy Vercetti will need an energy drink from time to time.
In the Drift Mode, try to get the highest points by hitting the brakes while turning the car, left or right. Keep in mind that if you crash into something with your car while drifting, you will lose the drift score.Â  Master avoiding any collisions with other vehicles or buildings. Also, there are Drift Trigger points in the city. Drive there and accept the task to gain money. For example, at one point, you gain +1000 CR by fulfilling the 4000 drifting points.
Be ready to jump your car off extremely high ramps in the Stunt Mode. If you can reach the yellow circles, you will earn +500 CR. Here is a pro tip: accelerate to high speed as you enter the ramps, and you'll pull off a successful stunt! Just like the Drift Trigger points, there are Speed Trigger points in the Stunt Mode. Reach 170 km/h and you'll get +1000 CR!
Fuego! Games developed Vice City Driver.
If you are into GTA Games, you may also tryGTA Simulator. In the game, you have some tasks to accomplish. Defeat the gangsters and earn rewards and diamonds.
For further options, check ourGTA Games Onlinegame tag, which includes free online games that you can enjoy playing.
short_description: Perform drifts and stunts with Tommy Vercetti and his dog in Vice City Driver! Earn credits to customize and upgrade your sports car.

title: Stickman Swing
description:
Stickman Swingis a 2D game where you control the iconic Stickman as he swings through challenging levels. You must guide Stickman through a series of tricky levels by swinging, using the rope's length and gravity to reach the end of the level. Make use of momentum, time your release and jump carefully to avoid falling into space.
The game requires a solid understanding of physics, making it both fun and mind-stimulating. It's like someone took a physics textbook, threw it out the window, and said, "Let's make a game out of this." The way you have to calculate momentum, timing, and gravity? It's educational... if you squint hard enough.
This simple 2D embodies the classic "easy to learn, hard to master" trope. The controls are straightforward â click, swing, release. Yet, mastering the art of the swing? That's where the real fun begins...
As you progress, the game introduces various obstacles like spikes, moving platforms, circles to swing around and walls. These increase the difficulty of your swings and add a challenge to reaching the next platform. You will also encounter jumping pads, and other tools that will ease your journey to the finish line.
To get different skins for Stickman, unlock new levels. Each costume adds a fun twist to the game. Skins include options like Ninja Stickman, Spiderman, Stickman King and more. Give the Stickman a wardrobe makeover he deserves!
There's something about swinging from one point to another that's oddly satisfying. Once you get into the rhythm, it's like you're in a weird, stick-figure ballet.
Stickman Swing is a free online game accessible on pretty much any device with a web browser, so I think it's perfect for those moments when you need a quick escape but can't access your usual gaming setup.
If you enjoy games where one misstep sends you careening into oblivion, then swing on over toGeometry Dash. Just remember, gravity isn't just a good idea; it's the law... in this game, at least.
short_description: Swing into action with Stickman Swing! Play it online for free on OnlineGames.io!

description:
After long and hot summer days, the weather is slowly getting colder. Sweater weather is approaching!Design With Me Fall Sweateris a 2D girl game in which you style three girls and help them design sweatshirts that they will wear on cold days.
Help them design their sweaters for the fall season. They love your taste in fashion. Start with their makeup and design long-sleeve sweaters in this fashion game. Make their fall unforgettable!
Desktops and Laptops
Mobile Devices
It's time to style sweaters so that they will stay warm. In this fashion game, there are four types of sweatshirts: a V-neck sweatshirt, a cropped sweatshirt, aÂ turtleneck sweatshirt and a mock turtleneck sweatshirt. Choose the one that suits the girl you are preparing the best!
Then, you will pick a knit pattern for the sweat. You are free to select the basic knit pattern, the cable knit, the Guernsey stitch, the waffle type of knit, or the rib stitch. After determining the pattern, give it a color from 12 different colors. Your last job is to add any vignette you want to the sweater.
It's time to complete the sweater you designed with accessories now! Choose shiny earrings and a necklace. You can also wear a beanie or glasses if you want. Then, do the girl's hair by picking up a hairstyle. Should her hair be short, straight or curly?

title: Unblock It 3D
description:
Power up your logic and spatial skills in Unblock It 3D, a free browser puzzle game you can play online at OnlineGames.io. You face a giant cube made of arrow-marked bricks. Your goal is to slide each cube away without bumping into other blocks. Classic Mode offers unlimited moves and hundreds of handcrafted puzzles. In Adventure Mode, you travel through five historic worlds: Ancient Egypt, Medieval Europe, the Aztec Empire, Feudal Japan, and more, using only a set number of moves per level.
At the start of each level, you see a large cluster made of smaller arrow-marked blocks. Your first task is to scan all six faces of this cluster by rotating the view. Look for blocks that are not blocked by any others in the direction their arrows point. When you find one, click (or swipe) it, and the block will slide off the cluster along that path. In Classic Mode, you can slide blocks at your own pace and take as many moves as you like until the cube is empty. The challenge grows as blocks come in different sizes, so you must think a few steps ahead to avoid creating dead ends.
Adventure Mode adds a move limit to each of its 25 levels. You begin in Ancient Egypt with simple, small clusters and plenty of moves. As you unlock new worldsâthrough Medieval Europe, the Aztec Empire, and Feudal Japanâthe puzzles grow larger and more complex. Here, every swipe matters. You'll need to plan a sequence of slides that clears the cube without running out of moves. Watch the counter in the corner and map out your path before making your first slide. Some levels hide a key block deep inside the cluster; you may need to clear the outer layers first to free up space. This mode tests both your planning and your patience.
If you get stuck, boosters can save the day. Unblock It 3D offers three handy power-ups you earn as you clear levels. The Arrow Switch lets you rotate any block's arrow, opening new paths. The Bomb removes a small cluster of blocks in one go, perfect when no slide will free a stubborn brick. The Hint highlights a single move you can make, guiding you out of tricky spots. Boosters refill slowly in Classic Mode but recharge faster in Adventure Mode when you finish a level under the move limit. Use them sparingly since your stock carries over between levels in Adventure Mode.
Azerion Casual Games built this 3D puzzle game to help players sharpen their minds without any complex rules. Their focus is simple: give you a clear goal, intuitive controls, and puzzles that grow with your skill.
If you enjoyed Unblock It 3D, thenBloxorzis perfect for you! This fun puzzle game presents a unique challenge where you move and tackle a rectangular block to fit it precisely into designated holes on the board. The gameplay is not only satisfying, but it also tests your spatial reasoning and problem-solving skills like Bloxorz. You can play this game without any cost, as all our puzzle games are completely free and accessible online. Plus, they can be played directly in your browser, making it easy to jump in and get started. Don't miss out on this fun opportunity to put your mind to the test!
short_description: Play Unblock It 3D online on OnlineGames.io and solve block puzzles right on your browser.

title: Bullet Master
description:
Bullet Masteris a physics puzzle game where you clear enemies by indirect shooting. Take control of a special agent in his mission to clear streets from the bad guys.
The special agent is a clever man. Even if the enemies are behind walls or hiding upstairs, he can figure out a way to eliminate them. He uses his knowledge of geometry and physics to do so. Create a path for his bullets. Make them hit the walls, and turn back so that the bullets somehow arrive in the enemies by hitting the objects.

title: Fashion Holic

Read your mails carefully and dress up the fashionista according to the dress code. This way, you can get the highest scores in this dress-up game!
Meet with Anastasiya! She is a gorgeous fashionista. She loves dressing up elegantly. And, she constantly posts her outfits on her Instagram. The number of followers is steadily increasing. She gets offers for various magazine photo shoots, fashion shows, and opening events. Get her new dresses and accessories, dress her up for each event, and post her looking her best on Instagram!
Enter your email address and read each email carefully. The event details will be sent to you via email. It says what kind of event you are being called for, what the dress code is, and how you should dress, Anastasiya. It is important to follow social norms. Itâs not appropriate to wear sportswear to an exquisite occasion.
To unlock new dresses, hairstyles and accessories, you need to successfully complete your quest. Moving to the next quest will enable you to unlock gorgeous and elegant outfits for the upcoming events. Anastasiya should be the one who attracts the most attention at an event! Donât forget to check your Instagram likes from time to time to earn income from your posts.

title: Hidden Objects
description:
Hidden Objectsis an online puzzle game with its rich content and visually stunning graphics. This game will take you to completely different parts of the world! You must find all hidden objects as you explore beautifully detailed scenes. When all the hidden objects are found within a level, what would be the next geographical region?
In each level, you will find yourself in the most beautiful scenes of the world. The first scene where hidden objects are found is during the Christmas season in the United States of America. You need to find pine tree decorations, Santa Claus ornaments, and deer-shaped cookies. Unlike other hidden object games, it wonât be easy here! Keep your eyes peeled and find every hidden item.
There is a panel at the bottom of the screen. You will see the hidden objects that need to be found there. Also, you will see numbers written under each item. These numbers indicate how many of that object you need to find. You should find them all without exception to proceed to the next scene!
In the case of struggling to find a specific object, you can use the hint option. However, keep in mind that you have limited hint options. We suggest you use them cleverly. Because the following levels will get harder to find items, each scene will test your observation skills! Playing this game will help you sharpen your perception without any doubt.
The scenes of Hidden Objects are truly very special. They have visually stunning graphics. Weâll list some of these scenes below for you!
Hidden Objects is published by TapNation.

Workbench can make tools and weapons. Before crafting any of them, you need to build a workbench. Collect 10 pieces of wood to craft the workbench. It is a must to have on this island! Weâve listed some things that you can create using the workbench below:

title: Grow a Garden: Online & Offline
description:
Grow a Garden: Online & Offlineis an online simulator game where you become a farmer. Plant seeds on your farm, wait for the harvest and sell your fruits and vegetables at the farmers' market. Unlock new kinds of plant seeds to increase your farmâs product diversity in this Roblox-inspired world!
In this farming game, you have a small plot of land. You need to buy seeds from the seed seller. Start by planting carrot seeds in your garden. After purchasing the seeds, head to your land and find a spot to sow them. Then, wait for the seeds to grow. Finally, harvest the crops and sell them to the seller. Keep in mind that the bigger the products, the more money you earn! As you make progress, you will be able to unlock exotic seeds such as raspberries, tomatoes, bamboos and blossoms like lilacs.
If you want to buy seeds but they are out of stock, we suggest you wait approximately 5 minutes. Every 5 minutes, Seeds Shop refreshes its stocks. Additionally, there will be new seeds to explore after the refresh time. Keep checking your local Seeds Shop!
There are lots of seeds to unlock. Begin farming by planting carrot seeds ($10), then move on to strawberries and blueberries. After that, you can get blossoms like lavender, manuka flowers, orange tulips, and roses. The most precious seed to sow in this simulation game is to reach the Obby Tree. Itâs the final seed to unlock. Before the Obby Tree, there is Ember Lily, which costs 15 million dollars!

title: Car Rush
description:
ÂCar Rushis a driving game in which you control a car alongside other automobiles and trucks on a highway. And your girlfriend is in the seat next to you. You must go cautiously on the roadway to ensure her and your own safety. You shouldn't collide with any automobiles while traveling forward. You must race this roadster to the finish line before time runs out. Enjoy one ofthebest driving gameswith excellent graphics! ð

As you progress through the game, two other amazing maps will be unlocked. While you progress with the mountain view on the first map, you will see the Egyptian pyramids behind you on the second map. On the third map, you will travel with the city's lights at night.
You will see many vehicles and even trucks driving with you along the road. They also move with high speed and with maneuvers. Colliding with any of them will slow you down, and you will lose time. Avoid any collisions to reach the finish line on time.
Like colliding with a car, going off the road also slows you down. You might even go off the highway and crash with a sign table or a tree. You may lose steering control, especially if you enter the turning points at a high speed. When making a sudden turn in such places, your vehicle may skid. Therefore, entering the turning points at an appropriate speed is essential.

When you come across them, feel free to chop them up! As you eliminate the players, you will level up and get bigger. Try to take your place on the leaderboard in this io game!
Besides other swordsmen, there are many wild animals on the map. You should pay attention to them as they may hurt you. Avoid the ones with the red eye. They can attack you. To dodge their attacks, you can run to the water channels. They can't get in there. The other animals won't touch you unless you do anything to them.
The red area you see on the mini-map is the Lava Field. It has lots of igneous rocks. If you touch any of them, your health bar will start to decrease. When you enter the field, move forward cautiously. Stay away from the hot rocks. Remember, if you encounter an enemy while in contact with one of them, they will have the upper hand.
In close combat, swing your sword to your opponent. On the other hand, if you want to attack a rival who is far away, then use the C key and throw your sword at them. This way, you can hurt the opponents from afar. But keep in mind that you can't send swords successively. You have to wait a few seconds to send the second sword.
Desktops and Computers
Mobile Devices
Coder Gautam developed SwordBattle.io.
Mini Shootermay also take your interest. In the game, you will take control of your mini-character. You will encounter many other players in every corner. Take them down when you see them immediately!
If you are looking for more, we recommend you look at theio games onlineon OnlineGames.io. We believe you will find another enjoyable game. Additionally, keep coming back to discover new and thrilling games!
short_description: Take your sword with you! Eliminate all the online swordsmen by using your sword in SwordBattle.io, a 2D battle game.

title: Army Driver
description:
Customizing a jeep truck and getting in the driver's seat sounds cool, right? This jeep truck is embarking on a harrowing journey and must be prepared for anything. Because there are no good guys on the road.Army Driveris a gripping fusion of war games and car games where the player will progress through 30 levels. The men who will block the path are armed on this road. And they will not hesitate to shoot at the jeep truck. Getting rid of them by driving the vehicle is a main mission.
Start your adventure by customizing a jeep truck and battle with the armed forces. Tap to the "truck" icon in the menu and choose which vehicle you want to use. You can pick your favorite color among the range of car color options. You can also upgrade the engine and suspension power using your collected coins during the game. Press the next button and proceed to the level selection section. There are 30 levels. After choosing the level, you are ready to combat! As you progress with the jeep truck, you will encounter armed men, and their target will be you! You must try to crush them without letting them hit you; otherwise, your jeep will be damaged. Keep an eye on the health bar of the vehicle at the top of the screen.
The game has rich graphics, which makes the game more enjoyable. An attempt was made to create a realistic environment, from mud splashing on the jeep to the fire opened by the soldiers. Just enjoy this adrenaline-filled game with its vivid animations.
If you like Army Driver, you might likeUphill Jeep Driver, a free driving game in which you transport passengers in a jeep. You may also search for additional game options on OnlineGames.io using the tagsCar GamesandDriving Games.

title: Word Connect
description:
Word Connectis an online word-puzzle game where you try to guess words. Use your mind to create meaningful words and drag and drop the letters on the board. Fill in all the blank areas to get the highest scores in each level. Letâs see who is the real bookworm among us! ð
Your main goal in this Scrabble-inspired puzzle game is to find the relevant words by using the given letters. Hold down the mouse button and combine the letters to form a meaningful word. However, keep in mind that you can not create a word with the letters that are not listed. For example, there are E, C, K, R, S, and A letters on the board. You cannot write âSayâ, as there is no Y letter on the list.
You will be given a few letters on the game screen. Use these letters to form words that can fit into the blank areas. Try to guess the words according to the listed letters and the number of white blocks. Stimulate your brain for logical thinking and your vocabulary. As you make progress, you need to find much more complicated words!
Having trouble finding the right word? Donât worry! You have limited Hint, Word and Letter options to help you find the necessary words. The âHintâ option gives you a description for the related word, just like Tabu. And, you need to figure out the word by the description. The âLetterâ section gives you one of the letters in a specific word. Finally, the âWordâ option opens a complete world that is on the board.
Freezenova developed Word Connect.
If you enjoy playing Word Connect, you may also giveSkribblioa chance! In the game, you need to choose a word and draw it on the board. Let other players guess the world. For more options, check out our extended selection ofonline puzzle gamesusing the link!
short_description: Stimulate your brain and guess the words using the given letters in Word Connect, an online word puzzle game! Enjoy forming meaningful words.

title: Archers Random
description:
Archers Randomis an online stickman game that you can play with a friend with its 2-player option. Set your target and draw back the bow! Shoot your opponents with precise aiming and hit them in the heart. Try not to tire your arm while drawing the bow, as you will need your power!
1 Player
2 Player
Player 1
Player 2
Welcome to the world of flying arrows! Keep your bow with you wherever you go in this shooting game, as you will need it most. There are 2 game modes: 1 Player and 2 Player. Choose what you want: Duel with a friend or fight against dozens of archers alone. In either case, an exciting adventure awaits you!
You must shoot all your opponents one by one to move to the next stage. Take aim, draw the bow and let the arrow fly. However, your stickmanâs arm will get tired from constantly drawing the bow. You need to check the Arm Power barometer in the upper left corner of the screen. If this bar gets too low, your stickman may not be able to perform a precise hit.
As you eliminate other rival archers, you will unlock new kinds of arrows with special abilities. Itâs important to unlock them as the basic arrow allows you to create a moderate impact on the opponents. With special arrows, you might take down the rivalries even with one arrow hit! You can find the special arrows listed below.
Goolandia developed Archers Random.
Did you like playing Archers Random? You may also try playingGet on Top. Wrestle colorful stickmen, try to get on top, and be the winner! There are dozens of free online games at your disposal ononlinegames.io. Visit ourStickman Games Onlinelibrary for further adventures.

title: Fall Boys
description:
Fall Boysis a multiplayer racing game where the player races with other online players on parkour courses. Conquer the obstacles, such as swinging pendulums or rotating bars on the platform, and be the one who gets to the finish line first. There will be many challenging barriers on the path. Make strategic movements and overcome them in one of the craziestparkour games!
We believe that you will find the satisfaction you get from playing Fall Guys in Fall Boys without the need to download anything. ð¥
To start playing with online players, press the red âPlayâ button on the menu. Then click on the âStartâ button to match with racers. The game randomly opens a parkour for you to challenge yourself. There are many parkours, each with specific features and gameplay experiences.
If you want to play the game all by yourself, click on the âStart Offlineâ to earn experience. Or, you can play with your friends. Use the Friends Menu at the right side of the screen to add a friend or invite them to race. It can be amusing playing with your buddies.
There are numerous parkour maps in the game. Each has various ramps, jumping areas and other obstacles to overcome. Try them all and enjoy the gaming experience they offer you. Below, you can find a short description of some of the parkours.
