title: Merge Pixel
description:
Merge Pixelis an online merge game where you combine two pixelated characters and create new ones. You will unlock new characters inspired by Greek Mythology as you continue merging. Start with Achilles, give a life to Hermias. Epiktetos, Alexandros, Antipatros and many more are waiting for you to create them by merging characters! ð
When you enter the game, you will see a board. Every 6 seconds, a new character will spawn on this board in the beginning. Your main aim in this puzzle game is to merge two identical pixelated characters and create a whole new one. In each level, you will be able to unlock new mythological characters. Additionally, the characters you have will earn you idle coins! Use your coins to upgrade the features of the merging.
As you make progress by merging pixelated items, you will get new characters. There are 80 different pixelated items on Merge Pixel. If you merge two characters of the same level, you will automatically unlock the character at the next level. Below, you can find some of the items listed!
MOVISOFT developed Merge Pixel.

title: Kiki World
description:
Kiki Worldis an online home design game where you act as an interior architect. Your main goal in this game is to organize and redecorate old rooms. Give the messy rooms fresh air! Decorate your friendâs kitchen, bedrooms and living rooms to get diamonds & stars. Use your earnings to renovate your own house completely! ð¡
Old items straight into the trash can! Now is the time to create your dream home in Kiki World. Start by decorating your bedroom. Choose a floor type, get some wallpaper, and place a comfy bed in your room. Donât forget to add a window so plenty of sunlight can come inside. There is so much furniture and home design accessories at your disposal. Mix and match them to create a cozy ambience!
Accept the design orders to earn diamonds and stars. Organize your friendâs house by cleaning the rooms, removing old items and replacing them with stylish furniture. Open packages and choose furniture that fits well in the room. Everything you touch turns to gold. Bring a light to dull rooms with your special design skills! You are really a great interior architect, arenât you?
As you level up, you can unlock new rooms besides your bedroom. You will start with organizing and designing your bedroom. With so many furniture options and different pattern choices, making a decision can be a bit challenging! Later, you need to decorate your kitchen, living room and many moreâ¦ Step by step, creating your dream home is in your hands!
CyberNex Studios developed Kiki World.
If you enjoy playing home design games like this, we suggest you playHome Design. Organize a home from top to bottom by unpacking furniture. Place beds, sofas, and wardrobes one by one!
For further engagements, feel free to check ourOrganizing Games Onlinegame library. There is a wide array of online games at your disposal ononlinegames.io!

title: Racing Cars
description:
Racing Carsis a 2D racing game where you engage in thrilling races with professional racers. You and your opponents will race on a bumpy road with many obstacles. There are many ups and downs and boxes which will slow you down. Advanced steering skills will make you the winner of these compelling races in one of the mostfun car gamesof Online Games!
Begin with modifying your beloved car before taking part in thrilling races. Choose your favorite car and give it a color. To create the most exotic vehicle, you can add some spray paint on it, like orange lightning or touches of futuristic blue. The most crucial detail for a car is the rims. You have many flashy rim options. Our favorite is the one with dollars.ð² If you finish customizing your vehicle, you are ready for the utmost challenges on the bumpy road!
In a race, there will be five racers with varying cars. You will drive your car near many skyscrapers. Palm trees will also accompany you. The magnificence of the city will attract you immensely. But donât lose your focus! Your only aim in the game is to beat all other racers and be the one who reaches the finish line first. Collect the coins on the road, as they will help you to get new vehicles and upgrade your current carâs engine and suspension powers.
The view of the race track is spectacular with its city lights. Racing on this road will be very enjoyable for you. But be careful! There are lots of obstacles that will slow you down. One of these obstacles is wooden boxes. When you hit the boxes with your car, it may slow you down and cause you to fall behind in the race. Additionally, there are lots of bumps on the road. If you enter these at high speed, your vehicle can flip over!
Racing Cars was developed by FreezeNova.
If you like playing Racing Cars, you may also tryHill Climb Cars. Choose your cute car among many options and take the road with the hills in the game. Reach the finish line before your vehicle flips over and collect the coins on the road!
You may look for otheronline racing gameson OnlineGame.io. Keep coming back to discover new and thrilling games! You can access many kinds of recent free browser games on Online Games without the need for any registration.
short_description: Overcome wooden boxes and bumps without your car flipping over in Racing Cars, a 2D racing game. Be the winner among the other four racers!

title: Wave Road 3D
description:
Wave Road 3Dis an online arcade game inspired by Geometry Dash. In the game, master navigating your arrow to pass through obstacles and reach the finish line in each level. You can customize your arrow and change its color before starting the game. Challenge your reflexes in this fast and dynamic experience! ð¾
1 Player Mode
2 Player Mode
Player 1
Player 2
When you enter the game, choose your desired game mode and start to play by clicking on the screen. Your arrow will automatically move in the course. The main goal of Wave Road 3D is to control the arrow to pass through as many obstacles as possible. There will be spiky objects, steep ramps, and giant blocks on the way. If the arrow touches any of these obstacles, you will have to start from the beginning!
There are 3 game modes in this arcade game: Classic Mode, Endless Mode and Two Player Mode. Choose whichever mode you want to play and master navigating your arrow to avoid obstacles on the way!
Besides the obstacles, you will see golden circles on the way. When you manage to get through your arrow in five circles or more in a row, you will create combos. Your arrow will get a rainbow tail in this way! Also, the color of the circles will change and become purple.
gameVgames developed Wave Road 3D.
If you enjoy playing Wave Road 3D, you may also try playingScreamals. Stretch your character by dragging up and down and passing through the barriers in the game. Moreover, you can view ourAvoid Games Onlinegame category for more adventures!
short_description: Navigate your arrow through the obstacles and avoid crashing into any objects on the way! Wave Road 3D is an online avoid game with its dynamic world.

title: Mega Mod Playground
description:
Mega Mod Playgroundis an online sandbox game featuring a wide array of characters with special abilities. Some of the characters are filled with helium, and some are very heavy. Engage with crazy characters and create your own playground in this Geometry Dash-inspired world! Conducting experiments is the most fun part of this game. ð¹
You will find dozens of characters with very different characteristics in Mega Mod Playground. Geometry Dash fans already know the characters! They belong to that world. You will see a panel at the top when you enter the game. Click the character you want in the panel, and it automatically launches into the game area.
There are blocks, spiky items, poisons and balls in the game. Characters have their own abilities and varying health levels. Try conducting experiments by interacting with two different characters. For example, when a spiky item touches a helium-filled ball, it explodes. Or, some characters can be eliminated with poison.
Did you know that you can open black holes on the playground? Use the orange portal gun to open a black hole. Launch it from the panel by clicking on it. Then drag it onto the play area, and when you click a point, it opens a portal.Hereâs a tip:When you push the balls into these portals, they disappear into the black hole of the universe!
JellyLab developed the Mega Mod Playground.
If you enjoy playing this game, we suggest you playGeometry Dash. Follow the rhythm of the music and keep your cube away from any spiky objects! For more engagements, feel free to reach ourArcade Games Onlinegame library. Keep coming back to explore newly added games!
short_description: Launch cool characters on the playground and make your way to conduct experiments with them in Mega Mod Playground, an online sandbox game.

title: Hospital Doctor
description:
Hospital Doctoris a fun hospital game where you are a prominent doctor in this hospital. Your patients are waiting for your treatments.
Examine them. Make your diagnosis and apply the necessary treatment. You need to heal them as soon as possible. Grab your medical equipment and get on duty immediately!
Enter the thrilling world of Hospital Doctor, an enjoyable hospital simulator. You will play as a renowned doctor who has to treat various sick people, including a sad clown.
Each patient's diagnosis and treatment process will be different. You may use different methods. For some, you will need to use an X-ray device. For others, you must cast a cast on their broken bones.
Get ready for a wide variety of exciting hospital experiences!
From time to time, patients will come to you with open wounds, sometimes with broken bones or infected internal organs. The medical equipment you will use for each is different. It is possible to see the tools given below while playing this surgery game.
Our favorite man is Mr. Clown. He is a little sick and sad about his illness. We believe that when you heal him, his face will smile. Let's make him smile a little, shall we?
After healing him, don't forget to make him drink his vitamin-filled juice and send him home. We need to make sure he fully recovers. What a sacred job it is to be a doctor!Â
If you like playing doctor games, you should tryCat Doctor. Cat Doctor is another hospital simulator game where you work as a vet doctor and cure cute cats. Or else, you may look up otherkids gameson OnlineGames.io for more game options.
If you are wondering which game to play, you can have usopen a random gamefor you.
short_description: Hospital Doctor is a free online hospital game.

title: Xmas Slope
description:
Xmas Slopeis an arcade Christmas game where the player tries to steer Santa's sleigh down the hill. Enjoy driving on slopy hills covered with snow in a forest full of pine trees.
The Christmas season is here! If you are looking for fun holiday themed games for kids, Xmas Slope is the best game to play for free. Help Santa to collect gifts to distribute to the kids.
Kids are waiting for you! Pick up as many gift packages as possible and move on the track. Take Santa Claus on a wander through the Lego-like pine tree forest! It will be a true adventure!
When you enter the game, you will find Santa Claus driving on a snowy road with his sleigh. This snowy area is full of pine trees, gift packages and all kinds of obstacles.
You need to help him progress along the way and collect gifts by overcoming these obstacles one by one. The sleigh must move forward without touching or hitting anything. You must guide the sleigh well.
Your main goal in this game is to help Mr. Santa pick up the gifts. He needs to collect these gifts so that he can leave the children's gifts under their Christmas trees on New Year's Eve. The more gifts you gather, the more scores you will have. Direct the sleigh over the packages and pick them up one by one.
You can buy a new sleigh for Mr. Santa with the gift packages you collect. View your options by pressing the joystick-like icon from the main menu. You have many sleigh options here. Go beyond the classic sleighs and choose more modern ones!
You can also get a new character for Mr. Santa from where you get sleighs. You have a lot of character options here. You have the freedom to choose whatever you want, from scary characters to adorable ones.
TrySnow Rider 3Dif you love playing Xmas games. You may ski through millions of obstacles in this realistic 3D snowboarding game on a snow-covered mountain. You have to get away from the snow masses while sliding!
For more game options, look up thefun Christmas gameson OnlineGames.io by following the link. You will find many game options that you can enjoy during your holiday season on our platform.
short_description: Are you ready for an adventure on snowy roads with Santa Claus in his sleigh? Steer the sleigh, get the gift packages and move forward in the Xmas Slope.

title: Steal Car Duel
description:
Steal Car Duelis an online Italian brainrot game where you collect valuable cars at your base. While hunting for new vehicles, you need to protect your base from thieves. Open your eyes wide shut! Your precious garage will attract other players. We suggest keeping the protection lasers active at all times in this Roblox-inspired world! ð
1 Player
2 Player
After customizing your Roblox-like character, you are ready to collect cars in your garage. There will be cars on the red carpet moving forward. Start buying the simple ones first. The vehicles you collect will make you money every second. Use your money to invest in more upgraded vehicles. Besides creating a whole new garage, you must be cautious about the heists! When the protection bar goes off, your garage will be defenseless.
Build your garage with fantastic vehicles. Start by collecting standard cars, then work your way up to the premium ones. As you get more advanced cars, you will be able to earn more money through them. Here is the rule: The higher the vehicle's class, the more money you earn! Classes of the cars are as follows:
Your precious garage will be under the threat of other players! The protection bar gets active for 60 seconds. After this time period, the bar goes off, and you will be defenseless. They may raid your premium cars. If any rival tries to steal your car, approach them and press LMB. It will automatically drop the car. To reactivate the protection, go to the yellow protection area in your garage!
gameVgames developed Steal Car Duel.
Steal Brainrot Duelis another game that you can enjoy playing. In the game, collect funny brainrot characters in your base. Or, you can steal from others! For moreItalian Brainrot games, feel free to follow the given link. Keep coming back to explore new thrilling games!
short_description: Hunt new cars, build a premium garage and protect your base from thieves in Steal Car Duel, an online brainrot game inspired by Roblox.

title: Rooftop Run
description:
Rooftop Runis an online running game where you jump from one roof to another. Navigate your character, who never tires of running, and reach the finish line in each level. Overcome all the obstacles on your way one by one by maneuvering your character. Adrenaline has never felt so real! ð
When you enter this parkour game, you will find yourself on the roof of skyscrapers. Your character starts to run automatically once you tap to play. All you need to do is guide him through the obstacles on the way. Jump from one roof to another, slide under barriers like butter, and dive into offices! Try not to fall off the roofs. Otherwise, you need to start from the beginning.
You need to avoid any contact with orange men. They will try to catch you! Find a way to get around them while moving forward relentlessly. Try to reach the finish line before the orange men get you. You can use different strategies to dodge them. For example, zigzagging may help you get rid of them.
The most challenging part of the parkour is the tower cranes. They are very narrow and long, and you may need to move over multiple tower cranes. So, controlling your character on any of these parts will get trickier. Adrenaline will double up! But, hey! You can handle this with precise aiming.
Playgama developed Rooftop Run.
Did you like playing Rooftop Run? You may also giveExtreme Run 3Da chance! In the game, take control of a rolling ball and move forward by overcoming obstacles on the way. Itâs like a VR-like experience.
For more exciting challenges, feel free to view ourRunning Games Onlinegame category. There are hundreds of online games at your disposal ononlinegames.io!
short_description: Jump from one roof to another in Rooftop Run, a thrilling running game with its 3D graphics. Feel the adrenaline in your bones while diving into offices!

title: Crazy Ball Adventures
description:
Are you ready to move forward on the tracks set above the endless sea?Crazy Ball Adventuresis a 3D arcade game where you steer a ball on challenging roads. Just as you do in Slope, you must steer the ball cautiously on the tracks.
Your job is to reach the finish line. To get there, you need to overcome manyobstacles on the road. Do your best and try to complete30 challenging levels! Collect the stars on the road.
Tap on the âPlayâ button to start when you enter this arcade game. You will find yourself on a parkour located on the sea with your ball. Your main objective is to navigate it through the tracks with utmost care.
You cannot let it fall into the sea. To reach the finish line, maneuver the ball between the obstacles without getting in contact with any of them. Donât forget tocollect three starswhile moving forward!
In order to make progress in this parkour game, our Gamie advises you to go slowly and carefully rather than fast. Moving fast means losing control of the ball quickly, and it can make you restart the level.
You will encounter many surprises on the track, such as wide gaps and sharp bends. Additionally, there are many mines placed on the ground and huge moving walls on the following levels.
At level 3 and above, you will face the walls moving on the track. They are moving left from right constantly. You need to find the appropriate time to take action. Otherwise, they can hit the ball and cause it to rush out to sea.
It means game over! The sea is very wavy and scary. Gamie has a suggestion on this issue, too! She says you can jump over the walls. But it is essential to find the right time to do this.
FreezeNova created Crazy Ball Adventures.
If you enjoy playing Crazy Ball Adventures, you may also try playingBouncy Musical Ball. In the game, you need to master guiding a jumpy ball. The tiles will show themselves according to the music you choose!
For further options, you may look up otheronline arcade gameson OnlineGames.io. There are dozens of free online games at your disposal. Bookmark this website to access them easily!
short_description: Guide your ball on various tracks full of obstacles. Reach the finish line without falling the ball into the sea in Crazy Ball Adventures, a 3D arcade game.

title: Kart Racing Pro
description:
Kart Racing Prois a racing game where you navigate a kart vehicle as a teddy bear driver. You are driving your cute vehicle on an endless road. You will be racing with other teddy bears. Don't let them get in your way. Try to get the highest scores by taking the longest way you can in thisdriving game!
The most essential thing in the game is collecting the fuel tanks, as they will allow you to make progress. You must check the fuel bar on the upper left side of the screen. If this blue bar drops to zero, the game is over. You shouldn't let the fuel run out. Try to get a red tank immediately when you see a red tank on the road.
You will see coins on the road while moving forward. Don't forget to collect them as they will enable you to get new vehicles. There are many vehicle options, each with a unique driver. Click on the shopping cart icon to see the available options from the menu. We will leave you some of the driver's names below. Our favorite vehicle is the one with the monkey driver!
To enhance your vehicle's power, we recommend you boost your vehicle's features from the upgrading section. Tap on the kart icon from the main menu to access the section. You will see your boost options here. Let's see what features you can enhance in your car.
Kart Racing Pro is developed by MarketJS.
If you like playing Kart Games, you may also try playingPowerslide Kart Simulator. Compete with other racers along curved roads in the game. You will find a go-kart, 3 wheel-car and a bike to choose from. Pick your favorite one and set off!
For more gaming options, you may look up otherracing games onlineon OnlineGames.io by following the link. Please share your gaming experience with us in the comment section below!
short_description: Get in your kart and go as far as you can until the fuel runs out in the racing game Kart Racing Pro! Collect the coins and pick up the fuel tanks on the road.

title: Moto Traffic Rider
description:
Moto Traffic Rideris a first-person driving game. Get on your bikeâs seat and move forward on an open highway. Flowing traffic has its own dangers. Avoid crashing with any of the vehicles on the way. Pass near other cars as close as possible to get the highest scores in this traffic rider game! ð
Enter into the open highway with your precious motorbike! Your main aim in the game is to drive your bike without bumping into any other car on the road. Speed down the highway leaving all the cars behind you one by one. Try to go as near as possible to the vehicles to get the most points, just as you do in Highway Traffic. Additionally, keep your speed above 100 km/h for getting more rewards!
On the highway, try to overtake other cars closely. This way, you will experience the adrenaline rush at its peak. Moreover, close overtakings at higher speeds, especially above the 100 km/h, will earn you a lot of money in Moto Traffic Rider. You can use this money to invest in your bike. You can unlock advanced motorbikes or upgrade the one you have!
There are three distinguishing landscapes to ride your bike: Desert Valley, Grasslands and Snow City. description:

Fortunately, you have the best troops. Let them take their places on the roof. They will attack enemy knights with arrows. Prepare your attack plan well and send the bad creatures where they come from in the strategy game!
As you eliminate the enemies, you will gain EXPs. Use them to upgrade your troop. In later levels, you will need more power during a battle since the attacks get harder. When you get enough experience points, you will see an arrow pointing up at your men.

You can also enhance your fortress's walls to make them more resistant to attacks. In the "Shop" section, acquire the "Strong Wall," which costs 2000 coins and makes your tower more durable.
On the other hand, you have the option to upgrade your fighter's features here, too. You can see those five archers side by side. Acquiring upgrades will increase their damage rate and critical hit percentage.
To help you defend your castle, you can use boosters and power-ups. You can get boosters from the "Shop" section. There are Double Arrow, Poison and Freeze as boosters. They cost 50 coins, 75 coins and 100 coins respectively. Tap on the two-swords icon to use them.
You have three power-ups: Frost, Lava, and Lightning. For 30 seconds, they will freeze, burn, or strike lightning in the area you choose.

description:

But the first thing to do is collect the coins on the field by dragging your pets over them. They will do the collecting job. You can break eggs and get new Pokemon-like animals by using these coins!
You will encounter various types of eggs, including the basic white ones or those with a golden color. To open it, walk towards an egg and stand on the halo.
You can get a new animal from here if you have enough coins to break that egg. You can see how many coins you need to break on the egg.
Eggs with a higher value can give you more exotic animals. The animal team will follow you wherever you go and help you to collect more money.
The Sand Island is waiting for you to unlock it to give you more options. Get the island with 5K coins. You will see that the map is full of coins. However, the case is that as the coins are higher in number, collecting them will take much more time.

title: Vortex 9
description:
Vortex 9is a multiplayer shooting game set in a strange universe. John and Jane found themselves in the Vortex 9 dimension. Grab your weapons and enter the battlefield with your chosen character. Engage in team deathmatches, capture the points and fight against everyone in Mayhem! ð
Ready for a battle with crazy characters and insane weapons? Welcome to the strange universe of Vortex 9. There are no boring heroes or simple guns in this crazy battle game. You will fight against Marvin McSpy, Mr Goodboy, Jess Purrfect, and many more eccentric characters in the battling field. Pick up your gun and join a team deathmatch. Jane and John woke up in Vortex 9 dimension. They are two siblings who love playing games. Choose the one you want to play with and enter the battlefield. As you earn coins from the matches, you can unlock strange characters such as Marvin McSpy and Jess Purrfect.
Your first rifle is the Recruitâs Gun in the beginning. You also have the Copâs Gun and the Simple Knife. As you gain Silvers and Coins, you can unlock many more upgraded wacky weapons. Worm Hunt Snake Game IO Zoneis an online IO game where you try to grow your snake. Collect as much food as you can to be the biggest snake in the shrinking arena. Grow your worm into a snake by collecting the food in the play area. The more you collect, the bigger the size of your snake! However, keep in mind that if you touch any of the other snakes, you will be eliminated. So, these arethe key rules: Dodge others and try to get the most food from the arena. title: Idle Craft 3D
description:
Idle Craft 3Dis more than anidlebuilding game, it's a strategic journey where players monitor all the construction laborers and make crucial decisions to finish the building as soon as possible!
Middle, a determined individual, has spent years building his dream house. His sole purpose was to marry a wife and live happily ever after in that house. However, fate had other plans.
An unexpected disaster, in the form of an aerolite, razed the house to the ground just as he completed construction. But Middle is not one to give up. With your invaluable assistance, he is restarting the construction.
It's a journey of resilience and determination, where he needs to hire workers and dig all over the place to craft his dream house again.
Click or tap to control
It's not easy to break sweat all day long. Workers may fall asleep from exhaustion. However, you'll not gain any income while they are sleeping. So wake them up. Or summon elders to supervise them.
Titan is a super powerful worker who will quicken the construction a lot. Summon Titan to enjoy the highest digging efficiency. He'll be an example to the other workers as well.
Middle's little house in Jungle Manor is only the first step in the construction business. As you embark on other adventures, you'll discover a variety of maps to dig and craft in this game. Each map brings new surroundings and decorations.
This game not only provides entertainment but also helps you appreciate the hard work of anonymous laborers! It's a fun way to learn about the challenges and rewards of construction workers. Play it on OnlineGames.io for free and add some fun to your day!
If you enjoy playing idle constructing games, why not try your hand at being a subway manager in NY City withSubway Idle 3D? Set up a system to increase your profits and ensure the people of NY can find what they need in transportation.

description:

Grab your shotgun, bounce the bullets and be the cowboy of the open seas!Pirate Shootoutis a2D physics puzzle gamewith 50 unique levels. Whether you're on your mobile or your computer, you can play Pirate Shootout on your browser without downloading a single file. Here is how you can play the game:
Computers
Mobiles

There are some moving obstacles that blocks your sight. First understand their cycle and how they move. Anticipate when they will go down or up. Send the bullets in the perfect timing to headshot them all.
Bullets are not the only way to eliminate an enemy. Aim for TNTs to explode and clear multiple at once. You can also aim for wrecking balls, let them drop onto enemies and smash them.

title: Hotel Fever Tycoon
description:
Hotel Fever Tycoonis an online tycoon game where you manage your dream hotel! Welcome your special guests at the reception and arrange a room for them to spend the night. Making them comfortable is the most crucial task here! Are you ready to build your hotel empire by mastering hotel management? ð¨
You own the Western Glamor Hotel located in a busy location. After the opening, your guests start to come for their vacation. Welcome your customers at the front desk with an elegant attitude. Arrange their rooms according to availability. Fulfill their orders and make sure that their vacation goes perfectly. Collect the payment when guests check out and ensure the room is clean for the next guests!
As you fulfill the tasks and level up, you will be able to unlock the cola machine. This way, you can serve your customers a bottle of Coke and earn extra money to upgrade your hotel. However, keep in mind that the guests are impatient! You must accomplish their requests before the green timer completely disappears.
Start accepting your guests at the Western Glamor Hotel in the beginning. Satisfy your customers by completing all the tasks. After the Western Glamor, you can unlock the Edon Hotel, which is located in an independent garden in the city center. It has the best scenery in a natural environment. Furthermore, there are seven luxurious hotels with unique concepts to unlock in this business management game!

title: Soccer Dash
description:
Soccer Dashis an online soccer game where you need to hit the ball into the goalpost successfully. Overcome obstacles and soccer players by swiping the ball. Maneuvering the ball is a bit tricky, but you can get the hang of it with some practice! Hit the ball to score a goal in 30 levels and be the best footballer. â½
When you enter the game, you will find yourself on a soccer pitch. Your main aim in this football game is to overcome the obstacles and pass through the soccer players on the pitch by maneuvering the ball. Drag the mouse in the direction you want to kick the ball, then release it to kick it. You can make multiple shots to score a goal. If you successfully make the ball enter the goalpost, you can move to the next level!
In the following levels, you will encounter sharp wheels on the soccer pitch. If the ball comes into contact with the wheels, it will explode, and you will lose the game. So, beware of the sharp objects on the field and other kinds of obstacles to successfully score a goal. There are advanced challenges at every level to pass!
You can use the edges to direct the ball, just as you do in billiards. Determine a strategic edge and advance the ball in that direction. The ball will move in the direction you set due to the impact of the collision! That way, you will confuse the soccer players on the pitch, too.
Mirra Games developed Soccer Dash.
Did you like playing Soccer Dash? You can also givePill Soccera chance! Itâs a funny football game featuring 3D characters shaped like pills! Moreover, feel free to check ourSoccer Games Onlinegame tag for more options.
short_description: Swipe the ball through the obstacles and soccer players to hit the ball to the goalpost in Soccer Dash, an online soccer game!

title: Stickjet Challenge
description:
Stickjet Challengeis one of the most thrilling stickman games where you try to make the ragdoll reach the flagged area at the end of the platform. While trying to get him to this area, your priority should be keeping him away from the platform's red lines and spinning wheels. Touching anything other than green areas sends him back to the beginning point. Master controlling the jetpack and enjoy the Stickjet Challenge!
This game will challenge you a bit. Here, you will try to move the ragdoll over obstacles in an area drawn with red stripes. He should not come into contact with anything red. It might be good for him to collect stars as he progresses on the platform. With stars, he completes levels with distinction.
The ragdoll will encounter many spinning wheels on the platform. These wheels look like balloons. They are bright and red. And they keep spinning. If he touches these wheels, unfortunately, he will have to go back to the beginning.
Ragdoll receives the first flag when he reaches the initial point of control. Even if he contacts a red area of the platform, he will not return to the beginning; instead, he will begin the game again from this checkpoint. As a result, these turning points are crucial.
Stickjet Challenge was created by Qky Games.
If you love playingstickman gameslike Stickjet Challenge, you should definitely tryRagdoll Fall. In Ragdoll Fall, the player tries to hit the stickman to the ground as much as possible. Or, you may give theStickman Ragdolla try, where you combine poses and moves to make the stickman jump. Tell us about your gaming experience in the comment area below!
short_description: Stickjet Challenge is an arcade game where you make the ragdoll with a jetpack to reach the final destination. Do not put him in contact with anything red!

title: Lambo Traffic Racer
description:
Lambo Traffic Raceris an online driving game where you overtake cars on a highway with a Lamborghini-like sports car. Drive this powerful car and try to pass others as close as possible to earn the highest points. However, other drivers are unpredictable! Avoid crashing with any of them in this Highway Traffic-inspired game. ð¦
Ready to drive in a flow of traffic with your Lambo? Start the engine and head to the highway! You can choose the landscape you want to steer your car on. Would you rather explore Desert Dunes filled with cactus, the lush landscapes of Greenlands, or take a night tour of the city in Night City? The choice is yours! Then, you can get ready for driving your car in the busy traffic.
Your main aim in this car game is to overtake the cars on the highway one by one without crashing into them. The closer you pass, the more points you get! A simple overtake earns you +100 points while a close overtake adds +133 points to your overall score. If you manage to do combos, you will get even higher points.Hereâs a pro tip for you:Speed up over 100 km/h and perform a close overtake to get the most scores in this Highway Traffic inspired game!
Begin by driving the Vortex X1 at first. As you make progress and earn cash, you can upgrade your current Lamborghini or get new upgraded models. There are six vehicles varying in torque, handling, brake and speed functions. Pick up the one that suits you well and hit the roads! Below, you can find the vehicles that you can unlock listed.

title: Charger City Driver
description:
Charger City Driveris a 3D driving game where you steer a Dodge Charger-like muscle car. Accept the drifting challenges, perform successful stunts and escape from the police cars! Wander around the city streets at night with your puppy sitting in the passenger seat. Feel free to customize and upgrade your beloved vehicle however you like! ð
You are invited to show your drifting, racing and stunt skills in a city map at night! There are three modes to conquer: Drift Mode, Kill Mode and Police Mode. Use these racing modes to earn extra cash. Drive into the trigger points to start the missions. However, try not to run over pedestrians while driving your powerful car! If you hurt two pedestrians, the police will chase you in the neon-lit city streets. Additionally, keep checking the fuel bar. If you run out of fuel, drive over to the nearest gas station to get fuel!
To activate the Drift Mode, click on the relevant button in the lower right corner of the screen. Then, you can drive your car over a drift trigger point to start a mission. For example, you can earn +1750 CR from a point if you can manage to get 3500 drift points!
Activate the Racing Mode by clicking on the Stunt Mode button on the screen. By performing successful stunts, you can earn a significant amount of cash. Go over a speed trigger point at high speeds. You can see a sign indicating how fast you should drive to earn CR. Accelerate your muscle car, pass a speed trigger point, then drive it over a ramp to pull off the best stunts!
Fuego! Games published the Charger City Driver.
If you enjoy playing Charger City Driver, you may also like playingVice City Driver! Play in the shoes of Tommy Vercetti and drive your Ferrari-like sports car to explore the city. We have an extensive selection ofonline driving games. By following the link, you can discover new, thrilling games!
short_description: Get your puppy with you and hit the roads of neon-lit city at night with your beloved sports car in Charger City Driver, a 3D driving game!

title: Draw the Truck Bridge
description:
We have beendrawing bridges for small carsandpaths for birds. Now, are you ready for an even more challenging construction work?
Draw the Truck Bridge is the second game of the Draw the Bridge game sequel. With 50 unique puzzles and more diverse obstacles on your way, drawing bridges is more entertaining than ever.
This time, you will draw bridges for trucks. Although they have more powerful engines than regular cars, their weight prevents them from climbing steep slopes. So, find the perfect angle and let them arrive at their destination safe and sound!
Drag your LMB to draw lines.Â
Draw lines and create paths for trucks to pass over holes in the road.
Collect stars to successfully complete levels. On some levels, collecting all three stars may be challenging. On the other hand, the placement of the stars will guide you to draw the correct line. So follow the stars until you arrive at the red flag.
Trucks may flip over while climbing too steep slopes. So, find the ideal angle for the trucks while drawing.
You may encounter some obstacles, such as speed bumps, spikes, rectangles and even teddy bears.Â
Prevent any crashes by drawing the path considering the obstacles on the way.
Trucks should stay on the lines you draw but shouldn't hit into any of them. In order to avoid crashes, you need to provide smooth bridges to pass over.
You may encounter a level failed warning even if you passed the flags. That's probably because you flew over the flag.Â
Jumping over flags doesn't count. The trucks need to touch the flags to pass a level.
As you progress through levels, you will see multiple trucks and flags in a level.Â
Each truck has its own flag at which to arrive. Arrange their paths so that they do not collide.
FreezeNova created this game.
If you'd like to play more physics puzzles, head over toDraw Here. All the knowledge you've considered useless while studying for your physics exam will finally find its area of application: solving physics puzzles.Â
In Draw Here, you'll draw objects using notions of gravity, motion, energy conversion, and many other concepts. Create objects and let them touch the stars while falling.
Still hungry for more puzzles? Find our vast catalog inPuzzle Games Online. Stay in touch with OnlineGames.io and learn about new levels and upgrades of your favorite games! Have fun!
short_description: Draw the Truck Bridge is the second game of the Draw the Bridge game sequel. With 50 unique puzzles and more diverse obstacles on your way, drawing bridges is more entertaining than ever.

title: Egg Adventure
description:
Egg Adventureis a funny puzzle game where you manipulate the movements of an egg. He needs to reach the door on each level. Figure out a way to overcome the handicaps and draw structures in each round that make it easy to get the door. Help Mr. Egg overcome obstacles as it moves in the direction of the exit! ð¥
On every level, Mr. Egg needs to deal with different kinds of obstacles. Help him make his way to the door, bring him together with Mrs. Egg, or save him from the dangers ahead! Use your brush to draw lines to shape structures that can be useful for the egg. Try not to crack his shell. Make sure that he reaches the exit without getting hurt. Here is a clue for you: Use gravity to your advantage! However, keep in mind that each shape you draw will be subject to gravity.
This adventure game relies on your creativity! Protect Mr. Egg at all costs by drawing lines and shapes to overcome dangers. For example, you need to draw a shape to save him from being crushed by falling objects on the 5th level. Or, you may need to draw a weapon for him to survive the attacks of the enemy egg on the 8th level!
Mr. Egg and Mrs. Egg love each other deeply. On the Get Together levels, you need to find a way to bring the lovers together. However, try not to drop them into the water or crack their shells in any way. You know that eggs are very delicate!
Yizhiyuan Network Technology published Edd Adventure.

short_description: Help Mr. Egg overcome obstacles by drawing shapes and structures in Egg Adventure, a puzzle game that requires creativity!

title: Tap Tap Colors
description:
Tap Tap Colorsis a 2D arcade game where you navigate a white cube shooting balls to the blocks on the platform. These blocks have numbers on them. You must shoot them with that number of balls to eliminate them from the platform. To succeed in this color game, make your cube move forward as far as possible!
There are many colorful bars on the playing field. You must ensure your cube can advance on the field without crashing any of them. Make room for it to move forward. Shoot on the blocks until you remove them. Try to break your own highest record every time you play the game. How far can you go? If you are ready, we will test your skills!
The best way to make progress in the game is to choose to destroy the lower-numbered bars. This way, you can easily make space for yourself and cover longer distances because the higher-numbered ones will take much more time to wipe off. Donât worry; your cube automatically starts shooting to the targeted areas. All you need to do is to navigate it.
You must skillfully steer the cube on the platform without any collision. Additionally, you should not hit the walls. These kinds of collisions will cause you to lose the game. Avoid the walls, floor, and ceiling. Otherwise, you will have to start from the beginning.
You will encounter three kinds of power-ups on the platform: Three Bullets, Slow Speed and 1 Score. Using the boosters will enable you to pass through the blocks quickly. They are the key elements to advance. When you see one, pick it up as soon as possible!
Tap Tap Colors was developed by QKY Games Studio.
If you love playing Tap Tap Colors, you may also likeEgg Helix. Your main job in the game is to navigate the trunk adorned with tennis rackets. An easter egg constantly bounces up and down on these rackets. You must climb the egg to the top by guiding the trunk!
Additionally, you may look up otherarcade games onlineon OnlineGames.io for more options by following the link. Keep coming back, and you will always findnew gameson the site!
short_description: Guide the cube, shoot the blocks and make room to pass through these blocks in the arcade game Tap Tap Colors! Avoid colliding with the floor and ceiling.

title: Swing Monkey
description:
Let's get the monkey on the trampoline!Swing Monkeyis a fun skill game where you swing the monkey through rings by tapping and holding the mouse button. Your primary mission here is to move the monkey between the rings and get it to the finish line. You will reach the next level as you get the monkey to the finish line.
Trampolines that you can use to bounce off and generate speed are your starting point. Make sure to seize a ring as soon as possible because the trampoline's air time, the momentum's effectiveness you get by bouncing from the trampoline, is limited.
The move that will take you forward is to hold on to the rings and gain momentum. In order to gain momentum, precise grabbing is the key element. Holding on to the rings with a short rope wouldn't make much sense. Because this won't give you much speed. The longer the rope you hold on to the ring, the greater the intensity of the swing.
If you swing or bounce high enough, you can fly across much of the course without holding onto any rings. At the beginning of the level, gather as much speed as you can to make navigating the obstacles a pleasure.
Swing Monkey was created by MarketJS.

short_description: Swing Monkey is a fun skill game where you swing the monkey through rings.

title: Stick vs Monster School 2
description:
Stick vs Monster School 2is an online adventure game where your character fights against zombies and other creatures on the way. In a mix of Super Mario and Minecraft worlds, try to survive from the attacks and reach the door at the end of the levels! Donât forget to collect the coins to upgrade your gun and stickman. ð§ââï¸
When you enter the game, you will find yourself in a Minecraft-themed parkour filled with foes. Your stickman needs to survive during the zombie apocalypse on 60 levels! Help him reach the purple portal at the end of each level. While moving forward, you will encounter zombies, sick creatures and bosses. Shoot them all without thinking twice, or they will turn your stickman into a zombie!
There are lots of deadly foes that you will bump into while you march on. You must eliminate all of them; otherwise, the purple portal will not get activated. With a simple gun, it may be a little bit hard to get rid of them. Sometimes you will see TNTs on the way. Use them to your advantage. Point your gun at one of them and shoot. Boom! All the sick creatures will be gone in a second.
From time to time, you need to pass poisonous lakes. If your stickman comes into contact with this dirty water, he will lose his life. You can perform double jumps to go over them, as a simple jump may not be enough.

title: Ping Pong Air
description:
Ping Pong Airis a 3D sports game where you play table tennis. You will control a bat to serve the ball. After the opening, use your bat cleverly and try not to lose any chance to catch the ball! The first person who scores 11 is the winner. Letâs see who is the absolute table tennis master. ð¾
Time to get to the tennis table with this arcade game! Pick up your tennis bat and start playing. You can control your bat by moving the mouse left and right. You and your opponent will receive the ball in order. The one who drops the ball from the table wins a score. If you manage to reach 11 scores, you will be the winner! You can unlock new bats as you make progress. You can also get new bats using your earned crystal balls.
In the Challenge mode, you can practice by trying to hit the targets. There are no opponents here. Just you and the CPU, which automatically sends the ball. When you hit a target, its location will change. Keep your eyes wide open and aim precisely to score the most points in this endless mode.
Keep the Halloween spirit alive! In the Halloween Haunt mode, you will try to banish spirits on the tennis table. However, it will not be easy as the ghost, the spider, the coffin, the pumpkin and the bat (the animal one) constantly move in one way or another. Hit them with the ball, and they will disappear one by one!
GamePush developed the Ping Pong Air.

title: Mr Space Bullet
description:
Mr Space Bullet is a 2D shooting game where you will be on a staircase in outer space. While trying to climb up, you will come across many aliens on your way. Your job is to aim at your enemies precisely at their heads.
Shoot the alien you encounter on every stair without blinking an eye. This way, you will reach the top step by step in this arcade game! Remember to collect the coins dropped by the aliens.
In each level, you will deal with a few aliens. These aliens will try to prevent you from reaching the top. You will be the one who fires the first bullet. However, keep in mind that if you fail to shoot them, they will not show mercy.
When it's their turn, they can defeat you with a single bullet. For this reason, you can't let the bullet pass without hitting them. Otherwise, you will have to return to the staircase's first step.
Collecting the coins dropped by the aliens will allow you to acquire new avatars and weapons. There are characters to unlock, such as Hitman, Cowboy, and Commando. Save 350 coins to get any of them from the Characters section.
On the other hand, you need 250 coins to purchase a new gun. Did you know you can shoot aliens using an AK-47 in space? Yes, you can unlock it from the Weapon section. For your information, new avatars and weapons are unlocked randomly.
Desktops and Laptops
Mobile Devices

After healing the lion, it's time to take care of the zebra. Its hooves need to be trimmed. The first thing to do is to clear the mud off the hooves with a hard brush. Clean the hoof with the hoof knife. Next, use the nippers to trim the hooves. Finally, use a rasp to get rid of the unnecessary edges of the hooves!

description:
Highway Motois a racing game where you weave through busy highway traffic at high speeds on your fancy bike! Dodge cars, buses, and trucks, split between lanes, and perform sharp maneuvers to show your riding skills. This road adventure offers great 3D graphics crafted in Unity, 3 game modes and 4 bikes to choose from. Now, hit the road and make it to your destination unscathed!

title: Crazy Hill Climb
description:
Crazy Hill Climbis a cartoon animal racing game where the player steers a car with a unique and very sweet animal in the driver's seat. Here, the player faces a distinct view of the road with mountains and its challenging climbs. Are you ready to hit the road with your driver animal that you chose from the animal family?
When you enter the game, the first thing you need to do is to choose among the cartoon animals that the game offers you. You will find unique and beautiful animals: an elephant, a crocodile, a reindeer, a giraffe, a wolf and a toucan. Choose the animal you will travel with finely.
After deciding on your best driver, it is time to choose the vehicle. There are 6 cars in the garage. Initially, you can choose between two options given to you. You have the right to unlock the other 4 vehicles with the money you earn as you win the races. Make a thoughtful choice from a variety of unusual and exquisite creatures for your travel buddy.
Pick your favorite color from a variety of selections, which range from soft pink to striking hues. For a better driving experience, bolster the suspension and engine power of your car. Once you have adjusted your car to your desire, go behind the wheel.
If you are playing the game on your mobile phone, you can change the gas and pedal controls in the section under the triple wheel section in the customization section.
You will encounter many obstacles as you progress along the way. The map contains very steep ascents and descents. This will make your job harder. It is better to be fast but cautious. Do not forget to collect coins on the road!
There are 30 levels in Crazy Hill Climb. Each level has its own challenges. Reach the finish line without flipping the car.
Yes, you can join the online servers and compete against other people who want to start a race. Compare your abilities to those of other drivers and finish first.

title: War Simulator
description:
A medieval war strategist commanding an army of diverse units such as archers, spearmen, and dwarves - that's who you get to be onWar Simulator! Deploy your warriors with a strategic formation and conquer new lands in this online game! Use your wits to outmaneuver your enemies and secure victory!
In order to master War Simulator, it's crucial to understand the stats of your warriors. These stats will guide you in placing them effectively on the battlefield:
Dwarves are excellent in close combat, making them ideal for the front lines. With high HP, they can withstand significant damage, acting as the backbone of your defense. However, their lower agility means they are slower to react, so positioning them strategically is key.
Spearmen are fast and agile, perfect for both the front and second lines. Their higher agility allows them to outmaneuver opponents, but their lower HP makes them less resilient to enemy attacks. Despite this, their balanced attack power and speed make them versatile mid-level soldiers.
Archers excel at ranged combat and should always be placed at the back of your formation. Their high agility allows them to fire rapidly and move quickly, but their low HP makes them vulnerable in close combat. Use them to weaken enemies from a distance before engaging with your frontline units.
Understanding the strengths and weaknesses of each unit is essential to winning in War Simulator. Position your dwarves to absorb the brunt of the enemy's attack, use spearmen to outpace foes, and let your archers rain down arrows from a safe distance. Balance is keyâdeploying your units with a diverse approach will help you dominate the battlefield.
If you'd like to play more strategy-drivenwar games online, OnlineGames.io got your back. Explore all the titles and start playing your next favorite game! We meticoulously test our games to be good quality and hiccup-free. Enjoy the quality content that's just a click away from you!
short_description: Deploy your warriors with a strategic formation and conquer new lands in this online War Simulator game!

title: Egg Helix
description:
Egg Helixis an arcade game where you steer a trunk adorned with many tennis rackets. There will be an easter egg bouncing up and down. Your main purpose is to take this egg to the top. Make eggcelent steering movements to achieve it. Remember, you are not controlling the egg, and you are in charge of steering the trunk in one of the most challenging easter games! ð¥
You will see a hopping egg on the racket net. You must make the egg reach the top to pass the level successfully. You will make it by moving the spiraled trunk with many rackets. Navigate the egg from one racket to another in order to climb it up. You will use the rackets like stair steps. While moving forward, do not forget to collect the golden diamonds. Your Easter holiday will be delightful with this addictive arcade game!
Finding the proper moment to navigate the trunk is the most crucial thing. The best time to maneuver the trunk is when the egg is in the air. Because the higher the egg is in the air, the more time you have to direct the trunk until it falls. Use the law of gravitation!
You will see orange rackets from time to time when you progress on the trunk. These rackets will help you climb many rockets at once by making you bounce higher. This way, you can reach the end of the trunk faster. When the sky gets darker, be happy as it means that you are close to the end.
Do not be afraid to fall if you believe in your reflexes and hand-eye coordination. Navigating the lower rockets allows you to save the egg from falling completely. When you find the rhythm of the egg, you can easily climb it up to the top again. Trust your reflexes and instincts!
Egg Helix is created by FreezeNova.
If you love playing Egg Helix, you may also tryStack Fire Ball. Help the ball reach the end by guiding it in the game.Avoidthe dark tiles and knock down the colorful tiles as fast as possible. Use your reflexes and focus well in order to make progress!
Or, you may look up otherfree arcade gameson OnlineGames.io for more options by following the link. Please share your gaming experience with us in the comment sections below!
short_description: Benefit from gravity and make the hopping egg reach the end of the trunk in the arcade game Egg Helix. It may be your favorite game in the Easter season!

title: Hexotopia
description:
Dorfromantik lovers out there! We have great news! Now, you can play your favorite board game online for free.Hexotopiais a city-building game that is very similar to the famous board game Dorfromantik. Become an urban planner and create your little utopian town in Hexotopia with a gorgeous landscape. Place hexagonal tiles with country houses, rivers, forests, and wheat fields on them. Find ease and relaxation in the cozy visuals and music of Hexotopia. Start laying the hexes down!
Dorfromantik, also known as Village Romance, is a board game where players lay hexagonal tiles to create a beautiful landscape, fulfill population orders, and place long tracks and rivers for points. Hexotopia is a free browser game, just like Dorfromantik. The best part is that the 3D visuals of Hexotopia add even more to the charm of building a romantic city. Join us in the world of Hexotopia and let your imagination run wild!

Two game modes are available in Hexotopia. Each has unique challenges. Play both and decide which one is your cup of tea. Learn about the modes below.
In the Creative Mode, there are no missions to follow, and all types of tiles are unlocked. However, basic game rules apply in creative mode as well. These rules are
Other than these two rules, you are free to build the city of your dreams. Just imagine and keep on constructing!
We couldn't think of a town where no leaves drop in autumn, or no snowflake falls in the winter. This is why Hexotopia has 3 different seasonal decks: Summer, autumn and winter.Â
Navigate to the deck menu on the main screen and choose the theme of the season you love. The colors and dynamics of each scene are fascinating to play.Â

title: Mega Shark
description:
Mega Sharkis an online adventure game in which you act as a wild shark! Explore the deep sea and hunt for delicious fish. Try to survive for 60 seconds to move to the next stage. Eat as many fish as you can while wandering around the sea full of dangers, just like in the 1980s Jaws movie directed by Steven Spielberg. Watch out, not all fish are food for you! ð
Ready for hunting? Play as a big shark under the deep sea and eat fish to get bigger in size. As you get bigger, you can hunt wild creatures in the deepest waters. In each round, you will have 60 seconds to survive in this survival game. You must hunt as many fish as you can in this timeframe. However, you need to be cautious! Because not all fish are afraid of this mega shark. Some sea creatures may hunt you if they are bigger than you. Donât be prey for them while hunting.
Besides the fish, there are many mines under the sea. If your shark comes into contact with the mines, they will explode, and the mega shark loses the game. So, you must avoid the mines while maneuvering your wild animal. Stay away from the fish swimming near these explosives for your benefit.
As you successfully finish each round, you will get trophies and coins. You can use your coins to upgrade your predatorâs power, speed and protection abilities. From the main menu, click on the relevant buttons on the screen to enhance your shark. This way, you can hunt with much more power!

title: Rocket Fest
description:
Rocket Festis a 3D arcade game in which you collect rockets on the road and bomb the target at the end. Control your launched rocket and collect beneficial properties as it moves fast. When it reaches the end, the rockets you collect will hit the target with deadly force! ð
Welcome to the Rocket Fest! In this arcade game, you need to maneuver a launched rocket while it moves super fast. To destroy the target at the end, you must have sufficient rockets. This is why you must collect extra missiles on the way. The more rockets you have, the more powerful the impact! As you level up, you will earn money. You can upgrade your rocket with the in-game currencies you have.
As you move forward, you will see green and red areas on the way. In these areas, a specific number is written. You must move over the green areas as they will increase the number of rockets that you have. On the contrary, if you go over the red areas, the number of missiles will decrease! So, you need to calculate every movement in this strategy game.
You will earn in-game currencies when you pass each level successfully. You can use them to upgrade the rocket. Each upgrade will make it stronger. You can also increase the number of missiles. title: Train Racing
description:
Prepare for an adrenaline rush like no other in "Train Racing," the ultimate high-speed train racing game! Put yourself in the shoes of a courageous locomotive conductor and take command of some of the world's fastest and most potent trains as you fight against rough roads with steep ups and downs. Collect the money while racing; thus, you can use those coins to buy the latest train models.
There are 30 levels to unlock in Train racing. And each level has its own challenges. Take the helm. Let's see how far you can go?
Since the track on which the train travels is full of ups and downs, it may be beneficial for you to slow down when you reach these areas. Otherwise, it is very possible for the train to turn upside down or flip over. In such cases, you can return the train to its previous state by bouncing it.
Your game map is rugged. Unfortunately, you won't progress in a straight line. That would be so simple.
There is a high probability that the train will turn upside down as you progress on this challenging map. To avoid this, proceed carefully. If the train gives signals of turning upside down, you can try to save the situation by jumping the train.
You will come across coins along the way. Collecting these to replace your train with a higher-level train is essential.
You can customize your selected train from the menu before starting the racing. Tap to the train icon on the menu and open the customize section. Here, you can buy a new train or personalize an existing one with the money you earn from races. You can also purchase upgrades to strengthen your train.
You can play Train Racing with other online players. When you get to the level selection screen, if you click on the "Multiplayer" button at the bottom of the screen, the game will create a multiplayer room with four players. When the process of finding 4 players is completed, the room is created, and the game begins.

title: Cool Archer
description:
Cool Archeris a 3D shooter game where you aim for the target and shoot with your arrows. Try to hit a bullseye with precise aiming and timing. Draw your bow back, aim at the target and release to shoot. Try not to waste your arrows, as you have only three chances to hit the target board! ð¹
Itâs time to show your archery skills in this sports game! You will see a target board in the distance when you enter the game. Your main aim is to perform shots to hit a bullseye (10 points)! At first, the board is at a standstill. However, the challenges get harder with each shot. The target will start to move, and the wind will blow forcefully, making you fail!Here is a tip for you:When it comes to the wind, watch its direction and speed.
The most challenging part of this archery game is to hit the moving target. As you make successful shots, the game will get harder and harder. You need to watch the moving board closely to perform precise shots. It will move toward a specific shape. Calculate its movements for scoring the highest points!
Try not to miss your shots! You have only three attempts to show off your excellent archery skills. If you fail to hit the target three times in total, the game is over. You are supposed to send your arrows directly to the target board in spite of all the challenging situations, like wind and a moving board, without missing.
Cool Archer was developed by MarketJS.
Did you like playing Cool Archer? GiveArchers Randoma chance! Take aim, draw the bow and shoot your opponents one by one. You are always welcome to visit ourArchery Games Onlinegame category for more options.

title: Gomu Goman
description:
Gomu Gomanis a humorous puzzle game where you try to solve problems by stretching your stickmanâs body. He is like a chewing gum! Use this elasticity to your advantage to solve each challenging level. Levels require you to both laugh and think smart. Steal things without getting noticed, mess with other characters for fun and save the lovely chick from dangers! ð§©
In each level, you need to find a way to reach a particular thing or solve a problem in this puzzle game! Most of the time, you will try to access an item without getting noticed or getting hurt. Simply tap and drag your characterâs arm, leg, neck or any other part of his body to complete the tasks. Challenges are getting harder as you move to the following levels. Use your creativity to find a solution; donât forget to laugh out loud while you're doing it!
While grabbing an object from afar or stealing a kiss from a girl upstairs, you need to take funny actions with your stretchy hero! From time to time, you need to completely use the upper body of your stickman, which makes it look silly. Or you may need to stretch one leg out a mile.
To avoid coming into contact with fire or lasers, you need to use objects to your advantage. Twist your arm or leg around an object, and you can reach a specific item to pass a level. For example, you must save your lover from the hands of a pirate on the 7th level. Stretch your leg and twist it around the rock. Then, you can kick the ass of the pirate!
Eyestorm Pte. LTD. published Gomu Goman.

title: Boat Driver
description:
Everyone is waiting for you to join the race at the Marina. You must race with other yachts and boats without going outside the pontoon lanes. This is the rule of this game.Boat Driveris a 2D driving game with excellent graphics and animations for the utmost racing experience. This game offers you a divergent adventure with boats.
20 challenging levels are waiting for you to be unlocked. Choose your boat from the menu and start the race. There are 7 boats to choose from, and you can purchase a new boat with the money you earn by winning races. You should not collide with other boats while racing; otherwise, you will lose. As you progress in the race, you will encounter a money sack and a shield. By taking them, you can increase your strength.
You have 7 different boat options, from yachts to jet skis, that you can choose from and race. You can buy a new vehicle with the sacks of dollars you collect in races.

title: Math Trivia
description:
Math Triviais a multiplayer math game where you engage in problem-solving battles with online players or against the computer. There are 10 questions in each round. You must answer them as quickly as possible to beat your opponent. We'll put your fast computing abilities to the test! Pass the quizzes and show everyone who is the most intelligent person in thispuzzle game.ââ
Before engaging in a battle, start by giving a name to your player and choose an avatar for yourself. Enter your name in the box written "Player Name". Then, view the avatar options using the left and right arrows on the box. There are girls and boys who have unique physical appearances. Choose your favorite one, and now you are ready!
You will have a limited time to solve the problems. Don't forget to check the time bar at the top of the screen. Remember that answering the questions quickly you see on the screen will bring you success in this math game. The quicker you solve them, the more points you will get. But there will need to be more! You must calculate the numbers correctly.
There are two bars; one is red, and the other is blue. The red bar shows you your progress. The same goes with your opponent with the blue bar. You will see circles under each bar that have numbers in them. These numbers indicate your scores. You can understand who is ahead from these numbers.
Math Trivia was developed by MarketJS.
If you like playing Math Trivia, you may also tryHexologic. You will see many hexagons side by side in the game. Your objective is to place dots in these shapes. You must reach the numbers on the edges to make progress. Things intensify in later levels!
For further options, you may look up otherfree math gameson OnlineGames.io by clicking on the link. Please bookmark the website to access new games easily.
short_description: Engage in problem-solving battles against online players worldwide or AI to prove your calculation skills in the math game Math Trivia.

title: Rocket Goal IO
description:
Rocket Goal IOis a 3D soccer game inspired by Rocket League, where you play football with a powerful car. Navigate your vehicle on the football field and try to score by hitting the giant ball into your opponentâs net. Controlling this Hot Wheels-like car will not be easy! Practicing before entering into a new match can be a great idea if you are a newbie. ð
What a crazy idea to play football with cars! With its cartoonistic graphics and Hot Wheels-like vehicles, it will be gratifying to play soccer in this sports game. For the players whose favorite game is Rocket League, getting used to the controls of Rocket Goal IO wonât be difficult at all. However, if you still want to master the controls, you can use the Practice mode. After practising a little bit, you can join a real match by clicking on the âPlayâ button.
The main aim of this soccer game is to hit a big ball with the car into the other teamâs goal. As the ball is enormous, you need to speed up and jump to hit it with enough power! You can use the boost feature to get accelerated. However, try not to waste the energy as it is limited. Pick up glowing pads on the floor to fill your boost. If you press jump two times, you can flip forward! Rolling in the air makes your hit stronger.
Try to stay on your own goal when the other team is close to scoring. When you defend, follow the ball from a short distance in a calm way while facing it. It allows you to block shots without giving away space. Move backward or forward to stay between the ball and your goal. When you save the ball, try to push it to the corner, not straight forward. This makes the ball safer for your team.
The Rocket Goal IO developer is not clearly credited in public.
If you enjoyed playing Rocket Goal IO, you may also try playingCar Football. It is another football game where you can kick the ball with a car! There are dozens of free online games at your disposal on this website. Feel free to check out oursports games onlinecategory for more options.
short_description: Roll your car in the air and hit the giant ball into the opponentâs team goal in Rocket Goal IO, a 3D soccer game inspired by Rocket League!

title: Geometry Vibes X-Arrow
description:
Geometry Vibes X-Arrowis an online arcade game in which you guide your X-shaped arrow through geometric paths. Reach the portal at the end of each level without coming into contact with any objects on the way! The game offers 2-, 3-, or 4-player options for those who want to duel with a friend. ð
There are five game modes to choose from:Classic,Spam,2-3-4 Player,EndlessandChallenge. After selecting the game mode you want to play, the next thing to do is to customize your arrow. You have four different arrow shapes, four neon light options and a color palette to use your creativity. Create your precious arrow before beginning the journey. Then, you can start guiding your arrow through geometric paths. Try not to hit any dangerous objects on the way to the portal!
Classic Mode has a leveling system. In each level, you have to reach the portal at the end of the route. There are 10 levels, ranging from easy to insane. These levels will really test your reflexes!
In the Spam Mode, you will try to survive between two walls located upside-down. These walls will move towards each other as you make progress, trying to squeeze your arrow.Â  Do your best and try to survive between these walls as long as you can!
You can play this arcade game with your friends if you wish. The game lets you challenge yourself with a friend or up to 4 players. They can also customize their arrows according to their own taste!
The Endless Mode requires you to take the longest distance while avoiding contact with any objects. You need to be very careful around objects that flick! Your goal is to break your own record with each try.
The Challenge Mode also has a leveling system. There are 5 levels to complete. Each level will test your precise aiming and timing skills. You must especially avoid coming into contact with any of the TNTs in this mode, as there are lots of them!
Geometry Vibes X-Arrow was developed by gameVgames.
You can continue exploring the Geometry Vibes game series by tryingGeometry Vibes 3D. Control your arrow through floating cubes, rotating spikes and twisting tunnels. For more options, visit ourArcade Games Onlinegame tag by following the link!
short_description: Guide your customizable X-shaped arrow through geometric paths and TNTs in Geometry Vibes X-Arrow, a thrilling arcade game!

Color Tunnel is a free browser game where you need to escape through moving obstacles in a colorful tunnel. You will see the tunnel changing as you level up by getting more and more scores. Each level has many complicated obstacles ranging from triangles to hemispheres to run over. Some of these shapes revolve around, and some stay still. This is what makes this game exciting. Additionally, your speed will accordingly increase. Prepare yourself for the hardest as you progress through!

Get ready to enjoy math like never before!Math vs Batis a 2D math game where there are lots of math questions and bats. What are these winged animals doing here, you ask?
Well, they will try to attack your tower. You must defend it by solving questions. Your cannon will be fired when you correctly answer the questions in thispuzzle game!
This game is one of the best puzzle games for making math enjoyable for children. It allows them to perform basic calculations in a funny way. Its entertaining and educative gameplay helps kids to develop strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.
Desktops and Laptops
Mobile Devices

title: Murder Stone Age
description:
Murder Stone Ageis a spooky puzzle game set in prehistoric times. Try to take the place of a tribal leader. Find a suitable time to attack and steal his sheepskin. Then, you will act in his shoes. However, this time, you are the one in danger. Other tribal members will follow you behind your back. Do not let them attack you! â
You must trust your instincts to survive in the Stone Age! In the beginning, you are just an ordinary caveman who belongs to a tribe. You need to attack the tribal leader and get his sheepskin. Follow him behind his back with a bone in your hand while he moves forward. Then, secretly attack him without getting noticed. Seizing the lead is the only way to survive in the wild. However, the real story begins when you murder the leader!
Once you become the chief, you need to be more careful! The mysterious figures will try to take the lead. They will follow you while you are walking to your cave, trying to find a way to murder you. Before they attack you, turn your face to them by pressing the left mouse button or the spacebar. Your guardians will throw them into a dark dungeon full of bones.
You need to keep your eyes wide shut; being a chief threatens some people in the Stone Age. But even so, not all freaky people are your enemy! Some of them are loyal to you. While a caveman protects you from a falling piece of rock, the other one may pay his respect to you. Find the ones who are trustworthy!
iClickGames developed the Murder Stone Age.

title: Thief Stick Puzzle Man Escape

However, watch out for potential dangers that may hurt him. Avoid coming into contact with any spiky or potentially harmful objects.
To reach a specific object to pass a level, you can use the other objects to your advantage. Analyze the environment carefully and find suitable objects to wrap around your stretchy arm. This way, you can escape from tricky situations by acting sneakily without getting noticed or hurt!

You can access various Halloween weapons in the game to kick the pumpkin monster. The upper side of the game screen is where you can see your available weapons. You will see six different icons, five representing different weapon options. Press the final button to put the gun you just grabbed down. The options for weapons are mentioned below. You'll even see some animal names in the list. You can call animals suitable for the Halloween spirit and attack the pumpkin monster. Choose what you want to do to de-stress, then!

title: Drunken Fighters
description:
Drunken Fightersis a hilarious sports game where you kick and punch your opponent in a ring. With its cartoonistic graphics and funny characters, you will laugh out loud a lot while trying to beat up the CPU, or a friend of yours! Defend yourself when itâs necessary, take action when you find the right opportunity in each round to become the champion of this free boxing game. ð¥
Player 1
Player 2
You can use the virtual buttons on the screen of smartphones and tablets.
Step into the ring with your ragdoll character for a crazy boxing experience! You can fight the CPU or duel a friend on the same device using the 2 Player Mode option. The key in both game modes is to master when to switch to defense and when to attack to win! Balance is everything in any boxing match. With this method, you can easily win each round and gain coins, enabling you to unlock new ragdoll characters.
You have five funny mode options to boost the thrill: Big Head, Stretch Punch, Stretch Kick, Super Punch, and Big Punch. Switch on the mode you want to apply to the matches from the bottom of the screen. You can mix specific features as you wish. For example, your ragdoll character will have a huge head and extended legs when you apply the Big Head and the Stretch Kick options.
You will see two bars in the upper left corner of the screen. These bars indicate your health and stamina. As you kick and punch your opponent, your stamina will gradually decrease. After a brief rest, you will regain your stamina. When you run out of stamina, we recommend you retreat and switch to defense until it refills!
