title: Parkour Rooftop
description:
Parkour Rooftopis a 2D running game in which you run on rooftops! It will remind you of the popular video game Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game. Avoid crashing into any obstacles and try to run as far as you can. Running on rooftops will challenge your skills to the utmost, as you never know what you will encounter. Watch out for hazards on your way! ð
Ready to dive into the excitement of jumping from one rooftop to another? This adrenaline-pumping running game will test your reflexes! You must not come into contact with any obstacles while running forward. Your main aim is to avoid all the obstacles on your way and take the longest route as you can. With each try, attempt to break your own highest record. While trying to do that, try not to fall down!
You will encounter satellite dishes, chimneys, boxes, and air conditioning motors while you are running on the roofs. If you trip over them, you will slow down. These obstacles may even cause you to fall. Jump over them to dodge. You can tap longer to jump higher to surpass them completely.
The leaves of large trees and cranes may obstruct your view. They may prevent you from seeing the gaps between buildings while running and jumping. Before taking action, you must calculate all the possible risks that you can encounter. We suggest you open your eyes wide!
Parkour Rooftop was developed by MarketJS.

short_description: Jump from one roof to another while dodging chimneys and satellite dishes in Parkour Rooftop, a 2D running game! Run the furthest distance as you can.

title: Snake Wars
description:
Snake Warsis a fun io game where you embody a cute snake trying to get bigger by eating food. You must be the biggest one among the others in the pit. Otherwise, you will become prey for them. Avoid crashing with any other ones to achieve success in this thrilling snake game!ð
All you need to do in the io game is eat food and get bigger. The more you eat, the more you grow! It is very simple. Your score is equal to your size. To get the highest score and get on top of the leaderboard at the upper right side of the screen, avoid getting crashing with others. You have 2 minutes and 30 seconds. Take up as much food as you can within this short period.
You can customize the pit on which you move and the food type you eat along this pit. View your alternatives in the Settings section by clicking on the relevant icon. You can choose between lightened circles, hamburgers, pizza slices, gummies, fruits, diamonds, cakes, and donuts. Donuts can make your mouth waterð¤¤. You can also determine the type of pit your snake will sizzle through from the relevant section.
You will find 13 unique outfits for your snake to wear. Click on the Skins section to view your options. There is a green frog, a pumpkin and a yellow chick costume. You can unlock each costume for 500 coins. Expand your wardrobe by getting all the costumes with your in-game currency. It can be fun to participate in battles by changing costumes occasionally to make things different.
Most of the time, you will encounter other snakes in the pit while trying to feed. You shouldnât get in touch with them. No part of your snake should come into contact with others. In such cases, to dodge them quickly, you can use the boost. Click on the left mouse button or press the Space key to activate it.
Snake Wars was developed by FreezeNova.
If you are a Snake Wars fan, you may also tryWormmate.io. You are born as a little worm in the game. And your duty is to get bigger and turn into a big boy. Eat the candies and grow your size. Avoid other big boys, as they can smash you!

title: Nova Billiard
description:
Welcome to Nova Billiard!Nova Billiardis a 3D pool game where you try to show off your aiming skills with a cue. Like in shooting games, aiming well and sending the ball into the hole in billiards is essential. You can play Nova Billiard against a computer or by finding yourself an online opponent. Decide who you will compete with and start the game!
You can start by typing your username in the white box. After that, decide whether you want to play with a computer or an online opponent. When you tap to "Play," it will directly open a game with the computer. If you want to practice before starting an actual billiards game, you can play trial games by going to the "Training" section of the menu.
In order to draw the cue stick back after aiming, press and hold it. The intensity of the shot will increase as you pull back further. You send the ball in your selected direction by releasing it.
You will see a box that says 3D at the bottom left of the game screen. You can bring your gaming experience to 3D by clicking here. Or you can continue in 2D. It is entirely up to you.

title: Pizza Party
description:
Customers are hungry and waiting for your pizzas!Pizza Partyis a restaurant game where you take customers' orders and make their pizzas according to their wishes. But do not make them wait longer! Customers all over the world are impatient. Besides, if you make the wrong pizza and give it to them, they will go crazy. You shouldn't lose customers!
Customers will come to the counter, and the type of pizza they want will appear as a bubble on their right side. According to this instruction, you must cook the pizza they want using the ingredients on the left side of the screen. They may get angry if you give them the wrong pizza or their pizza is late. Treat them well!
The customer came and placed his order. So what do we do now?Â
At first, you can only make two types of pizza, but as you earn a certain amount of money, you will level up and be able to make new types of pizza with new ingredients. In the list below, you can see which types of pizza you can make in the game.

title: Meowfia Evolution

It seems strange to form a mafia out of cats, right?Meowfia Evolution Endlessis a cat breeding game where you witness lots of cats emerging without limit. Except for one special breed: The Godpurrer! title: Monster Truck Booster
description:
Monster Truck Boosteris here to take your gaming experience to new heightsâliterally. This online 2D driving game combines classic monster truck mechanics with a quirky twist: a powerful booster that launches your truck into the air. Whether you're climbing steep slopes or leaping over wild ramps, the challenge is all about precision and flair.
But what makes this game truly stand out? It's not just the gravity-defying stunts but also the thrill of nailing those perfect landings. Hold the space key to charge up your booster and release it to fly through the air. Time your boosts carefully, as a poorly timed launch could send you flipping out of control. The goal? Land smoothly and complete all 30 racetracks. Letâs dive deeper into what makes Monster Truck Booster an absolute must-play.
At its core, Monster Truck Booster is about balance, timing, and having a blast. Hereâs what you can expect:
For Computers:
For Mobiles:
Start by selecting your monster truck and picking a level. The early levels are beginner-friendly, giving you time to get the hang of the mechanics. Use the accelerate and reverse controls to navigate the terrain. From rugged hills to random barriers, each level presents unique challenges. To overcome these obstacles, hold the boost key or button to build power and release it at the perfect moment. Use mid-air rotations to adjust your landing. Complete the level by navigating all obstacles and pulling off mid air flips.
As a long-time fan of driving games, Monster Truck Booster hits the sweet spot between fun and challenge. I completed all the levels, and I must say some of them were quite challenging. However, I never felt overwhelmed by the difficulty. Designing levels that are difficult yet doable is a tough task, so I truly admire the work put into this game.
I think, the unique booster mechanic is what sets it apart from other 2D driving games. Itâs not just about racing to the finish line but doing so with style and precision.
I must admit that the graphics are simple, but that's part of Monster Truck Booster's charm. In a time when many games prioritize flashy visuals over a really fun gameplay, this one stands out as a hidden gem. So, the minimalistic design does exactly what it needs to: keeping the focus on fun.
Lastly, the physics engine feels surprisingly polished for a game of this type. Each level feels fresh, with new challenges to overcome. The coin system and truck upgrades adding a layer of motivation and kept me engaged the whole time.
My Rating: 8.5/10â A fantastic mix of fun and challenge but I would love to see more levels. Perfect for both casual players and die-hard driving game enthusiasts.
FreezeNova is the creative force behind Monster Truck Booster.
If youâre hooked on the roaring engines and jaw-dropping stunts of Monster Truck Booster, youâre in for a treat! Explore otheronline truck gameslike Monster Truck Mountain Climb orOffroad Rally. These games feature the same high-octane action and endless fun thatâll keep you coming back for more.
short_description: Looking for a game to kill time or tackle tricky stunts? Monster Truck Booster has all the thrills and fun you need. Play for free now!

title: Fisherman
description:
How about fishing?Fishermanis a funny fishing game where you try to put fish on your hook and try to catch them as much as possible. The types and weights of fish vary. The money you earn from that fish increases in direct proportion to the weight of the fish. Cast your rod and wait for a fish to be caught on your hook!
Fisherman offers you four different locations to fish:
All of them are very fascinating places for fishing, and it is very possible for you to encounter different fish species specific to each location. We recommend you try each of them.
You are given a certain amount of time to fish. The more fish you can catch during this time, the better it will be for you. You can see how much time you have at the top of the screen. Additionally, every fish you catch gives you extra time.
If you find Fisherman enjoyable, you should tryPenguin Fishing, where a little penguin is very hungry, and you need to feed him with fish. Welcome to Trains io! Trains.io is a fun and exciting free online game where you and other players are little toy trains. The goal is to increase the number of carriages as many as possible. To make your train grow, collect screws, toolboxes, and coins on your way. Don't hit another train while doing these. Then, you have to start over with only one wagon.

title: Dockyard Tank Parking
description:
Dockyard Tank Parkingis a 3Dtank driving gamewhere you steer a huge machine and try to park it in the specified parking area. It is one of the most unusual parking games. Fitting the giant tank into a narrow zone will not be that easy! You must park it into the zone properly to move to the next level. ð§
Get into the seat of your machine and start to drive! You must follow the reddish arrow to go to the blue areas. Before getting to the zone, you must pass these blue halos one by one. You will see two red Ferraris when you arrive at the parking lot. Park your car carefully in the area between these two cars. It may sound simple, but parking the vehicle will be arduous as you level up.
To pass a level with three stars, you should avoid collisions with pontons or cars. Each contact with them will cause you to lose a star. You can target the cars and shoot them if you want, but you should not collide.
You will move along on a dockyard full of shiploads. You will see colossal transport ships on the rough sea. You may wonder how they brought this giant machine here. It is also carried by a ship. Steering a car on the sea level will be very enjoyable!
You do not need to be alarmed at all! The game will automatically return the machine to its former state. You just need to wait a few seconds. Once the vehicle is fixed, you can continue on your way.
Dockyard Tank Parking is created by FreezeNova.
If you enjoy playing Dockyard Tank Parking, you may also tryMonster Truck City Parking. You must park your giant truck in the designated area. To reach the zone, follow the pink halos throughout the city streets. Properly fitting the huge vehicle into a tight area will be your utmost challenge!
For more options, you may look for otherdriving games onlineon OnlineGames.io by clicking on the link. If you have any suggestions or wishes, please contact us!
short_description: Follow the red arrows and reach the parking zone in the driving game Dockyard Tank Parking. Parking the huge machine will be a real challenge!

title: Squid Game Hunter
description:
Squid Game Hunteris an online arcade game inspired by the popular drama series Squid Game streaming on Netflix. Your main aim is to eliminate all the enemies as a hunter with a deadly knife. Catch them from behind and eliminate them one by one. You must be very quiet and careful! Otherwise, the enemies will get their due. ðª
Seems familiar, right? Squid Game Hunter will remind you of the 1980s popular arcade game Pac-Man, in which you try to escape from the ghosts! Read our blog post, which we dedicated tothe 30th anniversaryof the worldâs well-known game.
In this action game, you will find yourself in a dark room. But you are not alone! There are enemies wearing red uniforms with triangular headgear. They have flashlights in their hands. You must stay away from their flashlights; otherwise, they will not let you live! Approach them from behind and use your knife to disqualify them. We suggest you eliminate each red character one by one, cornering him alone.
You need to escape from the dark room. But the first thing to do is to get rid of all the red-wearing characters. Donât let them catch you with their flashlights. This is why we suggest you reach them from behind. Once you eliminate an enemy, the others will rush into the scene of the accident. It is a must to act quietly and strategically to survive under these circumstances!
When you eliminate an enemy, he drops coins. And within some levels, you can collect the coins scattered around the room. You can use these coins to unlock speed shoes. Each new pair of shoes you unlock will enable you to move faster. With them, you can sneak out of the Squid Game and escape easily.
kiz10.com developed the Squid Game Hunter.
You can also giveAmong Impostora chance if you like playing games like this. In the Among Impostor, your main goal is to sabotage the tasks of the crewmates as an impostor! Moreover, you are always welcome to explore ourfree online action gamesby following the link.
short_description: Hunt all of your enemies wearing a red uniform from behind with your deadly knife and try to sneak out of the Squid Game Hunter, an online arcade game!

title: We Are In A Simulation Simulator
description:
We Are In A Simulation Simulatoris an online simulator game where you need to act like an insider! In this game, you must mimic every action to survive in a digital world. Copy the actions of men in suits with guns in their hands. Try not to give yourself away in order to survive! ð§
Question nothing, mimic everything! Follow the crowd and act in synchronization with others. If you expose yourself, they understand that you are not one of them. So, move when they move, jump when they jump. Copy their actions without hesitation or any mistakes. Otherwise, all of them will beat you up and point their guns at you. Try not to reveal yourself as an outsider by blending in in each scenario!
You must avoid unnecessary movements that might draw attention. Observe closely and mimic the actions of others. If they get suspicious about you being different, you will not be able to survive in this simulator game! So, watch their behaviours closely and try to adapt quickly in a strange digital world.
To be successful in We Are In A Simulation Simulator, start by mastering the controls and familiarizing yourself with the environment. Other characters might move left or right abruptly, and they can jump or crouch without giving you any signals. You must catch their actions quickly with keen observation.
We Are In A Simulation Simulator was published by Playgama.
If you enjoy playing thought-provoking games like this, you may also try playingWe Become What We Behold. In the game, your main goal is to observe the lives of a town as a news reporter! For more options, feel free to check out ourSimulator Games Onlinegame category. If you have a wishlist or suggestions, do not hesitate tocontact us.
short_description: As an outsider, you must survive in a strange digital world by copying the actions of others in We Are In A Simulation Simulator, a thrilling simulator game!

title: Pirate Adventure
description:
Are you ready to be the Jack Sparrow of virtual world?Pirate Adventureis a 3D adventure game where you land on an island and try to find Cristopher's lost treasure. But in order to do this, you must meet Blackbeard's requirements. He will guide you to riddles that no one has ever known before. You need to answer these one by one. You will absolutely love this pirate game!
Embark on an epic treasure hunt in Pirate Adventure, where you take on the role of a modern-day Jack Sparrow! You need to help Christopher find his treasure on the island. But finding the treasure won't be that easy. First of all, you need to strengthen your communication with the locals of the island. You have to earn their trust, especially the Blackbeard's trust. He's one of the key people on the island, and he can help you find your treasure. Go to him and solve his riddles. This is the surest way to gain his trust!
Blackbeard's riddles are based on some basic mathematical equations. In fact, you can easily solve all of them by reasoning. There will be people on this island who can teach you a lot. Find them and complete the tasks they give you, and in return, they will give you the formulas to solve Blackbeard's riddles!
As you solve the Blackbeard's riddles, you will obtain pieces of the map. You can see how many total riddles you have solved in the upper right corner of the screen. When you solve them all, you will have completed a map, and this map will lead you to your lost treasure.
TryDark Ninja Hanjo, where you try to recover the ancient scroll to be able to rescue the ruined city if you like playing Pirate Adventure. Or you can look for other onlineadventure gameson OnlineGames.io for further options by following the link. Tell us about your gaming experience in the comment section below!

title: Cross the Road
description:
Help the adorable frog cross the path!Cross The Roadis a 3D arcade game inspired byCrossy Road. In the game, you guide a green frog on a vast dirt road. While trying to cross it to the other side of the path, you will encounter many obstacles.
In this skill game, make sure your animal crosses the road safely! Additionally, do not forget to collect the coins on the road, as the coins will enable you to unlock new kinds of animals.
Desktops and Laptops
Mobile Devices
If the frog gets in contact with the jellyfish, it will be burnt by them. So, you must avoid the jellies no matter what. But of course, they are not the only obstacles you must avoid.
There will be flying arrows which will take the frog's life immediately. It should not be crushed under rolling wooden logs, either. Additionally, it should use lotus leaves while crossing rivers. If it falls into water it will drown.
As you collect coins on the path and earn coins by opening the chests, you can unlock various animals from the Shop section. Click on the store icon to see all the animals that you can unlock.
Piggy, Doggy, Goaty, Turtle, Koala, Sheep and Duck are there. Acquire whichever you want to cross the road with and set off!
FreezeNova developed this arcade game.
If you enjoy playing with animals, you may also trySwing Monkey. You will direct a little monkey by swinging it. You must help it move between the rings and get to the finish line!
Look for theanimal games onlineon OnlineGames.io for additional options. Please share your gaming experiences with us in the comment section below! We would be very happy to hear from you.
short_description: Help the frog cross the path as far as you can in Cross The Road, a 3D arcade game that will remind you of Crossy Road. Ready to hop into action?
